111.content:
I'm walking through my hometown as the newest trainer of Mystery Island and I'm on my way to get my first pokémon, but I left my home early before the other trainers got to the Professor's lab on the ocean-side cliff. I'm 10 years old, my name is Ray, and I like surprises. My parents are pokémon masters in battles and contests so I'm going to be like them, but they wanted me to follow my own dreams. The Master of Mystery and Mistress of Magic are my parents, but their real names are Ryan and Melody. They really care for me even when they are working their shows, but their pokémon are psychic types like alakazam, solrock, lunatone, spoink, and other psychic types; but they had a ralts, karlia, and gardevoir to help raise me when they were on stage and they would have them babysit me when I was a little boy. They are like family to me and I care for them, but I started to get strange feelings for Kari (female karlia) and Rio (female gardevoir). They thought it was cute and I talk to them about it, but I had trainer school to deal with and they helped me with my studies. I'm smart enough to get the right answers, but how to get them can be a slight problem. In short, I passed my finals and I was able to get an expert trainer license so I can get three-starter pokémon. I like gardevoir, ninetails, and chansey, but wigglytuff is in my list and some others as well. I got to the gate to the lab of Professor Gray and he greeted me at the door.

"Hello Professor Gray." I say as he let me inside

"Hello Ray, how is your family doing?" He asked as we walked to the lab where I can pick my starter pokémon

"They are doing well and they are still in the magic show business."

We talked over some tea and then we strolled over to the laboratory and he shows me about 12 sets of three starter pokémon teams.

"So each three pokémon will you choose?” he said as I start to look over the pokéballs

In the end, I picked three pokéballs and they turned out to be a growlithe, vulpix, and an eevee.

“Your growlithe is a male and your other two pokémon are females. I’m telling you this so you can give the right names.” He said as my team greeted me

“Thank you for the tip, professor.” I said as he gave me five pokéballs and my own pokedex

“Now, you should know the land on our own island first and see what kind of pokémon live on it then go to the mainland for the pokémon league.” He advised me as I recalled my team back to their pokéballs

“There are also some weird pokémon hanging around a lake in the forest and they are to be human and pokémon, but they are female and only female.” He said which caught my interest

“Are these creatures strong?” I asked

“They are more to peace and harmony, but they will fight if they have those who have an impure heart invading their forest.”

Soon I left the lab as other new trainers like me were lining up to receive their starting pokémon and I came home to see my parents and pokemon are getting ready for the party to celebrate me becoming a trainer.
111.title: A very tall tale to tell

1111.content:
“Nice to have you home so we can start the party.” my mother said when she saw me coming inside the house

“Let us see your pokémon, son.” my father said as kari and rio nodded in agreement

“Alright.” I said as I let my three partners out of their pokéballs

My pokémon dog piled on me and they were happy to see me.

“Have you thought of any names for them?” my mother asked me

“Yes.” I said smilng

“Vulpix is Amber, growlithe is Blaze, and eevee is Eva.” I said and my pokémon likes their names

I told my parents about what the professor said about the weird creatures in the forest and they nodded with a small smile.

“I know of them since we did a show for them when we could get away, but it was before you were born and we had rio and karla with us during that time. The professor is right about them wanting only peace and fighting for it, but they like to have visitors some time.” Dad said and I nodded

Soon we had the party and it was over when it was time for bed since the party was two hours long, but we started late. Rio was tucking me in my bed as my three pokémon were on beside me on the bed and she kissed me goodnight before turning off the light. I was dreaming about the village and the creatures there, but somehow I was dreaming about rio and her body was getting more curvy and beautiful. Soon I felt her mind with my mind and she was smiling, but I wasn’t trying to think like that and she thought it was cute.

~That is very sweet of you thinking I was that beautiful.~ I heard in my head

~Rio, were you and karla from the village?~ I asked

~Ray, your parents were at the village when I met them and it was the same for karla; but we did come from the village and your father used real magic to make my body to become like a normal gardevoir.~

~When you were going to be born, I wanted my real form so you could see the real me.~

~I know the real you no matter what your body looks like.~ I thought and I saw her hugging me in my dream

~Thank you ray, but I think that your father should let me have my real form and tell you the truth.~ she said

In my dream, she looked like a supermodel and I was just staring at her surprised.

~I know you don’t think like that and this dream is only how you can see what my real body looks like.~

She kissed me on the cheek and I blushed lightly from the kiss. She noticed and giggled before she hugged me again.

~Your father is my trainer as karla is your mother, but ralts is too young to be going with you.~

Soon the dream ended and I had some peaceful sleep and I know rio is watching over me as a mother should. I know my parents care for me and they love me, but they are to busy and they have been there for me.

“Son, it’s time to get up.” Someone said and I just turned over not wanting to get up

“Five more minutes.” I said wanting to sleep more

I feel someone pulled me out of bed and gave me a hug.

~You need to get to the table for breakfast.~ I heard in my mind and I noticed karla was hugging me

121.content: Luke ran through the field as fast as he could. He didn't care that it was raining nor did he care that all of his clothing were burnt. He began sprinting and his short spiked blond hair began collecting snow. He turned the corner and stopped a few feet in front of Anuza the spirit of the Desert. She had the head of a jackal covered in black fur and her body was covered in black fur as well and she was wearing a silverish white toga. "So your obviously not the spirit of speed" she said before writing something down on a scroll. "What the hell am i then?" asked Luke. "You'll have to find out on your own" said Anuza before smiling and picking up a basket full of meat and handing it to Luke. "Now go feed the Dark Beasts" said Anuza. "Why the bloody hell would i want to do that?" asked Luke. "Cause your my apprentice and you must do what i say and getting raped wouldn't help me with today" replied Anuza while rolling her eyes. "Besides you don't even have to walk into the cage just throw it in" said Anuza before Luke sighed and then walked up to the Dark Beasts cage and began throwing meat inside. "Bloody stupid creatures" said Luke throwing the Meat inside and watching them fight for it. Dark beasts were two legged creatures with 4 eyes and black skin and they were known to rape females of any species if not fed instantly and steal souls of there victims. "Not enjoying todays tests are you?" asked Nahza who is the Spirit of light. Nahza wore bright gold robes and had a scepter in his right hand and had a hawks head instead of a humans and the rest of his body was covered in feathers as well. "Why haven't you told me who i am?" asked Luke. "Cause then you will never find yourself" said Nahza. "Your 45,000 years old and you probably don't even remember your trials" said Luke. "I remember Anuza doing them and she acted the same as you" said Nahza. "At least she didn't have to feed these retarded things" said Luke pointing at the Dark beasts. "She did and has for 23,000 years but she is to busy to feed them today" said Nahza. "What about you what do you do?" asked Luke. "Make sure that the mortals see a sun everyday" replied Nahza before walking away. After Luke had finished feeding the beasts he walked up to Anuza who was speaking with Coth the spirit of Night. "Now what?" asked Luke. "Balance on those poles for 10 days" said Anuza and Luke's jaw dropped. "Your crazy!!" shouted Luke and Anuza and Coth smiled. "we both did it Luke" said Coth with a smile on his face. Coth was a Panther spirit and he wore black robes with moons on them and stars. Luke walked up to the poles and climbed up onto the top to begin his balancing and within 5 minutes he fell. "You will not leave till you've stayed up there for 10 days" said Anuza before Luke was left alone balancing on the pole.
121.title: Beginning of story.

1211.content:
As soon as Luke hit the 10 day mark he hit the ground asleep. "Wake up" said Anuza poking him with a stick and Luke grabbed the stick and threw it away. "Go away" said Luke and Anuza smiled. "Come on its time to wake up" she said and Luke continued to lay there till she kicked him. "What!" asked Luke tired. "You can't stay asleep now" she said. "I just stood on a pole for 10 days!" said Luke. "Fine you may sleep for a few hours" she said.


A few hours Later Luke was awakened by Anuza and He rolls his eyes. "You Really don't like to let people sleep do you?" asked Luke. "Just wake up" said Anuza and Luke Sighed before standing up. "Now lets continue your lessons" said Anuza with a smile on her face.
1211.title: Tired.

15.title: For my friends

151.content: Zsphyr is a down and out hero who is slowly fading into the crowd, as unrecognisable as any average civilian. He turns in his newspaper to a back page that simply says, "Fighters Needed For the Return of Gore" this was identical to the ad that earned him his title of hero. The return was of a man named Gore. He was a fiend, truly fit for only the depths of hell, where all thought he was banished to remain forever. Yet, if this were true and he was returning after only four years, could Zephyr be the warrior to banish him again? He beat him alingside his partner Jaxx, who all were told died of his wounds gained from the fight. But no, he was having a peaceful life in the country with his wife. His son Zenn, what an energetic little guy, and funny too. It was truly an honor to be named his godfather, though there is nothing that could possibly kill Jaxx before Zenn was at least eighteen. Zephyr pulled the door to his rickety car open and drove to visit, though the reason behind it was too dark for anyone but Jaxx himself. He turned the key and hit the accelerator. Soon he was driving out on the beginning of what would put him into history.
151.title: How It All Began

1511.content: Zephyr managed to keep the car together long enough to get to Jaxx's home. He pulls in, seeing something that would always burn in his memory from the day he saw it. The house was smoldered. But not from flames. The clear meddling of Gore's dark powers was at work here. He searched the house. He found only the remains of Jaxx's wife, burnt and sucked completely of her blood. "Oh shit. Oh shit, not Maria." Zephyr took time with his emotions before standing. The search ended up fruitless. At least he didn't know the other two were dead. That leaves a chance. "Zenn, Jaxx, please be safe..." He got up and saw a shifting shape. The ebb and flow of blood magic. The very same Gore uses. The previously mentioned nemesis appeared from the blood. "Zephyr... I'm happy to see you're doing well. How's being a forgotten hero working out?" Gore stood with his pure black skin and blood red eyes. "You're looking like someone who just finished setting themself on fire and doing crack. So, normal for you right?" Gore sneered and then looked at him. "This time there won't be failure. None of your light magic will stop me when the plan finishes. Hell, there won't be enough light in the world to stop me when it's over." Zephyr stood defiantly and brought hisgun out. A rope of blood pulled it away and he dropped into a fist-fighting position. "I would crush you like the bug you are, but I need to finish my preparations. See you in the living Hell I create for you." Gore disappeared in a whirl of blood. "He never talks about a plan, just world domination through killing off any people who could challenge him. What's he up to?" Zephyr's thoughts were mostly around that until they reached Jaxx and Zenn. He searched the area but they seemed to have dissapeared. Finally Zephyr guessed the hiding spot. The tower. He got back into the car, leaving behind the mess that signified what could be the beginning of the end.
1511.title: A Family Torn

15111.content:
Jaxx has a place in his mind he can transport people to, but only he and one other at a time. "Gore will pay for this. I am going to kill him." Zephyr had become very good friends with Maria. After his wife died, Maria had been like a second mother to his daughter. Alexis now lived with other parents, because Zephyr couldn't raise her very well on his own and because of his need to fight Gore. First he sent her to Maria, and she now lives with another family, surely at about the age where she would learn of her powers, just as Zenn will. She and Zenn were born two months away from eachother, Alexis first, then Zenn, about two weeks before their hunt for Gore. Zephyr pulled off the country road next to a cornfield. The sun was dipping below the horizon slowly, and the day was near its end. The sky was red. Red as the blood that fuels Gore. Zephyr fought his way throughout the corn, praying that they were in the tower. In the middle of the field was an inconspicuous gap in the corn. Zephyr opened the hidden door in the ground. He went into a cavern, which had a rune painted on the floor. Zephyr muttered the magic phrase and felt the rushing sensation that meant he was teleporting. He felt the motion stop and saw a blade of fire pointed at his throat. Not coming from Jaxx, but Zenn. "Hello Zenn. I'm here to see your father." the ten year old said, "But my dad said not to let anyone in....." The sound of feet on the stairs came from below. "Jaxx?"
The man looked up, the usual kind, but world-weary smile appeared on his face. "Zephyr. So this means you know?" The man's stare was intense and Zephyr nodded. "I'm so sorry about Maria. We will kill him this time. You can get your revenge." Jaxx nodded, unable to show anything else. At this point he had been hollowed out of everything. Everything but the hate and the rage. Zenn had backed into a corner and sat on a chair, reading a book.
15111.title: The Tower

151111.content: The men were interrupted by the whir that gave away a teleportation. "Did someone follow you?" Jaxx was looking nearly hysterical. Zephyr shook his head, pointing his gun into the center of the room. Zenn had two blades of fire pointed at the same spot, a spitting image of his father. The blur dissapeared, revealing Gore. The two men shot, and a fireball and bullets were each stopped by a wall of blood. "That's no way to make me feel welcome. Thanks for showing mr the secret way in though..... very nice of you." I only came here to show you how my plan is coming to fruition. He opened his coat, and then showed a spirit. Alexis' spirit. "Son of a bitch! I'll kill you!" Zephyr fired an entire clip of bullets, each easily blocked. "Why not just use your powers? It would be so much easier." Jaxx whispered at Zephyr. After an accident, Zephyr had sworn not to use his powers again. "Fine." He pounded his fists together, causing electricity to flow through them. The original partners charged together, Jaxx being grabbed around the neck by a rope of blood and pulled in next to Alexis. "Spirits of Ice and Darkness! Heed my call! I challenge you to a battle!". Gore yelled into the air. "What are you doing?" Zephyr said. The spirits obeyed and appeared. The battle was nonexistent. Both were dragged into the area where the captured souls go. Zephyr watched as Gore yelled "Spiritual Fusion!" Zephyr understood. He was taking their power and then taking over the world. "Gore! You won't get away with this! I won't let you!" Gore smiled and then laughed, all the while gaining the powers of the souls he was taking. Zephyr smashed his fist into Gore's face and then began hitting him, not giving the Blood Mage a chance to react. Zephyr finally threw a huge uppercut, throwing Gore into a wall. "Heh..... I forgot about you. But you are an insignificant worm. I will soon be greater than God himself. There's nothing you can do about it." Gore started thrashing Zephyr with blood whips and soon the man was sent to the ground. Zephyr crouched down trying to determine what to do. "I give up. Come take my soul." Zeohyr let the words slip out I'd his mouth. The rope grabbed his neck and he grabbed it, coursing all his electricity through it. Gore was stunned and wounded. He fell to his kneeez as Zephyr ran at him, finally landing a huge kick to his head. Zephyr then jumped on top of Gore and started bearing him mercilessly. "You are going to die you disgusting freak! Burn! In! Hell!" The last three words were said at the same time as three huge stomps on his head. Gore used a blood rope to yank his msg after the last one and Zephyr fell. He began whipping the man at places with main arteries. Zephyr slowly bled out and died, his soul not takable by Gore.
151111.title: A Twisted Plan

1511111.content: Zenn watched as his godfather died. Gore began healing. He remembered when he listened to his dad and Zephyr talking about how Gore was weak as he healed. Words came to Zenn's mind. Zenn began muttering. Gore finally noticed him. "Hello boy. I am going to take you somewhere where you'll be happy. Just let me erase your memories of your time in the tower." Gore planned yo take the boy's spirit when he was older and much more powerful. Zenn finished saying what he had wanted to and now yelled it. "SPIRITS OF FIRE AND LIGHT, BURN THROUGH THE NIGHT!" A beam smashes into, Gore releasing the soul least absorbed into him. Jaxx was sent away from Gore. Gore had fired his memory eraser and it hit Zenn. Jaxx then turned to see Gore disappear. Zenn fell unconscious and Jaxx realized at that moment what he must do. Zenn's life must be ruined, at least for awhile, to save the lives of millions. Jaxx erased Zenn's memories, replacing then with those of an orphanage. With a good amount of his remaining power and life-force, he blocked Gore from returning to their world until Jaxx died. He just prayed Zenn could be fully trained by then. If not, there would be severe consequences for not only Zenn, but the entire world. Jaxx looked at himself in a mirror. "He looks just like me. Just like his father." A tear rolled down his cheek as he pulled out a mask to hide their resemblance. "He'll hate me. He'll hate me until he understands what I did." The tears flowed freely as Jaxx put on the mask and put Zenn into a hut in a small town in Nevada. The father lpoked at his son, giving him a final kiss on the forehead and then looking at the sunrise. This one orange. Just like the boy's eyes.
1511111.title: Death and Corruption

152.content:
Jak and Jasmine entered their high school. After teaming up with Blake, Joana, and the Ryans, they had returned home to finish their high school studies.

Jak, who is 17, was ready to graduate, and he wasn't more happy to. After finding out that him and Jasmine had feelings, everything has been smooth sailing. His grades were in order, and he was in the final months of school. Jasmine, who is 18, was also ready to get out of high school and pursue her dreams. She was a state scholar, and pretty much was at the top of the class.

Jak was able to help people, but having to wear a disguise to not let people know who he really was. He was called the "Omega Warrior." He thought it was perfect, since he used his Omega Form.

Both knew that finishing their high school lives was hard.

Freshmen Year: These two didn't know each other, as they were both new to the school. Jak then had this strange dream, and Jasmine experinced it with him. And soon after, they were both aware of what was to come....after meeting Shadow and Kate, a Deamon and a girl who were trying to stop two common enemies: Nostory and Seth.

Sophomore Year and Junior Year: Jak and Jasmine started to date, and the things thay occured in the dream came into reality, and they were having a hard time trying to do school and saving numerous people from the wrath of the two evil Deamons. Jak and Jasmine were able to handle it, thanks to Shadow's fast ship, the Deathray.

Now these two during the summer of 2010, had a harder time, but since Jak learned his powers during that time, things were less stressful.
152.title: A Normal Day?

1521.content:
"Man..." Jak said, annoyed. "I am so not ready to get back to work."

"Me neither, Luigi-Boogums." Jasmine said. "It's ok, we got two months left, so hang in there."

"I will do my best..." Jak said. "I'll see you later Jas."

Jasmine kissed Jak as he headed to his first class, Trigonmetry. In there, the class had a free day, and he decided to study for his upcoming play. Jasmine was in American History, intently taking notes on a test the class would have on friday. Jak then thought about what happened with Blake and Joana, but his mind eased, knowing that they both could take care of themselves.

Meanwhile, we turn to the evil trio of Seth, Nostory, and Yasmin, who were still causing trouble for the couple. Nostory, the main guy who caused all of Jasmine and Jak's troubles was still trying obtain power. He and Seth kept in contact with Blaze, the main enemy of Joana and Blake.

Jak ans Jasmine went their separte ways. Jak was still having a hard time trying to stay awake, as his eyes kept opening and closing. He tried his hardest, but ended up falling asleep in the class. 152111.content:
Jak suddenly found himself shrinking.

"Jasmine, please tell me this is a joke..." Jak said, surprised that his girlfriend would do this But nope, there was no answer, he literally was shrinking fast and quickly, and then was the size of a bug. Jak didn't panic...he knew he would eventually get back to Jasmine, but he had to do this without being seen by anyone.

Jak slipped from the boys restrooms and dashed to his locker, using his Omega Form powers. It didn't take him long to get there. Jasmine was waiting for him there.'Yes, this is awesome! 152111.title: Whoa-oh-oh.

1521112.content:
Jak gulped, as he was unsure of the girl that had picked him up. He had his cell phone in his pocket, but couldn't reach it at the moment, as this girl had a grip around his waist.

"You're Jak, aren't you?" The girl said. "You're that senior who won crazy hair day and danced at the pep really for homecoming week."

Jak nodded. "Y-Yes."

"You're sooooo cooool! You're funny and kinda dorky, but in a cool way!"

"Thanks." Jak replied.

"I'm Ashley." The girl said. "I'm a freshmen."

"Nice to meet you Ashley." Jak said. "Listen, I'm not sure if you know but-"

"You're dating Jasmine? Everyone knows that. Cheerleader for most sports."

"Right. Listen, could you allow me to get in contact with her? I kinda need to explain my situation to her...I'm sure that she's worried about me."

Ashley kept starting at the boy toy in her hand, observing Jak. Jak on the other hand, was assessing the situation. If he learned anything from his adventures with Blake, is that it's to stay calm. He still had his Omega Powers readily available. However, thinking it over, Jak had nothing to really worry about. His powers were still intact, he has his cell phone, and felt like nothing could go wrong.

"I think I want to take you home with me." Ashely said. "You're cute, and I've had a crush on you."

Jak gulped. "Listen Ashley, you seem like an awesome person, but I'm already dating Jasmine, who's been my girlfriend for almost 3 years. I'm sure there's other guys who would like you as well."

"You sound like as if you don't want me around..." Ashley said, a little upset.

Jak felt guilty. "Hey-"

"Dont talk!" Ashley said, tightening her grip on Jak. "You're coming home with me, I don't care if you're in a relationship, besides, you're small and can't do anything about it."

"We'll see about that." Jak mumbled.

"Talking back?" Ashley said

"I'll deal with you later." Ashley said, putting Jak in her backpack.

Jak couldn't expose his powers, but needed to wait for an opening to use them so he could escape.

153.title: A new beginning (blake)

1531.content:
[Note: This is an ALTERNATE Dragon Ball Universe... I hope that explains almost everything, it's modified to some extent...]

Planet Vegeta, homeworld of the saiyan race...

The saiyans, one of the fiercest warrior races in the universe, had just beaten the Tuffles, and taken over planet Plant, renaming it to Planet Vegeta, after their king. Some time later, they had adapted advanced technology and conquered planets as mercenaries, for races that hadn't suitable planets, until they were conquered by Frieza's empire, and since that moment, they worked as part of his army. For years, they worked for him, conquering even planets, and this led to Frieza using them against a rival empire of his: The Jigokujin's...

Jigokujin, an ancient and very powerful race. They had a gigantic empire and domain over many planets for millenniums, until Frieza's one appeared, and started a war against them. That war was going anywhere, and Frieza's forces failed at defeating the highly experienced Jigokujin, which indifference oh him, fought both the Jigokujin themselves and the rest of their soldiers from other planets. Frieza didn't want to fight them himself until he knew the true extent of their power, but now, with the saiyans under his orders, he sent them on war...

Jigokujin's planet was highly protected by powerful barriers, fleets of powerful spaceships, and many powerful warriors, thus, the attacks were first directed towards their subordinated planets, which provided them with resources. Every day, and every night, there were violent combats between saiyans, with some backup from other Frieza's soldiers, and the Jigokujin, and their subordinated soldiers as well...

Until one day, a teenager (about 17 yrs old), called Broly, who had been labeled an outcast since his birth, and kept prisoner for most of his life, was taken to battle. The already somewhat insane teenager enjoyed the fight, and the blood, and soon transformed to something the Saiyans hadn't seen: His hair stood up in spikes, and looked reddish, and a golden aura surrounded him. He dashed at an amazing speed, breaking through the enemy's defenses with no problem, and started causing mass destruction all by himself. His fellow saiyans were shocked, he had been some sort of abnormal since his birth, but they didn't expect him to go that far...

The saiyans were even more shocked when they looked how Broly threw a green energy ball at the Jigokujin's main planet's energy shield, damaging it, and breaking it. After some seconds of shock, the saiyans cheered up and went to their space pods, and advanced into the planet. However, there wasn't precisely a welcoming committee awaiting for them, and they were received with heavy weaponry and energy blasts, which didn't damage the space pods though. One of the saiyans that came out from his pod first was a tall man, with middle length black hair, and a scar that ran from above his left eyebrow, down to his left cheekbone level, in a straight line.

He was wearing an almost typical black saiyan armor with 2 large shoulder plates, a black jumpsuit under it, with wrist and ankle guards, as well as dark blue fingerless gloves. He had some insignia in his chest armor and his right shoulder plate. After him, a female saiyan came out of her pod, this one was somewhat thin, with light brown long wavy hair and green eyes. She wore a black armor with a light green jumpsuit under it, and her armor lacked the shoulder plates. As soon as they got out of their pods, were attacked by the furious Jigokujin, but they simply deflected the ki blasts and countered with their own, as more and more saiyans landed.

Jigokujin were humanoid looking as well, but in difference of saiyans, their predominant hair color was either white, platinum or gray. Their eyes were ranged between red, orange and brown. Also, their canine teeth were longer than average standards. When engaged the saiyans in battle, it was shown that they were almost even, and the Jigokujin fought evenly against them. Until Broly arrived, the teenager became even more blood thirsty than the already blood thirsty saiyans, and transformed further, this time, his hair was golden, and his power increased even more. He started to cause havoc by himself (Although this planet was as large as Jupiter, so, it wasn't as much damage in proportion)

Some Jigokujin transformed as well, they grew black feathered wings, and also increased their power. They fought Broly 6 on 1, and Broly still had advantage for a while. Somewhere far enough from them, a male saiyan asked to the one who first landed

-"Sir, what do we do with that kid?"-

-"Let him fight. He's doing well. We'll attack the rest of the city and take whatever we can. This is going to be a long war..."- The other saiyan answered

-"But, sir, have you seen his power level?"- The saiyan asked to his superior

-"Huh?"- The saiyan colonel seemingly hadn't, and pushed his scouter's button (btw, his scouter was transparent gray). It read 50,000. The saiyan leader was clearly surprised

-"The readings are right, sir... that boy has been always trouble..."-

-" *Sigh* After this, take him and bring him back to planet Vegeta, the king must know about this..."- The saiyan leader said more seriously, then his tone changed to a more cheerful one and said -"In the mean time, let's keep up with the work..."- And dashed to attack more of the Jigokujin (Even civilians can put up a fight against saiyans, but only soldiers are a serious threat)

The battle was almost a big success, and as more saiyans arrived, the others returned to a nearly Frieza's planet to eat and rest. Among them, the saiyan leader and the female saiyan. They were eating at a table, as many other saiyans and aliens were. The female saiyan said

-"Uh... Kailan*... I've been feeling... a bit... weird..."-

-"What do you mean? Are you tired?"- The saiyan (Kailan) replied

-"N-no... it's just... weird..."- She said, and Kailan suspected something, and put his scouter back on, pushed its button, and it beeped for a moment. Then he said

-"Aha!! You have 2 power levels... do you know what that means, Sharotto?"-

-"Really?"- Sharotto asked, and Kailan nodded.

-"You better go back to planet Vegeta..."-

-"...Yeah...I know..."- After finishing their food, Kailan went to a room with his wife, and slept, because they had grown somewhat tired by the battle, Jigokujin were very powerful enemies. Some hours later, loud noises woke Kailan up, and rushed outside to see what caused it, and what he saw was several saiyans trying to restrain Broly, who was no longer in the weird transformed form, but was still putting up a fight. A saiyan with a particular hairstyle appeared and managed to sumbit Broly, knocking him unconscious.

-"Jeez... that kid needs to learn some manners..."- The saiyan said

-"You aren't precisely one to teach him that, Bardock"- Kailan answered -"So, he's the kid that was born with a power of 10,000..."- Kailan added

-" *Sigh* Yeah... he's quite a character..."- Bardock said, crossing his arms -"At least he broke through that damn planet's defenses..."-

-"Just before going nuts... Anyway, weren't you busy on a mission?"- Kailan asked

-"Nope. It was piece of cake, my crew is resting, we heard you had a big party here"- Bardock said

-"We're just recovering from that. I bet you'll enjoy tomorrow"-

-"Are you crazy?! I'm not gonna wait all night for this!!"-

-"Kailan? What happened?"- Sharotto stepped out of the room groggily, and noticed he had company -"Oh, Hi Bardock"- She said, and yawned

Bardock, who was still wearing the scouter, noticed it beeped, and that it read two power levels from her. He then playfully nudged Kailan twice and said -"Hey!! It seems you weren't wasting your time..."-

Sharotto blushed, and Kailan scratched the back of his head, laughing -"It's strange to hear that from you..."-

-"Meh... it's not my thing..."- Bardock said

-"By the way, where are your kids?"-

-"I have no idea... well, Radditz is somewhere doing some minor mission with other saiyan children... and Kakarot is..."- then he started mumbling, trying to remember -"I don't remember, but he was sent to a weak planet, the little bastard was born with a power level of 2..."- He said carelessly

-"You weren't precisely born as powerful as you're nowadays Bardock"- Kailan said

-"I know. But even if it's true, that means Kakarot will need years of fighting if he ever wants to get out of the low class hole..."-

-"How long has he been there?"- Sharotto asked

-"I dunno... 4..5 years, who cares?"-

-"Maybe you should track him because that's a little too much even for a saiyan baby..."- Kailan said

-"Maybe I will..."- Bardock said, but his tone said he wouldn't. Kailan sighed and went back to sleep in a bed with his wife...


*I decided to go with the tradition of vegetable based names, don't ask...
1531.title: Before beginning...

15311.content:
Kailan, Sharotto and Bardock went back to Planet Vegeta the next morning, and found that King Vegeta determined Broly was very dangerous, and exiled him to some place far from their planet. After seeing that, Sharotto stayed, Bardock and Kailan went back to fight. The battles had become even more intense, and the Jigokujin were fiercely defending their planet. While taking a break from the fight, Kailan commented

-"Whew... this is really going to be a long war..."-

-"What? Don't you want to fight a powerful race?"- Bardock said

-"Of course I want!! But I don't want to risk important things because of this..."- Kailan said, and Bardock put his hand on Kailan's shoulder

-"She's safe... Jigokujin are actually cornered, they can't afford attacking us while leaving their world defenseless..."-

-"Maybe... but don't you think we should speed up this?"- Kailan asked

-"Hell yeah!!"- Bardock* charged an energy ball in his left hand, and shouted to all saiyans

-"Hey everybody!! Stare at the sky!!"- And threw upward the energy ball, which stood in place. The Jigokujin didn't really understand the meaning of that and assumed it was some sort of signal, until they looked at their enemies again, and started to transform into giant apes!!

Soon, Jigokujin were overwhelmed, and they assumed their transformations as well (grew wings and got a power increase), and an even more violent fight ensued, as the great apes caused mass destruction even more easily than before. Due to this, Jigokujin were forced to draw back all of their forces, leaving a great part of their empire un protected, and got conquered by Frieza's forces, while the Jigokujin were desperately fighting back at their home planet, which they had taken pride on, as a symbol of their power and wealth, as them and their empire, their planet was intact for thousands of years, heavily defended, and supposedly impregnable...

3 months passed, and despite all the battles, the Jigokujin were getting worn down slowly. While for the saiyans it was like a vacation, fighting all day, rest, fight again, and so on. Since that planet's moon hadn't appeared yet, they relied on their own false moons to transform. After other 6 months of carnage, the Jigokujin surrendered, and Frieza's higher ranked men told the Saiyan to go back to their planet and take some time off, while they secured the planet... something the saiyans didn't like very much, but didn't question orders anyway...

Unknown to them, Frieza had a secret reunion with the Jigokujin royalty, where they started to discuss their terms. The Jigokujin king was covered in very thick armor, and nothing of him was visible. His voice sounded metallic although not mechanical. Nobody knew his true name, but he claimed the name of Omega the 17th (because of his dynasty, in which each king took the name Omega). Frieza was accompained by his henchmen, Zarbon and Dodoria, just in case...

-"Well, well, well... you've called me personally to discuss your surrender terms"- Frieza said, Omega nodded, and said

-"If you want to stop this war, yes..."-

-"No sense in making a mess when we can discuss everything as gentlemen..."- Frieza answered

-"We'll be subordinated to you, and we'll cede 70% of our empire. However, we will keep a small percentage that is vital to keep our civilization. Also, these planets will be under our orders, which leads to the following point: We'll work for you, but only if you let us keep our independence..."-

-"That seems quite reasonable"- Frieza said, scratching his chin

-"There's one more last condition: Destroy those saiyan warriors..."- Another Jigokujin noble said

-"I don't think you're in position to demand so much..."- Frieza said 'I already suspected about them'

-"Then we can keep going with the war, and it'll cost you more than it does for us..."- Omega said, hitting the ground with his sword (The sword itself is very sharp, and can cut even the battle armors Frieza's soldiers use. However, the Jigokujin rely more on ki and melee combat, as well as technological weapons. This sword in particular belongs to the Omega Dynasty, and it's been in their family since their planet's foundation) to emphasize

-"Fine..."- Frieza said, and signed a contract that stated the terms Omega said. After a polite hand shaking, Frieza left. The only reason he didn't attempt to destroy them all in one shot was because all of the nobles had power levels at least above 500,000. And Omega himself got a 1,550,000 reading.

Back to his ship, Frieza sat on a chair in the ship's flight deck, and while holding a glass of wine, said

-"We were going to destroy the monkeys anyway. Zarbon... send only saiyans to any following mission we may get and when they're done, have teams of our best soldiers kill them. Team by team, and one by one... soon there will be no more monkeys..."-

-"Yes, lord Frieza"- Zarbon quickly left.

Back to planet Vegeta, Bardock was accompanying Kailan at the nursery, where his wife, Sharotto, was giving birth. Bardock said, with a bored tone

-"Can't we just come back when the damn baby is already born?"-

-"Don't be like that. I want to see this moment..."- Kailan said

-"What's the point, he'll be sent to some planet in very little time..."-

-"Nope"- Kailan said -"I have enough authority to keep him/her from that. I want to train him/her myself, and when he/she becomes trong enough, then he/she will fight many successful battles..."-

-"You really need to go out more and do some battles"- Bardock said, Kailan laughed at that. Some minutes later, a male baby with dark skin and long black hair was born, Sharotto was very tired and Kailan held the baby in his arms. Bardock facepalmed himself and said

-"You know, I'm aware most of our fellow saiyans think I'm odd, but if they saw you like this..."-

-"Bah. Let me be, Bardock..."- Kailan said while slowly rocking his child -"In other planets, in different cultures, parents appreciate more their children... they appreciate giving birth to a living being that carries their blood, and, I dunno. It makes you feel special..."-

-"Forget what I said about previous missions, you seriously need to stay here until you remember you're a saiyan!!"- Bardock said, although he was just joking, he knew that, when they were younger, Kailan got to see more of other cultures other than their armies. Since he was very smart and a good fighter, they educated him in several different planets, and their customs have seemingly influenced him

-"It's just a crybaby, leave him there and let's get something to eat..."- Bardock said

-"Maybe now he is, but one day, he will be a great warrior and will make me proud..."- Kailan said, and Bardock asked

-"By the way... What will be the kid's name?"-

-"Abakku"- Kailan said -"That was my father's name... I'd like he was still alive so he could see his grandchild..."-

-"I know. Your father was always nicer than the rest of us. He won many battles with brains rather than power, I have to give him that..."- Bardock said, and pushed his scouter's button -"Hmm... 1,820... maybe you're right, if trained, your child might become a great warrior... I almost envy you, Kakarot was born with a power level of 2"-

-"Yeah, I know"- Kailan said, still rocking his child, then they were interrupted by Toma, who came in and told Bardock they had just got a mission at Planet Kanassa.

-"Tough one. I heard nobody wanted to do that mission..."- Kailan said, leaving his child in Sharotto's arms.

-"I bet you I can do this mission in less than 15 days"- Bardock said -"You'll have to pay a whole meal, I'll be hungry after this..."- he said jokingly and left, while Kailan just waved his hand. He sat next to his wife, most of saiyans had time off, and only small teams had been assigned to missions, each one in planets far from each other...

* According to the wiki, Bardock claimed he's conscious of what he does while great ape...
15311.title: Saiyans, once mercenaries, now betrayed...

153111.content:
Bardock and his crew beat the Kanassans in 10 days, and had an incident with a surviving one, which hit Bardock. They took him back to Planet Vegeta, injured, and recovered. When he woke up, Kailan was there, and asked him if there was something wrong. Bardock hesitated for a moment, believing that he had seen mere illusions, but decided to tell him:

-"You aren't going to believe me, but I had some strange dreams..."-

-"Like what?"-

-"Planet Vegeta was destroyed... by Frieza..."-

-"What?!!"-

-"It was just a bad dream... although the Kanassan who hit me said something about the future..."-

-"I don't know, but Kanassans had some mysterious power Frieza has been interested on..."-

-"Nah... where's my crew?"- Bardock dressed while changed the topic

-"They went to Planet Meat... But wait, Bardock... I think it's a bit suspicious Frieza suddenly stopped sending us as a whole army and has just been sending smaller teams... I think he's up to something..."-

They heard some man's screams and loud noises, and they rushed outside. A saiyan was laying dead on the ground, and Kailan asked the guards

-"What happened to him?"-

-"I don't know, sir. He came out of his pod and screamed Frieza killed his team... and fell down... Don't worry, it was probably because he lost too much blood..."- A saiyan who was near him said -"Wherever they sent him, it was a tough fight for sure..."-

Kailan and Bardock were now more worried, and went back inside.

-"Don't tell me this just happened!!"- Bardock said

-"You know..."- Kailan said

-"I'm going to go get back my crew before something ugly happens!!"- Bardock rushed outside again to get a pod, Kailan said

-"I'm coming with you..."-

-"No. Get our people together. Don't let anyone out!!"-

-"Alright..."- Kailan went back inside, while Bardock left. He spoke to all the guards, and said

-"I got new orders. All missions are cancelled until further notice. Let everyone in, but nobody out"- The guards saluted and followed this new order.

Kailan didn't want to start any panic yet, but he was discreetly rounding up as much saiyans as possible. He also checked to verify that wounded ones were getting healed. He was walking around and it could be noticed that he was deeply concerned. A male saiyan with light brown hair interrupted him

-"Hey, Kailan!! What's with the big rush?"-

-"Yousei!! Uhm... it... it's nothing..."- Kailan answered

-"You're worried about something..."- Yousei said

-"It'll sound crazy... and you'll laugh..."-

-"Huh?!"-

-"Bardock had a vision about Frieza destroying us, and less than 5 minutes later, a fellow saiyan arrived, bled to death, but before dying, he shouted something about that Frieza killed his team..."- Kailan said, Yousei had a very shocked face

-"I know, you don't believe it..."-

-"I don't think you'd tell me such a thing if it were a lie..."- Yousei said -"So, what can we do?"-

-"King Vegeta and Nappa are out on missions. I ordered to cancel all missions and not let any saiyan out..."- Kailan said

-"Who else knows?"- Yousei asked

-"Bardock, you, me, and our dead comrade..."- Kailan said -"Until we have some proof, I'd rather to not tell everyone..."-

-"Where's Bardock?"-

-"He went to get his crew back, before something happens..."- Kailan said to Yousei

Soon, all saiyans were informed that the missions were cancelled and that there would be no new missions until further notice. Most of them were mad at that. Meanwhile, Bardock was shocked to find all of his comrades dead, and Toma told him what happened before dying. Bardock swore to avenge all f them and fought Frieza's elite soldiers. He fought and defeated them, but faced Dodoria, who nearly killed him. Luckily, he left before verifying Bardock's status. He managed to get back to his pod and arrived very wounded at Planet Vegeta. He rushed to a room where many saiyans were eating and resting, and spread the word about the impending danger. Because of his panic and his status, they regard him as crazy and laugh at him. Then Kailan arrived with Yousei, and they spoke

-"Listen to him!! What he's said is true!!"-

-"C'mon, Kailan, did you really fall for Bardock's lies? He just met his match on a typical mission... nothing to worry about..."-

-"Not too long ago, another of our comrades bled to death after just arriving, and he said the same. Listen, because if we don't we'll die, and we are saiyans!! Will you stay here and calmly get killed or will you fight back?!!"-

The crowd of saiyans started to mutter about what to do, and Yousei said

-"No saiyan dies without a fight... where's your saiyan pride?!"-

The crowd finally shouted in agreement. And they started to check the radars... indeed, several spaceships were heading for their planet, some of them were Frieza's, but the others... the others belonged to the Jigokujin. This angered the saiyans, and Yousei said

-"See? Frieza has joined the Jigokujin, our enemies, against us!! We were the ones who worked for him, we didn't question his orders, and always did our best, and that's how we're paid?!!"-

The saiyans readied for combat, and started flying massively. Bardock was about to go, but Kailan stopped him

-"You did it... we'll fight back, all of us together, our saiyan brothers saw the light of truth..."-

-"Y-yeah..."- Bardock fainted, and was taken to infirmary to a healing tank. Kailan and Yousei still stayed behind, as they were organizing the attack, and constantly received information about their fighting numbers. The ships released several thousands of soldiers, and the saiyans started the battle at their atmosphere. Initially, over 350,000 saiyans went to fight, despite the saiyan population was much larger, Kailain decided to keep reserves. They were doing well against Frieza's soldiers, but started to get overwhelmed when the Jigokujin deployed their own army, and Kailan ordered a reinforcement of 300,000 more saiyans...

That battle was a real carnage, All saiyans, combining their power, were proving themselves superior to Frieza's henchmen, and were putting up a fight against the Jigokujin soldiers. However, back at the planet, Kailan and Yousei were shocked when they identified one of the ships as Frieza's personal ship, which meant Frieza came himself to exterminate them. However, Kailan and Yousei decided not to panic, but informed their comrades

-"Brothers. This may be our greatest battle. Frieza, as we know, is a really powerful being, but let's not forget that he's afraid of us!! If we unite, we WILL defeat him, and we WILL succeed!! Let´s fight to the last breath, with Saiyan honor!!"- Kailan said through his scouter, targeted to all saiyans. But Yousei called him to talk in private, and said

-"Maybe that was too optimistic... remember what Bardock predicted?"-

-"If he could see that, maybe we can change it..."-

-"And maybe we can't... listen, I don't know if this will work, but, if we fail, we'll be extinct... I have a backup plan..."- Yousei said

-"What is it?"-

-"While we're fighting, we'll send all of our children to the weakest planets in the universe. There's no way Frieza may ever wipe us out they're spread..."- Yousei said

-"Uh... but..."- Kailan hesitated about such a decision

-"If we succeed, we'll track them down the launching records of this computer. It says who are and where they were sent..."- Yousei said

-"Alright, do it..."- Kailan said, feeling somewhat defeated, but it was true, they couldn't guarantee they'd win such a battle. The computer started analyzing its database and showed the planets with the weakest inhabitants... They started sending saiyan children almost randomly among these planets. Yousei went to his room, and explained his wife the situation, she carried in her arms a female baby with light brown hair and hazel eyes.

-"And that's why we need to send all saiyan children to somewhere safe..."- Yousei explained his wife, who said

-"Alright... I'd prefer to know that she'll live at least..."- She brought her baby closer to her face and said with some sadness -"Forgive us for this, Reinari..."-

The baby was seemingly confused by her mother's reaction, but couldn't understand, she was just 1 year old. They put her in a pod and sent her away into the space, to some planet far enough from there. Kailan asked

-"Hey, were did you send your daughter?"-

-"A planet called Earth. It's very small, but has a nice weather, rich variety of plants and animals, and inhabited by very weak people. She'll be safe there..."-

-"Can you give me the coordinates? I want to send little Abakku there too"- Kailan asked, and when Yousei gave him the coordinates, started typing in the computer, fixing a similar course....
153111.title: Indeed, saiyans were betrayed...

1531111.content:
However, while doing this, he noticed that other pod was sent to Earth because of the random algorythm it used, and checked its information, it read:

'Name: Makotsu. Age: Newborn. Parents: Unidentified mother. Broly. Additional information: Labeled as dangerous. He was born with a battle power of 7,000. Also, readings indicated it was unstable, and may be a threat in the near future. He is to be executed...'

-"Yousei!!"- Kailan called him and showed him the screen -"You sent that kid to Earth as well!! He's another mutant like Broly!!"-

-"His unstable power is making the pod to malfunction, he probably won't make it to that planet..."-

-"I really hope so. If not, you've just sentenced my son and your daughter to death..."-

-"I doubt that will happen... it's as improbable as to think that my daughter and your son will ever meet. That planet is big enough for that..."-

-"I'd prefer that they met... if we die... at least they can restore the species..."- Said a more concerned Kailan

-"You say that just because daughter's parents pay the wedding..."- Yousei replied

Kailan was about to say something, when a great explosion shook the place, and noticed that Frieza had sent even more soldiers. The computers were sending all children in pods as fast as they could but they'd need some time to do so, and Kailan went outside, followed by Yousei. Kailan said (intending to himself, but the others heard him)

-"This is it!! It's now or never!! I'll fight, no matter if I die or if I live..."- Then he pushed another button in his scouter, and said -"Calling all saiyans in reserve... Frieza is about to go out on us. No more games!! We'll fight to the last breath for our planet, for us, and for our saiyan pride!!"-

He heard some steps and next to him was Bardock, nearly completely healed (It's been roughly 6 hours since the attack started). He was wearing a red headband, which Kailan didn't recognize at first, and almost reading his mind, Bardock said

-"It's Toma's armband, stained with my crew's blood. This is the symbol of my promise. I will avenge them!!"-

Among the rest of the saiyan population, Bardock, Kailan and Yousei flew toward the skies, encountering with Frieza's and Jigokujin's army. They fought their way through them, while looking at the massive battle that ensued. Saiyans were fighting at their best, and their number, despite being lower than their enemies', still overwhelmed them. Saiyans had truly become one of the strongest races in universe. Bardock was tormented by some more visions, but didn't tell anyone.

They kept fighting many opponents, killing dozens, maybe even hundreds of Frieza's soldiers. They also encountered with some Jigokujin soldiers, which gave them more of a fight. Despite that, Bardock, Yousei and Kailan managed to get in front of everyone, facing Frieza, who had just gotten out of his ship. Bardock flew a bit forward, and said

-"Frieza!!... Listen up!!... We Quit!!... All of us!! Got it?!! ...We dont work for you!!. We're free. You can find someone else to do your dirty work.... Oh yeah, there is one last thing... This is for all the people that we killed in your name. I wish we were never foolish enough to obey you. Here!! Have it!!"-

Bardock charged a powerful energy ball in his hand, and while he spoke to Frieza. However, he listened to the saiyan's speech patiently. Meanwhile, the Jigokujin soldiers withdrew from the battle, and Frieza formed a supernova, which absorbed Bardock's attack, and released it. However, Kailan and Yousei shot energy beams at it, and were followed by the many saiyans that were fighting. They knew about the backup plan, and didn't really care as much for their children, but bought them time anyway so the saiyan blood didn't die in this battle...

All saiyans were struggling against Frieza's colossal supernovat seem to bother, he was rather amused at the efforts of the warrior race. Zarbon and Dodoria merely witnessed. While the Jigokujin were angered, in their months of war against the saiyan race, they saw how tough were they, and that together they were more than a threat. However, both them and Frieza failed to notice the numerous space pods that were being sent toward many different planets labeled as inhabited by weak species.

After 30 minutes of struggling, the Jigokujin grew tired of seeing the saiyans fighting for their life and started firing energy blasts at them (They were fully focused in using all their energy in the beams to counter the supernova). Some of the saiyans stopped firing eneergy and flew toward the Jigokujin attempting to fight them, but found that they weren't able to defeat them before the supernova destroyed their planet. Also, some of the saiyans started to realize that it was a lost battle, no matter how long they kept trying, thus, while nearly half of them still struggled trying to repel the supernova, the others decided to die fighting, and engaged the Jigokujin in combat.

Kailan, Bardock, and Yousei, who knew this, and were firing energy beams at the supernova, decided to keep doing so until the last of the pods escaped. As the saiyans kept fighting, they started to get killed by the Jigokujin and Frieza's soldiers. And with more saiyan deaths, there were less saiyans to oppose reistance to the gigantic energy sphere. Also, they endured constant energy blasts from the Jigokujin, and some more fellow saiyans died while trying to focuse into repelling the supernova...

After an hour, Frieza decided that it was enough and aiming his hand at the supernova, started to push it forward with invisible energy. Yousei, Bardock and Kailan were in the front, and were the first to be hit by it. Yousei and Kailan struggled against the burning energy with their bare hands, and Kailan was so desperate that his hair rose up, and was surrounded by a golden aura. He kept trying to push away the supernova, as it slowly advanced, dragging even more saiyans and more of Frieza's soldiers.

Bardock, who had been doing nothing, put his hands on Yousei and Kailan's shoulders, and the three of them had a vision...

They were standing in an unknown planet, which had grass, trees and an ocean. Something about that environment felt like it was a dying planet, then, they noticed, Frieza, sitting in his hover chair, just like now. And before him, they saw three people standing in front of him: In the middle, a tall man, nearly identical to Bardock, although with fairer skin, wearing orange clothing, blue boots. At his right side stood another guy, one with dark skin, wearing a brown jacket and black jeans. When they looked at his face, they noticed a scar, identical to that of Kailan, although in the opposite eye. Also, he had a tail.

There was also a girl, with light brown wavy hair, dressed with a white shirt and blue jeans. She also had a tail. These three stood in front of Frieza.

The saiyan trio finally understood, and each one of them muttered

-"Ka...kakarot..."- Bardock said

-"I can't believe it... is that Abakku? My son..."- Kailan, who was pleasantly surprised

-"Reinari... my girl..."- Yousei also muttered

Snapping out of that last vision, Kailan and Yousei muttered -"Thanks... Bardock..."- Before being totally incinerated, these three saiyans died in peace, being assured that their deaths, and their fellow saiyans' would be avenged, someday...

The supernova incinerated the majority of the saiyans who fought back, and crashed into planet Vegeta, burying in its core, blowing it up, as Frieza laughed and congratulated himselfn enjoying the "fireworks" before leaving in his ship to continue business as usual. In a single day, the powerful saiyan race was apparently wiped out. The Jigokujin weren't as festive as the new space tyrant, but felt relieved of eliminating the one race that may have been a threat to them. They also resumed their life, living like captive nobility, allowed to keep their lifestyle and customs in a much smaller portion of what was once a thousands years old empire, thought to be invincible, and proud of itself. They would conspire one day to claim everything and more back, but they'd need to wait...
1531111.title: Kailan discovers something went wrong...

15311111.content:
There were at least three saiyan space pods which were sent to Earth. Despite what Yousei thought, the mutant saiyan not only did make it to the blue planet, but also, his unstable energy altered the course of the other two pods, thus, they landed in practically the same place, separated by some miles (They were expected to be far away from each other). Makotsu's pod landed somewhere in Siberia, and was caught by scientists, who had witnessed a strange object fall from the sky.

They discovered that the child wasn't human, and started running tests on him, which was very difficult, as he seemingly damaged electronic devices with some sort of energy pulse. They ran a lot of tests on him, and kept him secret in a military base. They also nicknamed him Ivan, because it's a common Russian name...

They tried to teach him to behave like a human but they failed, and he was clearly hostile, even as a baby, so, they had to restrain him with the best they had. However, as he grew up, he was becoming more powerful and more difficult to restrain, so, by when he was 10 years old he was frozen in a special cryogenic tank and the scientists ran even more tests with his blood and DNA.

They found that it was compatible with human DNA despite being different, and they suggested that he was an alien from a species heavily related to humans themselves. However, his DNA and blood samples were very unstable and this lead some of them to believe that he was a mere mutant, this theory failed at explaining why did he come from an unknown spaceship... And an alien mutant was just too rare to happen...

5 years later, even frozen, Ivan's power was too much, and the machines stopped working due to his immense power (although its growth was slowed down a lot for the 5 years he was frozen). He broke free, and slaughtered every living being in the area. Then he destroyed the whole military base and escaped. Russian government claimed that it was an accident with missiles...

In the other side of Earth, the other two children landed as well. Both of them got hit in the head while landing, because of the malfunction Ivan's power caused tot heir pods. Kailan's son, Abakku, was raised by an old woman who happened to see what looked like a comet falling from the sky, and was very surprised to find a small round spaceship with a baby inside, as well as many strange things, what looked to be a full armor set, and a note written in an unknown language. The baby had a tail... and the old woman could only assume that the kid came from another planet.

She raised the kid as her own grandchild, she named him Blake, after her dead husband, and kept all the armor, a strange device that seemed to be some sort of monocle, and the note in a chest. She also found that if she squeezed the child's tail, he'd be unable to move and suffered pain. Thus, she didn't want to cut it, and decided to toughen it by accustoming it to soft squeezes, then stronger, until squeezing it with pliers caused him nothing... This took her over 4 years to accomplish, though this method left a side effect Blake will learn later in his life. She also taught him to read and to write, and additionally, to keep his tail always secret when outside, and never tell anyone about it. Sadly, she died when Blake reached 10 years old, and ever since he has been forced to live on his own...

Yousei's daughter had better luck. She landed near a mansion, belonging to a scientist and his wife. They found strange that a spaceship crashed into their backyard and it contained a baby girl with a monkey tail... Almost any scientist's dream (in the sense of finding an alien baby). The pod also included what seemed to be an armor set. The scientist kept it safe but he'd run some tests on it. Also, in difference of what many scientists would do, he decided not to make public his finding, and decided to raise her instead. They named her Joana, after his wife's mother... The scientist would soon find that she required a lot more of food than a regular human, but he was rich enough to sustain her needs. He had invented a lot of devices and his wife was in charge of the corporation that sold and distributed them...

He also found that her strength and speed were far above any living known person on Earth, and since her childhood, he trained her, though not so much because he still felt it shouldn't be so tough for a girl, even an alien girl. He and his wife also taught her to read, to write, and to keep her tail, real nature and real strength secret. The scientist felt it was a crime to attempt to remove it, because he didn't know what effect may such a thing have in an alien body which apparently needed that tail... However, he also discovered that her tail might be a weak point, and when she grew to 7 years old started to try to strengthen her tail. He also found a strange reaction in her blood cells when exposed to moonlight, while testing her in her very first days, so, he never let her to be exposed to the moon,and her room had windows made of a special glass that blocked any radiation...

So, after 16 years, Blake and Joana will start high school...
15311111.title: The fate of the saiyan children...

153111111.content:
It's been 16 years after three saiyan children were sent to Earth while most of the saiyans died by Frieza's hand... It's also been told what happened to each one of them, and now, two of them will start high school*...

It was a rather boring day for Blake, he wasn't feeling good, but it had been years he had felt like that. He was always pale and looked weak, and still, he was stronger than many people. Being at high school meant nothing to him, he was just a new guy who would probably be picked on, and he'd have to fight again, as he used to do when he was at elementary. Fortunately for him, theere wouldn't be any homework in the first week to get the new generation of students used... which meant a lot of free time to "interact"

'I hate this already' Blake thought, and he had just endured 3 classes, then the bell rang and everyone went for lunch. Blake didn't rush, as he had no money to spend on another extra food. And he was alone anyway, and ended up sitting in a table located farthest, in a corner. He didn't mind. And unknown to him, his presence already had caught someone's attention, but he wouldn't realize, and would just keep being by himself. When the bell rang again, they came back to the classroom, and there were even more classes, 4 to be exact. Blake was nearly fainting by the end of the last one, he never had an explanation for his illness, and he was taught by his grandma that he couldn't get medical tests because of his tail, and that he may end up at government's secret bases and be experimented on or something... And Blake hated medical stuff...

Blake went to his locker to put away his stuff and closed it, just to find a guy taking away a backpack from a girl. While he didn't even know the girl, he recognized the guy, who studied in the same elementary school Blake came from, and knew he was up to no good, he sighed and walked toward them (Despite being tall, he was rather unnoticed by the majority of people, which Blake considered good). He thought of using speed to hit the guy and get away anonymously, so he wouldn't have to explain anything, and tried to, he punched the bully in the stomach, but couldn't get away, as his speed was really limited because of his condition...

-"Wha?!!"- The guy had the wind knocked out of him, and fell backward. Blake took the backpack and when he turned around, the girl was staring at him. He extended his arm with the hand that was holding the backpack. She slowly reached and grabbed it, and Blake looked away, it was one of these uncomfortable silences, and for Blake, the consequences of getting himself into others' business...

However, that silence was cut off, literally, as the bully got up and attempted slashing Blake with a knife... he almost missed... but hit Blake's left arm, which immediately bled (Again, Blake's body is really weakened). Blake punched him twice in the stomach with his right fist, hit him also with his knee, he fell backward again but kicked Blake, so he fell down as well, and since he had nearly run out of all strength he had left, now he was at the mercy of the bully, who got up and kicked his ribs, Blake tried to kick him back but the bully caught his leg, and while Blake was pitifully trying to get away, the bully pulled him and punched him more in the ribs, until Blake spat out blood. Blake managed to punch him in the face and tried to get up, but the bully tackled him and started punching him in the face frantically...

He suddenly stopped, and Blake saw that the girl just knocked him out with a single hit in the back of the neck... She also tossed him aside, and Blake said

-"...It seems my presence here was more than unnecessary...ugh..."- And fainted

When he woke up, he was under a tree's shadow, and the first thing he saw was the girl's face, from a different angle... then he realized that his head was resting on her lap, and he got up quickly. He checked his arm, which was bandaged with fabric, which corresponded to the girl's missing sleeve. Blake turned around, and said weakly

-"T...Thanks..."- But what he got for an answer was an incredibly strong hug, which felt like crushing all of his bones. Blake opened his eyes wide because he realized that if the girl was that strong he did an unnecessary intervention, and ended up hurting himself, not that he really cared. The girl said

-"I'm glad that you're alright!! I was worried!!"-

-"Worried?!... but you don't even know me..."- Blake said, and the girl replied

-"Not much, but I know that your name is Blake..."-

-"Huh?!"-

-"We're in the same classes and it was written in that silver tag you wear..."- She said, and Blake felt suddenly stupid

-"Well... thanks for the bandage..."- Blake said, and wanted to leave, because he didn't know what to do in such a situation, however, the girl didn't let him go, and she said

-"Thanks to you... you got into this trouble because of me..."-

-"No problem..."- Blake said, and this time the girl broke the hug, which had amde Blake uncomfortable, however, the girl still held his arm, and said

-"My name is Joana"-

-"Uh... alright... nice to meet you..."- Blake said, feeling awkward about the whole situation, and left. Only some minutes later he realized that it was 3:00 PM, which meant he had been knocked out for 2 hours... he somewhat felt bad for seeming ungrateful, but Blake wasn't used to have anyone near his personal space... and so, he returned to his house (formerly, his grandma's, but there was nobody else to claim it)

*And with high school I mean 10th grade.
153111111.title: First day of school

1531111111.content:
Planet Earth, home to some saiyans that were born and raised there as humans. One as such is the saiyan Ryan Kasshi and his brother and sister since their parents are both saiyans raised on planet vegeta. His brother and sister are kizaki and reikumasei and his parents are Kazihiro and Chigumerei Kasshi. He and his family sensed their fellow saiyans die in battle against frieza and their other enemy, but ryan will get revenge for his race.

-“They will pay for killing our friends.”- Ryan said as his power started to show and he entered his super saiyan form with ease.

-"Ryan, we should focus on our training and look out for the children that the parents send to this planet.”- rei said to him as they went back to training and he reverted back to normal

-"Kizaki is with our parents and he is training like we are.”- she said

They went into high-speed combat with close range combat and ryan is learning from her very quickly, but she is slightly faster than him and he is still young. The whole family kept on training till the sun started to set and they went inside to rest and get ready for dinner.

-“Ryan, how are you again?”- kizaki asked

-“19, you are 20 and 21 for rei.”- ryan said

-“Our parents came to earth and saw the natural beauty of the planet so they decide to stay here and raise us.”- he added

They eat an traditional Japanese dinner and their parents are thinking about their friends that died in battle.

-"Tomorrow will be training for super saiyan.”- their father said as they nodded

-"Three children were sent to this planet so we should look out for them and see which ones are friends or enemies.”- their mother said

-"I don’t think so, but I will keep an eye out for them.”- ryan said

The kids went to bed as their parents stayed up late to talk and they were looking at their old armor.

-"Ryan is right about avenging our fallen friends from the war and he will be stronger than his siblings, but time will tell as humans say.” Kazihiro said to his lover

-"Bardock, Kailan, and Yousei were our friends and their children will be great fighters then them; but ryan will be with them.”- Chigumerei said as she hold their old scouters

-"Ryan’s power level is 4,000, his brother is 6,000, and his sister is 8,000; but our power levels are 10,000 and still rising from the recent training.”- he said

-"We met because of our friends and visiting this planet was our last mission before returning back home, but we decided to stay and raised our children here in peace. Peace on this planet will not last forever and we have to fight for it alongside with our kids and others.”- she said as the memories made her cry and he held her close

-“The ones who only knew about our decision would be those who died in the war.”- she added

-“Our friends understood that we loved a good fight, but we were not bloodthirsty like the other saiyans and they wanted us to get away.”- he said trying to cheer her up

-"Ryan has meet with bardock’s son, kakarot and they have been training together in sparring matches.”- he added with a smile

Ryan and his family lives like a normal Japanese family, but they know some Chinese cooking so they have that to change the pace from have Japanese food too much. They live in the state of Missouri and their children were born at St. Luke’s Hospital in Kansas City. Their kids had their tails removed by their parents when they were born to prevent an accident with great ape transformations so they were raised as humans, but their parents taught them about their race as saiyans. Their kids look like their parents and maybe show some signs of the saiyan traits, but they like to test each other.
1531111111.title: Meanwhile, somewhere else...

15311111111.content:
The following day, Blake tried to pretend nothing happened, but now that he met the girl, he noticed her presence in his classes, but decided not to pay further attention, and things were apparently normal until lunch time, and he sat alone in the same place. He had just an apple, and that would have to do, though his thoughts were interrupted by Joana sitting in front of him in the same table. He raised an eyebrow and asked in confusion

-"Wrong table?"-

-"Huh?"- However, Joana got it and replied -"Nope, this is where you sat yesterday..."-

-"Good..."- Blake put his hand in his forehead, as he was having a headache. Which Joana noticed, as well as his pale skin (it was obvious he had a darker tone, I mean, his skin has an unhealthy pale tone...) and the fact that he got a lot of damage with relatively few hits the previous day. She noticed that he was eating an apple, and there was no tray nor anything that indicated he ate anything else.

-"Umm... Blake..."- She said a bit shyly, and Blake stopped, also confused, and after swallowing, he said

-"What is it?"-

-"Aren't you hungry?"-

The question sort of confused Blake even more. He was eating... but he knew that it was rather an excuse of a food... his whole body felt like it was falling apart because of this. His wounds took a lot to heal, he had an extremely low stamina, and a few hits made him spit out blood... Blake sensed in Joana's look that she noticed this...

-"Well... I'm eating right now..."- Blake said, and looked down, he wasn't used t talking to other people very much, and while his interaction with people in school was either superficial (teachers) or hostile (most of male students), he only really talked to his grandma, which died 6 years ago... Blake was pretty much completely alone. And he didn't really want to share his trouble to a girl he just met by merely stopping a bully.

-"You... you don't have enough money, do you?"- Joana hit the nail, and Blake opened his eyes wide for a moment, just to look away, and remained silent, unable to answer, but his eyes were saying that he didn't want to tell anything. She already knew the answer, but wanted to know why, and Blake answered

-"There are many reasons I don't want to explain and you don't want to hear, so, let's leave it like this and pretend this conversation never happened..."-

-"How do you know I don't want to hear them?"-

-"Simple, nobody can be interested in someone they met randomly the day before..."-

-"Uh..."- Joana -"...To be honest I know nobody else too..."- She added

-"Huh? Really? I thought you were some sort of cheerleader or something..."- Bake said

-"Why?"- Joana asked

-"I don't know. I just thought you were one..."- Blake didn't want to tell further, but it is known for most people that usually good-looking girls are either in cheerleading or some sports team...

-"Nope. I'm new here too... and cheerleading is not my thing..."- Joana said, and Blake had practically nothing else to say, she had no other friends either

-"You won't make much friends sitting here..."- Blake said, finishing his apple

-"I don't need many friends, and I already have one..."- She replied with a n.n face, Blake remained silent, again, he didn't know what to do in such a situation. Nobody had called him their friend, and he definitively didn't knew what he should do or say, so, his only option was to stay silent, but after seeing Joana's look, he felt that he needed to say something, and said

-"...I...I really....don't know what to say..."- Blake said apologetically, and Joana smiled, but then, she gave him her tray with her lunch (she hadn't touched her food yet), and Blake stared at her in confusion

-"I can't accept this... I mean... what will you eat then?"-

-"Don't worry. One day without lunch won't kill me..."- She said cheerfully, and Blake ate rather quickly (he was hungry), when he was done she added -"Don't worry. I'll get lunch for you from now on..."-

-"Huh?!"- Blake couldn't understand why Joana was so willing to spend money on food for him. -"...You don't have to..."- He said quietly, and Joana replied

-"I told you. Don't worry..."- The bell rang, and they walked together back to their classroom. Blake noticed that several guys were staring at him as if they wanted to kill him, but again, he was the new guy, so, he guessed it was because of that, and ignored them. The classes went on until the last one, which was sciences, and the teacher assigned homework (Although most of teachers don't assign homework in the first week, and it was somewhat of a non-written rule, sciences teacher bypassed this and assigned homework by the 2nd or 3rd day), which was to be done in pairs. Most of the students were very quick to form their duos, remaining only Blake alone, the teacher noticed this, and walked toward him

'Again... I'm the guy with no team... either this man is going to scold me or tell me to be more social, or worse, to join to an already formed group... dammit....' Blake thought, and the teacher asked

-"Blake? Who are you going to work with?"-

-"Huh?!! I... I-uh.... uhhh..."- Blake scratched the back of his head, and said -"...Myself?"- The teacher shook his head, and sighed, he knew Blake was from a different school, so he was the new guy compared to most of students who came from the same elementary. He also had already noticed Blake being not social at all...

-"Blake... You really need to work on your social skills. You can't always rely on yourself..."- He started lecturing him, while Blake thought 'That's been my life for the last 6 years...'

-"... You need to meet some people, I don't know, make some friends... people you can trust...."- His tone changed from serious to an advising one -"This is usually life's best stage, you have fun, specially with friends, and becomes a time people remembers for the rest of his life..."-

-"Well... Then I guess I'll have to..."- Blake started to say, but was interrupted by Joana, who was next to him, and said

-"Don't worry sir, He'll be working with me..."-

-"HUH?!!"- Blake and the teacher were confused by this, and Joana winked at Blake, then, she said to the teacher

-"I'm sorry for not telling, I was writing down the last notes..."-

-"Uh...Alright... no problem then..."- The teacher was surprised because he hadn't noticed Joana being alone as well, and knew that she actually saved Blake from ending in a random group. He walked back to his desk thinking 'Blake may not be social, but at least he's lucky...'

-"When did I...?"- Blake was about to ask Joana about her sudden decision, she winked at him again, and whispered
