-"I'm afraid can't give you more time... If you're lucky, the next agent wouldn't event check on that, but in the case he or she does, you'd be either expelled or given in adoption..."-

-"Uh... alright..."-

-"That was what I wanted to discuss. You better start looking for someone..."- The principal shook hands with Blake, and he left. First thing he thought was that it was a bit strange that he let him choose someone... Blake would have expected that he brought a couple of friends who were seeking to adopt someone... Well, it wasn't like he had someone willing to help him...

The classes had finished, and Joana greeted him again, she immediately asked about the what did the principal want, and Blake replied that it was just a formality regarding some school papers... however, Joana had learned to see when Blake lied, and also, his vague description actually gave her a hint. It was almost obvious that the fact he had no family didn't go unnoticed... They walked out side the school, and after stopping at a park, Joana said

-"Ok, what was really your visit to the principal about?"-

-"Huh? I've already told you... some papers, stuff... boring stuff..."- Blake replied, but Joana raised an eyebrow, and he knew he had been busted -"If I tell you promise not to go crazy..."- he said, and Joana nodded

-"I'm going to be expelled from in school..."-

-"What?! Why?!"-

-"I can't tell you... but yeah... I have a week, at most..."- Certainly Blake knew he had no chances of getting anyone to help him during the week

-"But you haven't done anything to be expelled!!"-

-"Life is always unfair"- Blake replied, and this also drew Joana's attention, as she couldn't find what Blake really is like.

-"Is it because of you not having a family?"- Joana risked with that move, but the brief widening in Blake's eyes was enough to tell her it was

-"That has nothing to do with it..."- Blake replied

-"You don't have to feel ashamed..."- Joana tried to comfort him

-"It's not like I can do anything about it..."- Blake sighed -"You win. The principal gave me a week to get someone to adopt me as a legal guardian, guess what? NOBODY will help a random guy with no family..."-

Joana was already considering her parents adopting him... money wasn't a worry, and she would actually like Blake living with her, though probably her parents would say no, and it would end up as Blake said. Though she would tell her parents anyway. Blake said goodbye and left on his own. Joana went back to her house, and after her parents greeted her, she told them what happened...

-"Really?"- Joana's mom asked

-"Yeah..."- Joana said

-"What is he going to do about it?"- Joana's mom asked again

-"Little to nothing..."- Joana sighed -"He said he can't do anything because no one will help a random guy with no family..."-

-"Oh..."- Sarah said, and she also caught the hint, however, by her tone, Joana thought it should be better to suggest adopting Blake later, and she left to do her homework. Then Sarah asked

-"So?"-

-"Huh? What?"- John said

-"I saw what Joana wanted to say... she wants us to help Blake..."-

-"Adopting him? But...he... she... they... wouldn't...?"-

-"I don't see anything wrong... anyway, maybe that's what Joana needs to get closer to him..."-

-"But she's an alien!!"-

-"What if Blake in the end doesn't mind?"-

-"I seriously doubt that the first guy Joana likes is going to be the one..."- John said, with his 'scientific' tone

-"Anyway... I'll tell you that things will only happen if Joana wants to. Let's remember that I had practically to force SOMEONE back when we were younger..."- Sarah said

-"Uh, well..."- Then his mind kicked in, and he thought 'This is perfect!! I'll be able to study that guy!!' -"Then I guess I'll have to talk to him, won't I?"-

-"Yup"-

-"Alright"- John now sounded happier, but his wife knew if was his science obsession... he was suggesting the boy was an alien and wouldn't be happy until he proved it scientifically, or he would stop on the matter if the results were negative. Though still, the thought of having a guy that his adopted daughter likes living in the same house bothered his "parental sense" a bit. He also was a bit eager because the results on his DNA analysis weren't ready yet.

He also decided he would tell Joana about it, probably at dinner. He knew already that Blake was stubborn and that he wouldn't accept right away, so probably Joana was the only one able to convince him, as, so far, and by what Joana said, she was the only person that Blake would do something for. Although at least Blake didn't have a romantic feeling in it, he said himself that he couldn't say no all time because Joana was the only person that offered him friendship...

And speaking of Blake, he was very tense, as he didn't know what to do. He got stressed to the point he had to stop working on a computer repair because he couldn't think clearly, and laid on his "bed", which was just a wood piece with a towel on top. Looking at the cracked ceiling, he felt very tired, as always, but also mentally, which was uncommon... Blake eventually fell asleep...
153111111111111111111.title: Blake goes to the principal's office...

choices: Blake's new life at Joana's house... (I'll add on this later)
Something happens before they arrive? (up for anyone to try their own branch)
1531111111111111111111.content:
Joana had to resume her everyday life, and was doing her homework, until she heard someone knocking their door. She opened it and her parents were there

-"Um, Joana... Your father and I have been talking..."- Her mother said

-"Well, we wanted to tell you that we are willing to adopt and help your friend Blake, but you'll have to convince him,,, I doubt he'd accept the offer from us..." Joana's father said, and right when he finished his sentence, Joana hugged him and his wife tightly, he laughed and said "Careful with that strength, young lady..." Joana blushed and apologized, and told them that they were the best parents ever.

Meanwhile...

Blake rested for a while on his wooden bed, but it was too uncomfortable to even sleep. He was used to sleeping in a hammock, that's how his grandmother raised him, but the hammock was in the laundry, Blake then remembered that it should be done already, and so, he went to a nearby laundry. He presented his ticket and the person at the counter brought him his hammock, Blake paid and left, in a slightly happier mood. That hammock was made of silk, and was given to him by his grandma.

Despite Blake's poverty, due to him inheriting his grandma's house, he lived in a decent medium class neighborhood. He thanked God for that, if he lived in a poorer, more dangerous place, he may be dead already. If he hadn't met Joana maybe he would also have succumbed to his disease. He never understood what was wrong with him. He always was weakened, and feeling bad, none of the remedies his grandma knew cured him, but they helped alleviate the symptoms at times.

He passed by a market, and noticed that they sold the same fruits that grew in Joana's yard. They were kinda expensive, 2000 zenny each. He wondered why those fruits made him feel better for a while, and unaware of it, he stared at them for a few minutes, enough for a person ask him if he needed help, snapping Blake out of it, and he replied that he didn't, he was just seeing, he had never seen those fruits. He was surprised when he saw Joana walk there, carrying a basket with some of the fruit. Apparently, she sold some of her fruits periodically to that market for some money. Blake didn't really know what to do, and it was inevitable that he would have to talk to her. Joana greeted him happily

-"Hi..." Blake said in a much less cheered mood.

-"What are you doing here?"-

-"I just passed by, I went to the laundry to pick up this"- Blake showed her his hammock

-"A fishnet?"- Joana was a bit confused

-"...No... It's a hammock... it's what I use to sleep..."- Blake said with a sort of -_-' face

-"People sleep in these?"- Joana had never hard of anything other than beds for sleeping

-"Yeah... my grandma, and by consequence me..."- After that, there was an uncomfortable silence.

-"Hey... what are you going to do about school?"-

-"Honestly, I have no idea, I'm screwed... I'm not gonna go get anyone to adopt me, most likely I'll be robbed of what little I have, like my grandma's house... Nobody adopts a teenager"-

-"Umm... I could help..."-

-"How?!"- Blake was surprised for real

-"My parents told me they were willing to help you"- Joana said, smiling sympathetically

-"Yeah, right, your parents... Wait, what?!"-

-"They are willing to do the adoption so you can keep studying..."-

-"Ugh... I'm gonna hate myself for this, but I think I agree... Studies are my only hope to get out of my miserable life..."- Blake said, feeling unsure about it all -"Hey... It's just paper formalities right? I don't actually have to live there, right?"-

-"We wouldn't mind..."- Joana blushed

-"No... I have been raised to earn my own stuff. Even if I'm well, poor... but that's what I can get, it's the fruit of MY effort, I have electricity, water, and a repaired old computer..."-

-"But you don't have much left for food right?"-

-"I'm fine... I've been like this for 6 years and I'm fine..."-

-"Blake, I will be honest, you look sort of sick... I can almost tell that you need nice foods and a good rest..."-

-"I got the rest part covered..."- Blake signaled his hammock -"The foods one... only if someone buys my soul, but meh, not even the Devil bothers..."- Blake joked.

-"Why don't you give it a try? Stay with me for some weeks and if you don't like it you can go back to your house..."-

-"..."- Blake blushed when Joana said 'stay with me' and was stuttering some attempt of a excuse

-"It's for free and you lose nothing, in fact, let's go already..."- Joana took Blake by the arm and dragged him to her house. Blake couldn't break free from her grip, and neither he could oppose to her walking

-"Hey... My stuff is still at my house..."-

-"We can go get it later today, we can go in my car..."-

-"YOU have a car?"- Blake was again truly surprised, he was used to only have his own feet as transportation. By the way, Joana's car is one of those flying ones, as seen in DBZ.

-"Yeah"- Joana said casually

Blake sighed, he didn't know what did he get himself into. Joana was a bit happy though, even if it was a bit forceful, she got to hold Blake's hand for a considerable time while she walked home. They arrived to her house after who knows how long. Joana's parents were surprised when they saw her bring Blake

'I didn't know she would convince him so fast...' Sarah thought, and giggled mentally, knowing that because Joana liked Blake she would do anything to help him, even by force. She noticed her husband's look, and gave him a glare that said 'Do NOT try to take advantage of this...'

Joana talked to her parents, told them that Blake was here and that he was going to stay with them and that tomorrow they would get the papers done. Blake tried to say no but Joana tightened her grip on his hand, hinting him to shut up, rather painfully. Blake could only sigh in defeat. Joana's parents welcomed him and offered him a room, Joana said they could go for his belongings after eating, he had to accept to be polite, but he felt uncomfortable anyway.

Only he and Joana ate, so, Blake was spared from some awkward moments, and could even relax a bit. He somehow felt a bit safe with Joana, acknowledging that even if she could be a bit forceful, she only wanted to help him. After that, they went on a quick trip to his house for him to pick up his belongings, namely his clothes. He was going to unplug his old computer but Joana giggled and said

-"I can give you a new one. You can leave it here... Anyway, It would take too much space..."-

-"I guess..."- Blake felt again uncomfortable about getting things for free, but he also concluded that it was reasonable, Blake rescued that computer from a junkyard, and it was an over 10 years old model, kinda bulky, maybe heavy too, but neither he or Joana would've had trouble carrying it if it was just for the weight. He was feeling a bit better since he had some of those expensive fruits, and he didn't know that the whole time Joana had been putting his clothes in her car's trunk while day dreaming about hugging Blake and kissing him. She snapped out of it when she noticed Blake brought a chest

-"What's there?"-

-"No idea. All I know is that grandma told me to open it if things got dangerous as in life threatening. I consider this is important for me to keep near at all times, if you don't mind"-

-"It's ok, it fits in the backseat anyway"-

Joana effortlessly put it in her car's backseat and they were ready to go. Blake secured all windows and doors, and felt a bit of nostalgia about leaving the very house in which he lived his whole life. However he kinda thought that his grandma would've liked him to go on a better lifestyle...

*Flashback, 7 years ago, Blake was 9*

Blake helped his grandma to water plants in the backyard. Blake's grandma commented how life could only be changed via hard work, but also that some things are beyond their own control, Blake wondered if that wasn't a contradiction, but his grandma exemplified it with their current situation, they keep the plants alive and in good health performing some work, but, for those plants, it's mere luck, for they can't control their own fate. Blake's grandma said that it was an overly simple way of seeing it, but it was true that some situations were beyond the control of a single person

-"Call it fate, or God helping you but sometimes life will provide you some help. To be always a good person also helps, even if we are poor now, who knows, we may have a better life some time later... At least you..."-

Blake comforted his grandma with a hug, but she said that it was alright, she was aware that she was an old woman, aged 89, and that someday she was going to pass away, she only prayed to God that Blake would be prepared to face life alone, as she was worried about his being an alien, in a world were fear of the unknown was the rule.

-"You must learn to recognize life's subtle ways, you may miss good things"- Blake's grandma later joked about that she couldn't tell Blake that he would get a girlfriend, because of him being well, an alien, but Blake didn't really care, and he said he wasn't going to be with anyone anyway, so he may never reveal his secret. His grandma told him that there is still good people in this world, and that he might actually find the right woman someday. Blake still disregarded that as being unnecessary, and promised to stay forever in celibate, Blake's grandma laughed heartily, and commented that he may just have given Kami-sama a challenge, Blake said he was determined to not surrender...

*End of flashback*

'It seems you won, Kami-sama, wherever you are...' Blake thought, as they went to Joana's house...
1531111111111111111111.title: Back to Joana and her family...

15311111111111111111111.content:
Blake felt a bit intimidated again, he was in a place that was not his home, but he knew he really hadn't much of a choice, he needed the adoption to keep studying, and maybe his health could improve if he stayed there... the question being, for how long? Since Blake is very good at repairing electronic aparatuses, he might get a job under this corporation. He decided to not stress the subject anymore and tried to relax.

Joana kinda knew Blake needed to take a break from tensions and showed him her videogames, she had almost every console from the last 20 years, and a vast collection of games, Blake was impressed, and he particularly liked the older ones. (Insert a Super Nintendo look-alike here, lol). Blake also found a small handheld console that could play most of the games of the other consoles (PSP lookalike) and he liked it very much, Joana noticed this and gifted it to him. He put it in one of his jacket's pockets and played some games on the consoles with Joana. Meanwhile, in John's lab

-"I wonder how she convinced him so fast"- Sarah commented

-"Blake seems a bit thoughtful, maybe he was struck by reality and how bad he had been living... I managed to get some info on him, he spends days without food, and sometimes the most he can eat is an apple or another single small thing. He's got a bit notorious for being exceptional at repairing electronics, and charges very little, they say that he doesn't mean to make the others poorer and thus he gets barely enough to sustain himself... he even fixes things for free for poor people"-

-"Since when can you get info on people?"-

-"It's not that difficult, walk around, do some errands and casually talk to people... Blake does draw some attention because of his health, many have seen him collapse in the sidewalks, or cough some blood. Even an elder woman told me that it was obvious from miles away that he didn't eat enough"-

-"Well at least that chapter should be over. I still wonder... he got better with twice the nutrition dose, right?"- Sarah remembered

-"Yeah, slightly. That almos outright tells us that either he's not human or has a serious mutation... either case maybe he wouldn't mind Joana being an alien after all..."-

-"Mutant alien grandchildren, you just outdid yourself..."- Sarh joked

-"Hey! I didn't even think about that"- John replied, laughing a bit -"The answers will still take 6 more days though..."-

The next day, Joana's parents would show at school and sign the papers making themselves Blake's legal guardians. The principal was genuinely happy about this. However, things weren't going as smoothly in school itself, despite not being anything public, it became known shortly after, and every guy gave death glares to Blake, but since he was feeling a bit better, he was ready to fight back. Strangely, despite Blake never attacked first, and fought as last resort usually, there was still something about fighting that he enjoyed, maybe because it was a test to his skills, or maybe it was the thrill from combat itself. He didn't pay further mind to that, and went on with his day as usual, recess however...

By recess, Blake and Joana sat at their table as usual, but this time they were surrounded by angry guys, all of them shouting that Blake wasn't worth anything, and that they were going to end his misery. Blake told Joana to remain seated, cracked his knuckles, and the fight (more like a one-sided beatdown) began...

Blake was able to send some of the guys flying a short distance with single punches and kicks, and dodged every attack thrown at him, in a matter of minutes, all the angry guys who threatened him were on the floor, writhing in pain. One last guy tried to hit Blake from behind with a steel tube, but Blake punshed him with the back of his hand, without even bothering to turn around.

-"Garbage taken care of..."- Blake said, satisfied. Definitely those fruits were doing something to cure his disease, whatever it was. However it took him a moment to see Joana's genuinely surprised face -"...What?"-

-"Last time you barely fought one of these guys..."-

-"Those fruits of yours are doing their job then"- Blake smiled and gave her a thumbs up, She blushed a bit but gave him a thumbs up as well.

They didn't know that via a security camera that was well hidden, the principal had seen it, and was utterly surprised. The weekly P.E report confirmed tat Blake seemed to be in better health, with a remarkable stamina and all above average stats. 'This guy could be the next olympic star' the PE teacher wrote at the end of his report.

Given the guys' crushing defeat singlehandedly done by Blake, they refrained from further attempts to attack him, and Blake could breathe a sigh of relief, finally, his life was seeming to go forward to a better way. He also inadvertently was spending nearly all of his tme with Joana, which he didn't even mind as they usually talked, played games, or watched tv or movies. Blake stopped to reflect about it a few times but concluded that there was nothing wrong.

3 days have passed... A nearby forest, 4:45 PM

Blake decided to be a bit more productive and bring some food to the house himself. His grandma had taught him that he could survive from nature, and knew most edible plants, berries, roots or fruits, as well as hunting and fishing. Blake could have attempted this earlier in his life but since he was in bad health and these activities were time and energy consuming, he refrained from them. He was determined to bring something good for dinner, and maybe to feel he was paying for himself. Despite his initial worries, Joana's parents were very understanding and demonstrated to be truly nice people, their wealth didn't make them greedy, envious, or hypocrite... Blake appreciated that, the least he wanted was to deal with people who would hate him in secrecy

Meanwhile, somewhere in Japan...

A saiyan pod landed in an isolated farmlad area. A tall muscular saiyan with long hair came out of it, killing people on sight, and stealing the food available. He checked his scouter, looking for something...

-"The power levels here are trash... huh... what do we have here?... 334, 322... bah..."- However the scouter beeped once mor, pointing to the west -"A POWER LEVEL OF 2,000?! 10,000 kilometers away... But, is this reading right? It's probably him, but I wonder, why hasn't he killed the people in this planet as ordered..."- The saiyan flew toward the direction his scouter indicated...

Back to Blake...

Blake decided against hunting but went for fish, he just dove and caught them with his bare hands. He managed to fill the basket he brought. He closed it and dried himself with a towel to later change into his clothes, when suddenly he heard something like a jet plane. He paid it no mind and resumed putting his clothes on and picking up the fish basket, when before him landed a man with a strange armor and a weird monocle. Blake put down the basket, and didn't kow what could such a strange person want...

-"Kakarot?"- The man said

-"I don't speak your language..."- Blake assumed that it was a sort of soldier, but from which place, he noticed that the green monocle beeped and showed some symbols in yellow

-"The power level is 2,000. How is it possible?"-

-"I have no idea what you're talking about but I have no idea what is a kakarot, so, if you excuse me, I have to go..."- Blake picked the basket and turned around, but sensed danger and ducked, dodging a purple energy beam that the strange man shot at him

-"WHAT THE HELL?!!"- Blake noticed the explosion far away, and the man charged and attacked him, Blake however was able to block his punches, and kicked him hard in the stomach, knocking the air out of him temporarily. Taking advantage of this, Blake punched him in the face several times and knocked him off his feet with a kick.

-The man stood up again, and fired several purple energy balls that Blake dodged, and could even deflect one with his hand, and realizing this, he deflected every energy attack the man threw at him. However the man didn't give up and attacked Blake with punches and kicks, managing to land some hits, but Blake caught both of his wrists and hit him in the stomach with his knee, and let him fall to the ground.

-"Ok weirdo, now you better tell me what was the big idea, and how the hell can you fire that..."- Blake stopped in his tracks when he saw the man's tail... a brown furry monkey-like tail... like his own... (currently hidden under clothing). The man used his tail to knock Blake off his feet and got up, flying away quickly. Blake got up and cleaned off the dust off himself, while muttering -"Ok, that was officially weird..."-

Chapter End Note: Yeah this might seem as a disappointment, but I thought that if Raditz were to engage in combat against someone stronger and realize about it early, he would rather flee because he's afraid of death. So, his fight with Blake was rather short. Also, due to the difference in power Raditz would have concluded to not try anything else against Blake until he got reinforcements.
15311111111111111111111.title: Blake's new life at Joana's house...

153111111111111111111111.content:
Blake was certainly impressed by having seen another individual with a tail like his own, and also the strange abilities he demonstrated, such as firing a laser-like beam, or flight. He didn't get to obtain any answers from him though, and decided to pay it no more mind, maybe later he could get to answer his questions, by himself hopefully, if anyone found out his secret he would probably be given to government agencies to study... So, he just headed back to Joana's house with a basket full of fish...

Meanwhile, somewhere in space...

Still in their pods, the saiyan women slept for most of the travel, when the radars beeped, and they got an incoming transmission. The older saiyan woman checked the radar, it indicated that another saiyan pod headed for Earth earlier

-"Zorn* here, do you copy?"- A man's voice spoke via their scouters

-"Yes, loud and clear, what is it?"-

-"We've gotten leaked reports about that planet where you're heading, Earth... both Frieza and the Jigokujin are temptatively targetting it..."-

-"Why?"-

-"Frieza had someone go pick up a saiyan they sent some years before the destruction of our planet... they calculate that the saiyan should have already conquered the planet, but never reported back..."-

-"Who could that be?"-

-"Kakarot..."- Zorn replied

-"Kakarot..."- The saiyan woman repeated

-"What's wrong?"- The saiyan's daughter asked

-"Bardock's younger son..."- The saiyan woman sighed -"Well, at least that's one recognizable face we'll find there..."-

-"However keep in mind that they have sent someone to retrieve Kakarot, no idea who, so you may want to play safe, also, the Jigokujin have different reasons..."- Zorn added -"They located Makotsu in Earth... that could be dangerous... he's Broly's son..."-

-"Yeah we know. His power level is 20,000. He defeated their prince by transforming into a great ape..."-

-"And he beat their p... wait, what? How did you know?"-

-"We sneaked in their home planet and heard the king himself..."-

-"You are one crazy saiyan lady, Sharotto..."-

Sharotto laughed, and said -"Nothing is crazy enough if it gets me to get my son back..."-

-"I can only guess... He'll probably be a great warrior..."- Zorn replied, hesitating to add on to that sentence, as he knew Sharotto was still a bit sensitive on the topic of Kailan's death. After a short uncomfortable silence, Sharotto asked

-"On an unrelated matter, did you manage to contact Turles?"-

-"We arrived too late, the planet was drained dry and there was almost nobody left. We got from a few survivors that Turles obtained a sort of mystical seed that grows into a gigantic tree that gives a fruit, and whoever eats it will experience an immense power boost... I would haven't believed it if I hadn't seen the tree with my own eyes. It's rumored that Turles is preparing to war against Frieza..."-

-"Then we need to contact him as soon as possible. We need to gather all of the saiyans to rebuild our great army and civilization..."-

-"Your son is the last one according to the reports..."-

-"When I find my son I'll let you know so you can send some ship to pick us up..."-

-"Alright... good luck Sharotto, Zorn out..."-

-"Well, it seems we may have some fun before going for Abakku?"-

-"Not really. We're going for Abakku and we're leaving... We have no idea whose side is Kakarot on, so we better avoid him. And Makotsu... if he's like his father, we can't get overconfident... Broly was a monster..."-

-"What if Abakku is also on Frieza's side?"-

-"We will tell him the truth. Frieza does not deserve the loyalty of any saiyan. Thinking about it, we might get Kakarot come with us as well... if he never reported back to Frieza that means he either took the planet for his own and didn't care, or that was he raised by the natives somehow... In any case he's not loyal to Frieza actually"-

-"I wonder how strong is Abakku"-

-"We'll get to find out in 3 more days, now, if you want to be ready, lets just rest until we've arrived..."-

-"Alright"-

Back to Earth, they day went as usual, Blake wouldn't mention his strange encounter with a man who seemed to be like himself. His fishing was a pleasant surprise and Joana gladly helped him cook dinner, Blake stated that he wanted to feel a bit productive since he was getting so much for free...

Later, in John's lab...

John was working on improving technologies for his corporation as usual, unlike others, he did all the scientific work by himself, and had his wife and other staff to take care of the merchandising. However he was still intrigued by Blake's change of health, as he had observed that eating the fruits that grew in his yard seemed to cure his disease. He even had analyzed the fruits, they were worth 2 or 3 days of food for a regular human, thus, they were a cost efficient food for medium class people, or for people who did very intense physical efforts. But Blake did neither, and technically a person shouldn't eat the fruit everyday, or more than once a day... The only one who actually needed such a diet was Joana... He went to his computer, but it told him that the results were about halfway, and it wasn't enough to tell. John was a bit disappointed, his curiosity about what was Joana's species and what was their world or culture like intrigued him everyday since they found her in the spherical space ship.

Along the baby herself, there was a note written in an unknown language, as well as an armor set and an ocular device. John had no idea what could be the device for, but the armor evidenced that the species practiced war or some form of combat. He performed some tests on it, and no weapon was able to damage the armor, and it was extremely light and stretchy. He has also spent some time throughout all these years trying to decipher the alien language.

If Blake would know anything or posess something else, he may be able to finally decipher the alien note and maybe the purpose of the ocular device. John almost wished that Blake was an alien, even though it'd be objetively better that he were just a human, with nothing to hide from the government or others. His wife came to bring him some water to drink, and to hint that he shoudl take a small break, she noticed his thoughtful look

-"You're still going on with the test?"-

-"Of course! I want to know if Blake is one of Joana's species... if he knew something i may e able to decipher more about their race and culture... all we know is that they may be a sort of warrior race, or practiced a form of combat. The ocular device is a total mystery. All I know is that it seems to scan living beings, but the language is extremely complex..."-

-"Let's say Blake is an alien as you say... then. what if he was raised by someone and doesn't know either about his origins..."-

-"He may still posess something to help my research. The fact that Joana arrived with a note and a full armor set, and that nobody ever came back for her may mean that they sent her here for a reason, and the armor may have been for general protection in an unknown world..."-

-"Why would a parent send their child to an unknown world?"-

-"We don't know, there may be infinite reasons, as well as that maybe the concept of family is entirely different in other cultures..."-

-"What about Joana's spaceship?"-

-"It's almost done. But I've been taking breaks because it fatigues both my mind and body to deal with its circuits and internal structure... It amazes me that it seems to be powered by solar energy, and may have potential to travel faster than light..."-

They changed the subject eventually and after some more minutes Sarah left and John resumed his work...

Blake had spent most of his time with Joana in a regular basis and was still largely unaware of any feeling she may have for him, partially because knowing he's something different from regular people, he imagined he better stayed alone, and Joana was the first person to ever be nice to him after his grandma. So, he had no idea that Joana was already considering asking him out, but as she also saw that Blake finally had some rest and could enjoy life a bit, she was unsure about if she should tell him by now. She decided to go with more indirect questions.

From casual talks while playing or hanging out, she got that no, Blake never had any girlfriend, and he wasn't particularly interested, when she asked why, Blake commented that he didn't seem to be the kind of guy girls usually go after, citing that in school, usually the popular sports team guys were the most sought after, and that average people was usually lonely. Joana told him that it was just because some people can be superficial doesn't mean everyone is. She also said that he didn't look bad at all, which made both of them blush and change subject.

And so, things would continue to go on for 3 more days...

*Note: Zorn was an anime-only saiyan who seemed to be King Vegeta's second in command. As an additional note, the solar powering thing for the saiyan pods was made up by me
153111111111111111111111.title: Blake goes back (doesn't tell anyone)

1531111111111111111111111.content:
3 days later... Saturday, 10 AM

John was particularly excited about finally getting to know the results, but the computer revealed that it would take yet about 6 more hours for the results to be concluded. The scientist sighed and decided to go on with his day, as the less he thought about it the faster time would pass for him. Meanwhile, Blake had fallen asleep in Joana's room while doing some homework, and she let him rest in the desk with a pillow for his head. When he woke up...

Blake woke up groggily, but was snapped out of it when he realized he was still in Joana's room, and panicked, however, Joana was already awake and told him to calm down, and brought some hotcakes for breakfast. Blake scratched the back of his head and said

-"These biology homeworks are interesting but can tire the mind... I kinda read more than necessary..."-

Joana noticed that indeed Blake had read up to the first half of the sciences book, and they were still on the first week

-"Hey today is Saturday, No more homework for us!"-

-"Because I did it yesterday... and yours... sort of..."- Blake commented as he noticed that Joana had also done it, she smiled and said that she did it faster because she didn't read any more than necessary.

-"Reading is good. Biology is interesting, unlike math... whoever invented math didn't have any better to do with his life..."-

-"Good thing my father didn't hear that"- Joana giggled

-"It's true, beyond basic math, which is easy, understandable or useful, we go to algebra and calculus, wich are an undecipherable mixture of numbers and letters and teachers expect us to make sense out of it..."-

-"Agreed"-

Joana's parents weren't there, and Blake was the first to notice it after they finished their breakfast and went to the living room to watch some tv (Blake also went for some milk to drink)

-"They went shopping, they go every week to get the basic things, food, soap, that stuff..."-

-"I wouldn't leave my house with a stranger in it"- Blake laughed

-"They really think you're a good guy..."- Joana said, blushing a bit

Joana suggested to play videogames but Blake noticed the news and asked Joana to not change the channel, and both watched

-"For the first time in recorded history, an extraterrestrial object has landed on Earth, with evidence... There were reports about a possible meteorite falling to Japan, and it caused an explosion that desolated a few hundred meters within... The locals had reported that it may be some sort of UFO, but weren't taken seriously, until someone bothered to go investigate... As you are seeing right now, it's a spherical spaceship, apparently for a single individual... now the question is, where is the owner of this ship, and what are their intentions toward Earth and us? More information later, when scientists can tell us more about this strange spaceship..."- The reporter said, he was in the site of the ship's landing, and as he spoke, the ship was carried by machines, presumably to be investigated

'So that's where that mysterious guy came from...' Blake thought

-"A real extraterrestrial ship? whoah..."- Joana commented, and then, there was an uncomfortable silence, both she and Blake thinking 'Act normal, you must not be suspicious of anything specially now' They ignored the rest of the news as they weren't interested and they played videogames, both of them still felt the need to stay in guard.

Some minutes later, with most of the tension by the news gone, Joana was again considering asking Blake out, without revealing her true nature yet of course, as it would be poorly timed with that alien ship incident, but at least Blake knows very well that she didn't come from it. Some indirect approaches seemed to work, as Blake now didn't mind when Joana held his hand temporarily at times, he dismissed it as a casual involuntary thing, but blushed profusely when she had kissed him on the cheek a few times. Joana had done this to try to get Blake more used to it, she knew for sure that Blake was completely unfamiliar with such things. She was too, but Blake wasn't in touch with his instincts while she probably was a bit more.

It was summer, and the weather got hotter as the sun rose, neither Joana or Blake liked those temperatures, and they went back to Joana's room, where she turned on the AC and closed the door (to diminish the loss of cold air)

-"Glorious AC, whoever invented it deserved a real good prize"- Blake commented, enjoying the cold air. Soon after he was again playing videogames with Joana. Neither was fond of going out to parties or similar stuff like typical teenagers, Blake didn't consider he had anything to do there, and Joana, all she would get is annoyance from guys trying to hit on her, and it was the least she wanted when she was feeling she was close to ask Blake out.

After the incident where Blake singlehandedly beat several dozens of bullies/gangster guys, Blake's popularity increased among the average students, and at least they greeted Blake whenever they encountered him, Joana was a bit paranoid about this, fearing another girl may make her move before hre own, specially the cheerleaders or sports girls, who were the most popular and mostly were interested, in Blake's case, as a trophy for being a sort of tough guy.

Blake didn't care either, and he considered the attention a hypocrite thing, and even told Joana "Only you were nice to me when nobody knew or cared about me" She blushed slightly but Blake didn't even notice. Also, ironically now Joana was the one giving death glares to some girls when they were at the cafeteria or in class when Blake wasn't looking.

2 hours later, the room had gotten colder and Joana put her arm around Blake's neck, and commented on that she was feeling a bit cold, Blake remarked that he still preferred the cold, but a bit of warmth felt nice. Joana put her face next to Blake's, which made him blush a bit, and said, almost as if she were thinking out loud rather than really talking

-"Blake... I love you..."-

-"W-WHAT?!"-

Both teens were in a sort of panic, Blake from this sudden revelation, and Joana, snapping herself out of the brief trance she entered in while she was getting close to him. However she also thought that since she's already said it she might as well go on.

-"You're the first and only guy who has been really nice to me... And for some time I have been wanting to do this..."- Joana then kissed Blake on the lips. Blake was totally stunned, and surprised like he had never been in his life. His heart was beating frantically, and his hair rose up slightly for less than a second. After Joana let go of the kiss, Blake had absolutely no idea what to do or say, it felt unreal...

However, Blake was reminded by his sense of danger that he shouldn't go further with this, as his secret would be in danger... Joana herself was also a bit worried, but trusted Blake enough. He was scratching the back of his head and said in a nervous tone

-"W-well... I have never had a girlfriend before, so I don't really know what to do or say..."-

-"Can I take that as an affirmation that I'm your girlfriend now?"-

Blake blushed more as he realized that his wording had another interpretation, but at the same time, it was like saying yes, Joana playfully licked his cheek, and took Blake's jacket off

-"Hey..."- Blake was going to complain about that but he noticed Joana's puppy eyed look, he had no real idea about any of this and decided he may as well just go along, but couldn't stop feeling nervous. Joana took her own blouse off, and Blake kind of felt he had to take his shirt off, and as soon as he did, Joana playfully knocked him down on the bed (they had been sitting on it). All these new feelings and the overall unreal feeling of the situation made Blake temporarily forget about his secret, but when Joana reached to take off his jeans, both stopped in their tracks...

Blake kept his tail wrapped in a manner similar to a belt, buthe hid it usually under clothes... and when both Joana and Blake stopped in their tracks was because Joana accidentally touched it. Both had a sort of poker face which Blake quickly broke, saying no words, putting his shirt and jacket back on, and rushed to his room to pack his things as quickly as possible. Joana sat there a bit stunned for some seconds, she managed to feel and see a bit, and she was sure Blake was hiding a tail like hers all along. Realizing that Blake had rushed out presumably to leave, she also ran as fast as she could, Blake was already getting out of his room, with a suitcase

-"You saw nothing... Thank you for everything though..."- Blake tried to run but Joana put her hand on his shoulder

-"Blake... why didn't you...?"-

Blake realized that even if he ran he would be screwed, and sighed

-"How was I supposed to tell you... It's not like I could go 'Oh hi Joana... guess what? I'M A FREAKING MUTANT OR SOMETHING' "- Blake sounded a bit exasperated, and since it made no sense anymore, unwrapped his tail -"This is who I am, mutant, or something... Now, you can go tell someone to take me to do weird experiments or me or who knows what..."-

Joana felt a bit saddened, but understood Blake's feelings and fears, and saying no words, unwraped her tail

-"The hell?"- Was all Blake could say

15311111111111111111111111.content:
In the morning, ryan was up early training on his own when he felt a power level in japan that landed on earth.

-“That is saiyan’s power level and a weak one at that. There is another two there, but they are younger than me.”- he said standing up

Ryan left to get breakfast ready so his parents wouldn’t have to do it have to do it when they get up and his siblings came into the kitchen already wearing their training clothes.

-“You felt that too?”- he asked his brother and sister who nodded in return

-“Yeah, seems like there will be trouble in Japan and most likely Goku would be the target.” Rei said

-“What about Piccolo?”- kizaki asked

Ryan noticed the said demon was meditating during the tournaments before it was his chance to fight. They have each other’s respect as a warrior and ryan gave him a challenge.

-“First target and has to help goku with the trouble.”- ryan said

-“Ryan should go help goku and piccolo while we are still training and they know you best since you spend time training with them more than with family.”- rei said as their brother nodded

Outside of family training, ryan has been keeping his power level near a normal constant level; but his power steady increase during the sparring matches with goku and the same for his control with meditation during his time with piccolo.

-“If I fly fast enough and they couldn’t see me, then I should be there in about 3 days or less.”- ryan said

Their parents who are listening to them talk about ryan going to help goku and piccolo smiled before walking into the kitchen.

-“Thank you dear, for starting breakfast.”- Their mother said before taking over for ryan

-“As parents we should support our kids and agree with them despite our better judgment.”- their father said with a smile

They had breakfast so ryan had something to eat kept his mind focused on the task at hand. He kept the weighted clothes he used for the mornings training and his eyes narrowed thinking about something.

-“You will have to reappear soon to friends because the peace on this planet is about to end.”- ryan said as the parents nodded knowing what he meant

-“Ryan, you may be the strongest between you and your siblings; but they have more training than you and more control. You will help your fellow fighters, but remember not to use any more than 10,000. You still need to work on some of your control and maybe you will be needed here in the future.”- his mother said as he nodded

-“Yes, I understand.”- he said before leaving through the mountains and flying high enough in the sky

Ryan jet over to help his friends in Japan and fight the weak saiyan that started causing trouble over there. He started going full speed, which made a sonic boom that will lessen his time to maybe about two days. He began making a plan for when he met up with his sparring partners and he started to think about a rivalry with krillin. Something about him just made him want to mess with him about certain things.

~No more than 10,000 power level worth of juice.~ ryan thought as he focused on the power levels of the saiyan, the two younger ones, goku, and piccolo

-“I have to hold back a lot till things start to get really interesting.”- he said to himself as he went a little faster

He kept a mental list of where the power levels are as he head straight for goku and piccolo.

-“Fighting someone else instead of family for a change has me interested and a test for my control, but I bet my parents will have their senses trained on me when I power up some.”- he added as an after thought

With the speed, he was going at people would have thought he was superman or the flash if he was running on the ground. He was using about half of his limited power before he started to slow down as he saw two people flying in the direction of where the saiyan power level is and he sensed another one next to him meaning something happened while he busy with his family.

-“Hey Goku, Piccolo.”- ryan called out to them when he got close enough for them to hear him

They look to see their favorite sparring partner flying towards them at breakneck speed.

-“So why are you following us.”- piccolo asked with an amused smile

-“I felt a power level and I was bored this morning so I came to help.”- ryan said deadpanned

-“A person called himself my brother has my son and piccolo wanted to help.”- Goku said smiling while said demon lost his smirk with a frown

Ryan chuckled as he shook his head before turning serious.

-“He will pay for taking gohan and I’m his god brother/god father.”- ryan said as they nodded before flying to meet with the saiyan

-“Does the person has a name?”- ryan asked

-“He said his name was Raditz.”- piccolo said as ryan was laughing

-“I’ll call him Radish.”- ryan said as goku was laughing at the joke

-“It does sound like Radish.”- goku added chuckling

Piccolo just shook his head with a smirk as they started to plan for the fight and ryan will be backup for them.
15311111111111111111111111.title: 3 days earlier, somewhere else...

153111111111111111111111112.content:
3 days later, back with Blake and Joana...

Joana had just unwrapped her tail, revealing she had one just like Blake

-"The hell? How do you...?"-

-"My parents said I came from space... and well, that means you probably did as well..."- Joana commented

Blake had a brief flashback, when he was 5 years old, he asked his grandma where did he come from, and where were his parents. Blake's grandma answred that he 'came from the stars' and that she doesn't know where his parents were. At that time, Blake dismissed her statement as a poetic embellishment, but now, he noticed that very subtly she told him the truth...

-"I always thought I was a simple mutant, since I have been also sick most of my life..."-

-"I have no idea about that, maybe my father knows..."-

-"WHAT?! YOU CAN'T TELL YOUR F... oh right, you're alien too..."- Blake had been quick to overreact, he was absolutely not used to anyone knowing his true nature, and finding he was an alien was already shocking enough. -"So I bet you were keeping your secret for the same reason as I kept mine?"- Joana nodded

-"Well. I don't mean to sound like a jerk but it's nice not to be alone in this world..."- Blake looked down as he spoke. He also had no idea what to do or say about what was going to happen before this revelation, and he decided to not say anything about it. Both Joana and Blake had many questions but they realized that both of them knew about the same and none had answers for their questions. Blake still showed concern, and Joana hugged him, saying

-"Don't worry, my parents won't let anyone else know. You're safe here..."-

After that, they went back to Joana's room and played videogames, Joana had observed that doing that helped Blake to relax. After about half an hour, Joana's parents arrived from shopping, and they went to help accomodate the stuff. After that was done, Joana, dragging a bit Blake by the hand, went to his father's lab, where he went to check on his work...

John was a bit impatient to see the results of the blood analysis, and the computer was doing the final processes, when he heard the door open

-"Dad... there is something we must talk to you about..."- Joana spoke

John noticed Blake being dragged by her and wondered what could it be, when his computer began to beep, still, not paying attention to the machine, he saw Joana telling Blake something, and he could barely believe what he saw, Blake revealed he was hiding a tail just like Joana's, he then turned to his computer screen and read

Results 100% positive. The subject Blake is a male specimen belonging to the same unidentified species as Joana

-"Now this explains some things..."- John commented, now understanding why Blake had distrusted them. Now he knew for sure that Blake's previously bad health was the result of being unfed by human standards, which was much worse for an alien like Joana, as they require a larger amount of food to stay healthy. He commented about this to Blake

-"Who would've said it... I needed more food... hey, how come she eats the same food as a human and she's healthy?"-

-"The fruits she and you have enjoyed are worth about 2 full meals. Eating them before the 'official' meals enables her to only eat normal amounts of food to keep appearances"-

-"Alright..."-

-"Well, Blake, I will admit I had suspected you may be an alien due to your refusal to medical attention or blood tests... It intrigues me, now it's 2 aliens who were sent here as babies, why? Do you by any chance know anything?"-

-"I didn't even know I was an alien until Joana told me"- Blake said with a discrete sweatdrop in the back of his head

John stood up and walked, indicating Blake and Joana to follow him, he showed them a small spherical thing

-"This is the spaceship where Joana arrived. I have been checking it but the repairs have been merely superficial, it appears that it's still fully functional, yet, replicating its engineering has been overly difficult. It also included a set of armor and a note in an undecipherable language"- John showed them the things as he spoke -"All I can infer from these high technology armors is that your species practices a form of combat or war... Blake, don't you posess any object related to these things?"-

-"I was never told anythng beyond that my grandma found me... wait... THE CHEST..."- Blake ran to his room, Joana and her father followed him. Blake had been given a key, which he kept atatched to a silver chain he wore around his neck. Blake usually hid it under his shirt, thus, never had anyone noticed it. Blake took a deep breath and opened the chest... It contained a different loooking armor set, which consisted of a black torso armor with a golden insignia on the left side, deep red shoulder guards and lateral thigh guards, deep red fingerless gloves that also cover the forearms, a black full body jumpsuit, black boots with deep red tips, and a strange sort of technological monocle device which Blake could not understand what was for.

-"Well, this confirms that your species at least intended to give you this to defend yourselves maybe? I have performed tests on Joana's armor, no weapon on Earth can damage them. So it's possible that their warriors faced superior enemies, ether in raw strength or technology... As for the ocular device, all I know is that it seems to scan living beings, but beyond that, I have no idea myself, I would be able to tell if I could decipher their language..."-

Blake also found 2 papers with notes, one being written in an alien language, and the other one said

"Blake... If you have opened this chest to see its contets, it's possible you are further investigating on your origins, or as I had told you, your life is in danger. Either case, here is, your parents packed this armor with you when you landed on this world, as well as a strange thing to wear on the eye, there's also a note written in their language. I'm sorry I can't tell you more. I can't take this to anyone to investigate. I hope you can find someone kind enough to help you, and try to learn what were these things for and maybe decipher what your parents wrote for you... I also apologize, maybe I should have told you more about your true origins. I live with no regrets about you though, I hope you can live on to become whatever you want. May God protect you, my son. If I see your parents, I'll thank them for letting me take care of the most beautiful baby I ever met"

Irma O., September 16, 1997

Blake's hands trembled -"She... she wrote this... the day before she passed away..."- His voice faltered, he couldn't help feel his eyes forming tears, he looked away. Joana hugged him, and John said

-"I... I am sorry... I had no idea about the implications for you about finding these things..."-

-"It's ok... I was going to find this one day anyway..."- Blake said after regaining some composure -"Those are the last words of the only person who took care of me, so, you can understand why I don't feel all too well..."- Blake took another deep breath

-"If you don't mind, I could use this note to complement the one foudn with Joana, maybe with these 2 I can decipher their full alphabet... also... where's your spaceship?"-

-"I was never told about it, thinking about it, maybe it's still hidden in my house..."-

-"We can later investigate about it. Hey, umm, I know that Joana is well above human capabilities, but, what about you? From a biological standpoint I'd say you as a male should be stronger but, it's another species, and for different evolutive reasons maybe only one gender does the fighting..."-

-"I'm up to whatever challenge..."- Blake said and went to his room's bathroom, a few minute slater he came out of it, fully dressed with the armor, with the exception of the ocular device.

-"So this is what your people may have looked like... yeah it seems to be something suited for a war, but why?"- John wondered -"Anyway, let's go to the lab to perform physical tests on both of you..."- Johnwas saying when a powerful sonic boom interrupted him, and they all ran outside and saw 2 spherical spaceships traveling through the sky, falling toward the Earth like meteors. These ships were like Joana's...

-"I won't stop you, but be careful, both of you... Joana, you may want to put on your armor suit as well..."- He said, and Blake started running in the direction for which the ships headed. Joana would take a few minutes to also put the armor on and run, following Blake, who stopped when the ships made an impact, Joana caught up to him while he waited for the explosion to clear.

-"I don't know what we are going to find, so, be ready for anything, the expected, the unexpected... who knows..."- Blake said, and begain walking toward the crater that was a few hundred meters ahead.

Meanwhile... The 2 saiyan women came out of her spacepods, looking around

-"Well, with the exception of our landing place, it seems this planet hasn't sustained any major damage... so, Kakarot did not conquer this world after all..."- Sharotto commented

-"Why did we land here though?"-

-"I found 2 power levels that may belong to Abakku, now, let's look for him..."- Sharotto said as she noticed a silhouette from afar, she pushed her scouter's button

-"The power level is 2,000... could he be?"-
153111111111111111111111112.title: The truth is revealed

1531111111111111111111111121.content:
-"The power level is 2,000... could he be?"- Sharotto wondered, as she noticed the individual was heading for them

-"2,000? That's pathethic for a high class warrior!"-

-"This planet seems to be fairly peaceful, and we didn't send him here to fight anyway, it's understandable his power may not have developed as much as ours. What mattered back then was that he would be safe until the day we could come back for him..."-

-"Let me take care of this..."- Sharotto's daughter said, and walked to meet the unknown individual, upon finally getting to a closer distance, she could see him -"Well, well, well, it seems we didn't have to bother finding you..."-

Blake and Joana were staring at the people who came out of the pods, but only Blake advanced, telling Joana to stay back until he knew for sure things were ok. Only one of them was heading toward them, and as Blake got closer and could observe, was a woman, 18 - 20 years looking, with waist length smooth but sorta wavy/spiky black hair. She wore an armor similar to Blake's, but her jumpsuit lacked sleeves, and her armor lacked the shoulder guards, having straps instead, her thigh guards were sky blue, as well as her fingerless gloves, and the tip of her boots. Differently from Blake, she had knee and ankle guards (black with parts in sky blue). She also wore a blue scouter and had her tail wrapped around her waist, although Blake didn't notice this last thing.

-"Who are you?"- Blake asked

-"You're using our armor, and you still ask me who I am? I am a Saiyan warrior, sent here to bring you back to our people..."-

-"What?!"-

-"You were sent here to be safe until we could come back for you..."-

-"Safe from what?"-

The young female saiyan sighed -"Our planet was destroyed by a tyrant, the saiyan children were scattered across the universe to be retrieved later, and you're the last one on the list... we will rebuild our civilization and our army to get our evenge on that tyrant..."-

-"Sorry to disappoint you but I'm not interested on fighting a war..."-

-"What?! You dare to turn your back to your people?"- The female saiyan unwrapped her tail, showing it to Blake, who hadn't really noticed it yet

-"One thing is for sure. I'm not going anywhere..."-

-"You little... You're coming with us you like it or not!!"- With that, the women charged at him, throwing a punch that Blake dodged swiftly. Blake stood in a fighting stance and the female saiyan laughed as her scouter beeped

-"Heh, your power level is just 2,000... Let's see what you can do with that..."- She attacked him again, and this time Blake couldn't even see her coming, apparently she landed several punches but Blake never saw them, and fell to his knees in pain

-"I'll let you know that my own power level is of 9,000. Make of that what you want..."-

Now Blake got what were those eye things for, but even if he tried to use them he didn't understand the language. He decided not to be scared by the saiyan's boasting either, and focused into the fight. The siayan charged at him again, and this time Blake could barely dodge, and landed a heavy ounch to her stomach, taking advantage, he proceeded to punch her in the face twice in rapid succession, but failed to deliver additional hits as she caught both of his wrists

-"That hurt a bit... Not bad for such low power..."- The saiyan taunted him, and kneed him in the stomach, followed by an elbow hit on the back, Blake fell to the ground, but rolled away and got up. The hits he took were very strong, but he could feel that the armor was doing its job. He had been taught by his grandma to fight in self defense, and to be able to defeat people stronger than himself... It was time to put that training to the test like never before.

Blake waited again for the female saiyan to charge at him, but this time, she disappeared, and before he could react, she was behind him and piut her arm around his neck, only with enough force to prevent him from breaking free

-"Poor little Abakku, can't you beat a saiyan girl?"- She tightened a bit her grip on Blake's neck

-"I am not the guy you're looking for... My name is Blake"-

-"Abakku is your REAL name, you know, the name your REAL parents gave you..."- The female saiyan was going to say more but noticed Blake had gotten a grip on her tail, and was squeezing it

-"Oh, you know of our weakpoint? Sorry to inform you that such cheap trick doesn't work on trained warriors..."- Blake pulled drastically at her tail, causing her a temporary sharp pain, enough to break free and regain his breath. this time, Blake charged at her as she charged at him, Blake managed to land an elbow hit to he back of her neck, but it barely did any damage. Also, despite recently having her tail pulled, the saiyan did not wrap it around her waist, as a sign of arrogance.

Blake attacked her yet again, but she dodhed every single punch and kick Blake threw, and she seemed to be doing so effortlessly, with a swift kick, she knocked Blake off his feet and stood near him with her arms crossed

-"You'd need at least a decade of full training to catch up to me"- She put one of her foot on Blake's chest, but was only applying enough pressure to prevent his movement. She noticed Blake grabbed her tail again, she huffed in annoyance, increased the pressure of her foot on him and added -"Did you know that pulling at your big sister's tail is rude?"-

Blake was enduring the pain but when the saiyan said she was his sister, the shock made him let go of her tail -"You have to be kidding me... ugh..."- The female saiyan lifted Blake up, again, having one of her arms surround his neck, this time, Blake was facing her

-"That's right little Abakku... I am your big sister, Satomo"- She spoke softly, yet with a sadistic tone, and tightened the pressure on Blake's neck -"What's wrong? Can't you take a hug from your sister, huh?"- The increase in pressure had Blake in pain but unlike most people he wasn't screaming, although he grunted from it. However, Joana, who had been watching, had enough, and dashed at great speed, punching Satomo while she wasn't paying attention, allowing Blake to break free, and stood by his side.

Satomo looked confused when she looked at Joana, she was too wearing a saiyan armor, hers being black like Blake's, with ochre shoulder guards as well as lateral thigh guards, also with a pink jumpsuit. Unlike Blake or Satomo, Joana had the more typical white gloves, but also had black wrist guards. And like satomo, in addition to boots she had ankle and knee guards. Like Blake, she wasn't wearing a scouter.

-"What do we have here? Another saiyan? The list said Abakku was the last one..."- Then she pushed the button of her scouter -"The power level is 1,900... bah, not bad, but not enough to scare me..."- Satomo observed Joana helping Blake to stand up, and both assumed a fighting stance against her, she laughed and said that she had no problem fighting the 2 of them at once, and even commented she was over twice as strong as both of them together.

Blake and Joana waited for Satomo to charge at them, but she was too fast and hit both of them in the stomach and in the back before they could even see it coming, and proceeded to kick Joana in the back and stomp on her, Blake got angered by this and punched Satomo hard in the face before frantically punching and kicking her, sending her a few meters a way from the finishing kick.

-"I hadn't seen that strength yet... Oh I see it... You've grown so fast little brother"- Satomo faked crying in a mocking manner, and merely cleaned the dust off herself. She dodged another kick from Blake but failed to notice Joana behind her, who landed a strong kick to the back of her neck. Satomo stood up and seemed to have gotten angrier, punching Joana in the stomach with great strength, letting her fall to the ground while she writhed in pain, and went for Blake

-"You just saw what happened to your girlfriend, do you want to suffer it yourself?"-

Blake's answer was repeated strong punches and kicks on Satomo, but she wasn't even flinching -"I'm using my full potential, I had been holding back but got bored..."- She said casually as she yawned -"Done?"- She asked when Blake stopped his attacks and was regaining his breath -"Good"- She appeared behind him and kicked him with great force, sending Blake flying some meters away. When he tried to stand up, Satomo stomped on his back

-"You got it? You're coming with us you want it or not. At least your girlfriend is gonna be with you as well, so, what worries you?"-

Before either Satomo could keep on teasing or Blake answered, Joana dashed and kicked Satomo in the stomach, and angrily punched her repeatedly in the face, though Satomo managed to dash away from her, and checked her scouter, which beeped

-"A power level of 3,000... that's better... Shameful that my brother is weaker than his girl..."- She fought the angered Joana without much effort, her unpredictability meant that she could land some hits. Meanwhile, Blake stood up and joined the fight. She was dodging and blocking their attacks at once still without much effort, and decided to finish once and for all, with a kick to the back of Joana's neck, she was knocked out, and after several punches and kicks to Blake, the pain prevented him from moving, and Satomo had Blake's head against her chest while her arm pinned his neck
1531111111111111111111111121.title: The encounter (Part 1)

15311111111111111111111111211.content:
Sharotto had been watching them from a distance, she sighed when she noticed that Satomo began to fight Blake, knowing well that the difference between the 2 was too much. She decided to let her go on until she seemed to be done or before she did any serious damage. She was, however, surprised to find another saiyan along Blake. She didn't get to see much of her as Satomo did short work of both, but she noticed the female's saiyan increase from 1,900 to 3,000, and was able to infer that she was trying to protect Blake.

Meanwhile, Satomo had knocked Joana unconscious and had her arm around Blake's neck, tightening her grip a bit to prove her point. While Blake was average/tall (180 cm), Satomo was a head taller than him, and when she was keeping him in a lock this size difference made itself more obvious. She was laughing as Blake struggled to break free

-"It seems nobody will save you this time little brother... But keep figting, it's the saiyan spirit"- She said in a less mocking tone, and had to release Blake to block an incoming punch from Joana -"You just don't give up, do you?"-

Blake fell to the ground and was catching his breath while Joana was attempting to attack Satomo -"Who do you think you are to come here and attack us?!!"- Joana shouted angrily while Satomo dodged every punch and kick she threw

-"Oh, you don't know? I am your boyfriend's big sister"- Satomo laughed, after which she punched Joana in the face and the stomach, but before she hit her again, Blake caught Satomo's fist -"Please, are you seriously going to let yourself be harmed for a mere low class saiyan? There are more and better females among our army..."-

Blake's inability to damage her seriously, coupled with the way she was treating him and Joana, specially Joana, angered Blake beyond ordinary rage. And now that Satomo was enjoying herself while she was punching Joana, it was the last straw. Blake growled in anger and he began to glow in a golden aura, his pupils and irises stopped being visible, his muscles grew and tightened somewhat, his hair straightened and looked reddish (due to the reflection of the aura).

Satomo noticed the change but was confused by it, she had never known of such an ability among saiyans, Blake's hand had still caught her fist and he was increasing the force of his grip, she managed to break free and dashed backwards a short distance, her scouter beeping frantically

-"What is this?! His power..."- She gasped -"4,000...? It's increasing more?!!"- Her scouter indicated that Blake's power was increasing at a fast rate. when he surpassed 10,000, she was genuinely surprised, but she couldn't believe that it was still increasing, Blake was growling in rage, his aura had grown from a small glow to a greater, proper aura. When his power finally stopped increasing, Satomo's scouter showed that the reading was 60,000.

-"60,000?!! That's absurd!! What kind of form is that?!"- Satomo was interrupted by a powerful punch from the now really angered Blake, which sent her flying against a large dead tree. Sharotto was near her and walked toward her

-"It seems you really did it..."-

-"What?!! How could I know he had that weird power...thing, technique, or whatever the hell that was?!"-

-"Your father had once told me that there may be other ways, even for us..."-

*Flashback*

During one of the battles in the planets that surrounded the Jigokujin home planet and supplied it with resources, Kailan had managed to increase his power from 11,200 to 32,000 temporarily, he was angered when Sharotto got seriously wounded by elite Jigokujin warriors. His aura was still blueish but id had a fiercer appearance and seemed more erratic, also, Kailan ended up exhausted after that short burst of power, and barely managed to make it back to one of the occupied cities. After recovery, Kailan commented to her that maybe there was a way to increase the saiyan power without a full moon, but he would need more time to let alone investigate into it, and more to master whatever he found.

-"Heh, maybe the legendary super saiyan was actually something like this, and not a great ape as was commonly believed..."-

-"Well, some say that guy Broly is the legendary super saiyan, he changes his aura to golden and has immense power, but also becomes even crazier"-

-"Yeah it could be that he's indeed special, but who says we other saiyans can't get a similar power increase? It may eben be a revolutionary discovery if saiyans no longer depended on moons for guaranteed victories"-

Sharotto had dismissed her husband's thoughts as crazy theories. But she also knew he would insist on proving them and find some way to do so. Saiyan life was all about working full time, conquering planets, exterminating civilizations, and such, so, even the lowest ranked saiyan warriors had a rather busy life.

*End of Flashback*

-"Now that I remember... Abakku's form looks like Broly's when he went total berserk... Be careful"- Unlike Satomo, Sharotto had not checked Blake's power level and thought he was at most getting closer to his sister's.

-"Heh, this just got more interesting"- Satomo flew toward Blake, and tried to punch and kick him several times but Blake dodged them all, and threw a barrage of punches and finished the combo with a kick, Sharotto's scouter beeped and was also surprised when she saw the reading. She ran toward her daughter, finding her laying on the ground, with some injuries although her armor was still intact

-"Satomo, are you stupid? He has a power of 60,000!!"-

Satomo merely laughed and spat a bit of blood, wiping her mouth afterwards -"Heh, a power of 60,000 is still not enough to scare me mom..."- Satomo smiled as she got up, but was immediately attacked by Blake, who punched her in the stomach and sent her flying a few dozen meters away, he ran after her, but Sharotto intercepted him, saying -"Abakku that's enough"- Blake merely pushed her aside and went after Satomo, repeatedly punching and kicking her, until she fired energy spheres at him, though they didn't really damage him, they bought her just enough time to fly. Blake jumped and managed to reach her, but she used an energy beam to push him away. Blake still managed to get a grip on her tail and was hanging from there. (Blake can't fly... yet)

Satomo ignored the annoying feeling and created a white energy ball which she threw upward high into the sky, then she said

-"You're gonna regret to be pulling at my tail little brother..."-

The energy ball exploded with a blinding light, and afterwards, a shining sphere remained in the sky

-"An artificial sun?"-

-"An artificial MOON dumb little brother... and speaking of little..."- Satomo stared at the fake moon, and felt her heart beating harder and faster, her canines grew a bit, her eyes went blank, and then her face started to transform into something inhuman and monstrous in aspect. Her eyes became red, her ears became pointy, her body got covered in hair, and she started to grow massively while she roared like a beast. Blake had never imagined such a thing was possible. Satomo laughed, her voice boomed, and was slightly deeper

-"Now, where was I?"- Satomo observed that while she was floating in the air, Blake was still holding onto her tail, which now was about as thick as him and a lot longer -"That's almost cute... BUT I still have to teach you a lesson"- With a swing of her tail, Blake was sent flying with tremendous force, falling hard against the ground -"Aww, you can't even fly?"- Satomoi landed on the ground, causing a small quake

Sharotto knew what her daughter was going to do, and there was no stopping her by that point. And allowing herself to turn into a great ape wasn't going to help much, so, she merely looked away, her scouter still informing her about the energy mass floating in the sky. Even destroying that artificial moon wouldn't have an immediate effect.

Back to the fight, Blake stood quickly back up, and thought that even if that form was big and scary, he still had a greater power he had never felt before, and maybe the size and speed were his advantages. He dashed toward Satomo and when he got slightly past her, he jumped, and gave a powerful kick to the back of her neck, but not only he didn't do any significant damage, he was caught in Satomo's hand. Blake struggled and managed to break free quickly, but, being unable to fly, found himself falling, until he suddenly stopped... Satomo had caught him with her tail, which wrapped itself more around Blake, preventing him from moving.

-"I couldn't let my little brother fall. Isn't it nice to be saved by your sister?"- Satomo laughed as Blake was struggling to break free. Despite being trained to resist the squeezing and pulling of her tail, it was stilla a fairly sensitive part for any saiyan, and Blake's struggles were tickling it. Satomo suppressed her laughter but couldn't avoid feeling the tickling, and eventually was forced to release Blake.

Blake dashed toward her and jumped, attempting to kick her in the stomach, and succeeded somewhat, Satomo doubled in pain, and Blake knew this was his chance, he focused on his fists, he dashed toward her and jumped, punching her in the face twice with all his strength. Satomo indeed felt dizzy and fell back, but wasn't quite knocked out yet...
15311111111111111111111111211.title: The encounter (Part 2)

153111111111111111111111112111.content:
Note: I forgot to add in the previous chapter, Satomo gave her scouter to her mother before rushing to fight Blake again and before transforming into a great ape.

Blake was catching his breath as he saw Satomo falling, seemingly defeated, whatever he was using was draining him, but due to his grandma teaching him to fight while conserving energy (to make up for his usually sick/weakened state), he had been able to keep it this long. However Satomo quickly stood back up and laughed

-"Well, I did feel those hits... But it seems it was all you got..."- Seeing Blake's shocked look -"What? You thought I only increased in size with this form?"- Satomo laughed and then added -"Any Saiyan's power increases by ten upon transforming into a great ape..."-

Blake couldn't believe it... He was expecting that giant ape form to be all about brute strength and being slow, but if what she said was true, not only she was stronger but also faster and more resistant. He gulped, but resumed his fighting stance, he knew that if he didn't stop her now, there was nobody left on Earth who could even stand a chance. He dashed toward her to try to attack her again, but she swiftly dodged him, and kicked him upward, high into the air, and she caught him with her hand, squeezing him.

-"Stupid little brother... Even if by a rare chance you could surpass my power in normal form, there was no way you could surpass the true power of a saiyan"- Despite being squeezed, Blake wasn't suffering much more damage, and Satomo angrily threw him to the ground and was about to stomp on him. Instead, something attacked her, pushing her away...

Blake had curled up in fetal position as a reflex to the incoming stomp from Satomo, but after a few tense seconds he was surprised nothing happened, and head roaring. He could barely believe it... Joana had transformed into a similar giant ape and was fighting her.

-"What... THE HELL?! How did she do that?!!"- Blake thought out loud, and felt a bit more intimidated. He could observe that unlike Satomo, Joana seemed to have gone full berserk and was acting more like a wild beast, something even Satomo mocked

-"Oh, come on, really? A first time transformation? And I was worried for a moment... I forgot you also had still your tails..."- Satomo saw Blake, who was running away from her but also from Joana 'He must have realized she lost her consciousness.' And smiled, thinking that now there was an opportunity to use her against Blake. Joana attempted to punch and bite Satomo, but the more experienced saiyan could dodge all of the attacks, and with a kick she knocked Joana off her feet.

The tremor from her fall also knocked Blake off his feet, and he fell near one of Joana's arms. The fall made him hit his head somewhat hard, which stunned him for a few seconds, then he heard a growl, and noticed Joana looking at him. 'Now, let's see... my only friend asked me out... I find out I'm an alien, and she too! Also I apparently found or was found myself by my older sister... who wants to force me to go out of this world, even going as far as to transform herself into a 100 foot tall giant ape... AND for unknown reasons... now my girlfriend has turned into a similar monster, but lost self-control, and right now is looking at me, maybe I look like a snack... Nope, THIS IS NOT MY FREAKING DAY!! GOD, WHEREVER YOU ARE, I'LL MAKE YOU PAY FOR THIS!!' Blake thought, and started to run like hell, but despite his effort he was caught in her hand right before he escaped 'For a beast she did anticipate my movements more than I anticipated myself... seriously, this is the worst day ever...'
