Since Satomo was conscious of her acts, there was no further danger in struggling or attacking her, but, seeing that Joana may be about animal level intelligence as of now, depite his heart beating hard and his brain going in panic mode, he remained still, he knew very well that a drastic move or an attempt to attack any animal would only trigger attack/self defense responses, which would be pretty nasty coming from a 100 foot tall ape of sorts...

Meanwhile, Sharotto flew up to Satomo's head level -"Now you really did overdo it..."-

-"Meh, don't worry so much mom, If she tries to eat him I can stop her... In the mean time, this is gonna be fun. His own girlfriend will do the damage from now on"-

-"I don't EVER recall educating you with such a dark sense of humor..."- Sharotto complained, with her arms crossed.

-"You know, you can also go great ape and stop her yourself..."-

-"I am NOT going to transform into a great ape... on this planet..."- After that, Sharotto flew down back to the ground and kept watching from a distance

Joana's grip on Blake was a bit rough but at least she wasn't hurting anywhere near as much as Satomo did. Joana looked at him for several seconds, and proceeded to sniff him a few times. Blake was remaining still but still tense, his brain almost shouting him to escape, and his heart beating madly. Joana stared at him again, and Blake could almost sense that her look was one of confusion, and he calmed himself down, enough to deactivate his transformation. When he stopped glowing, Joana seemed surprised and brought him closer to her eyes. She stared at him some more and after some hesitation, she licked him.

Blake remembered that just earlier that day Joana had done that in a sort of playful manner 'I seriously hope this means that she can recognize me. If she's getting my taste, I'm screwed...' Joana licked him a few more times and put him back on the ground

-"Well... Thanks for not eating me, I guess... If you can understand a bit of what I'm saying, I'd like to point that there's a dangerous monster over there..."- Blake himself was interrupted by a stomp from Satomo

-"UGH!! It seems that I have to do things myself after all!!"- Satomo was grinding her foot on the ground, and Joana roared angrily, tackling her while biting her shoulder. For the first time Satomo roared in pain and started to punch Joana in the head, but she wouldn't let go. Blake saw this and focusing his thought on anger, he managed to transform yet again, he grabbed 2 small rocks, using one to sharpen the other quickly into a makeshift knife. While Satomo was struggling with Joana, Blake climbed into her tail and shouted

-"HEY YOU GIANT MONKEY... Don't you wonder what happens if I remove your tail?"- Blake touched her tail with the sharpened edge of the stone, to let her know she wasn't bluffing

-"You... wouldn't..."-

-"I will if you don't do as I say, first, I want Joana to get back to normal, and second, I want you to get the hell out of this planet..."-

-"You sure have some nerve to dare to demand things to me"-

Blake hit Satomo's tail with the blunt edge of the stone, but by reflex she stopped in her tracks and was visibly scared

-"You were saying?"-

Satomo growled -"Fine... All I have to do is destroy the fake moon I made and... wait, what?! where is it?!"-

Sharotto appeared flying near Satomo's head -"I destroyed it some minutes ago... you were too busy toying with him and expecting the other saiyan to attack him..."- Soon after that, both Joana and Satomo went back to their humanoid form, although Joana was exhausted and fell unconscious outright. Satomo complained of the bite wound she got on her shoulder. -"Serves you right"- Sharotto commented. Blake (who had deactivated the transformation again, having no more strength to keep it anymore) immediately went to check on Joana to see if she was ok. She was tired and unconscious, but she seemed to be fine.

-"Aww... I was going to play some more..."- Satomo complained

-"That was not playing... and like I said I don't remember educating YOU like this..."- Sharotto was saying as she was walking toward Blake -"I'm sorry, Satomo apparently got carried away... My name is Sharotto"- She said to Blake

-"I did NOT get carried away!! I was enjoying myself!!"- Satomo shouted

-"There's a big difference between a sparring match and a brutal beatdown young lady!"- Sharotto shouted back, and observed Blake's confused look -"Saiyan affection usually consists of a sparring match between friends or family... but she got it wrong... Are you ok?"-

-"I take being alive as being ok"- Blake said, and Sharotto laughed a bit. However, Blake was thoughtful for a moment, and could recall that Satomo had called this other alien woman mom.

-"Yes, Abakku, I am your mother..."-

-"W-Wait... What?!! How did you...?!"-

-"A mother can tell what her child thinks just by looking..."-

-"Do you take offense if I say this is the weirdest day in my life?"-
Sharotto laughed at Blake's remark, and proceeded to try to explain him what happened, she told him that he was indeed a saiyan, and a high class one at that. But they found out a galatic tyrant who goes by the name of Frieza was going to destroy their planet, Blake's father, Kailan, the highest ranking general of the saiyan army, had managed to learn of this due to a vision from Bardock, and reunited as many saiyans as possible to fight back. They faced both Frieza and another of their enemies' army, the Jigokujin.

Despite they were defeating the enemy armies, Frieza himself formed an enormous energy ball which he launched toward the planet, and the saiyans themselves. Sharotto also told him that the whole battle also allowed the scientists and some saiyans who weren't in the battle to send all of their children across the universe, meant to land in planets classified as very weak. Also, that despite their best efforts, the saiyan warriors were unable to stop the gigantic energy ball and were eventually killed by it. Sharotto also added that Kailan wanted her to stay alive so she could one day find their son...
153111111111111111111111112111.title: The encounter (Part 3) and confessions of a mother

1531111111111111111111111121111.content:
-"I guess it all seems reasonable with all that context..."- Blake said scratching his head

-"I'm sorry for leaving you here for so long, it's taken many years to find as many saiyan children as possible... The backup data from our computers got corrupted due to the damage they experienced, and the data about you was lost... I had to sneak in the Jigokujin's home planet to try to learn where you were... I remembered very well that you were sent to the same planet a saiyan called Makotsu was sent to"-

-"ANOTHER ONE?!"- Blake was a bit exasperated

-"It was on accident, the ships were being sent almost randomly across the list of weak planets, and nobody bothered to fully check the reports... you see, Makotsu is a sort of mutant among us... His father was said to be the legendary super saiyan, someone very powerful but also bloodthirsty and crazy... At least you haven't found him, that means he may have left the planet, died, or is simply minding business somewhere else..."-

-"Well, It has been nice to meet you, mrs. Sharotto, but I need to take back Joana to her house..."-

-"I'm your mother. Why don't you just call me mom or something?"- Sharotto commented with a fake anger

-"I'm not used to that... All my life I've been an orphan for all I knew... No offense meant though..."- Blake said as he put Joana on his back

-"Wait... Let me see your friend..."- Sharotto got closer and inspected Joana, her face, her armor, her earrings... -"Those are saiyan earrings... and not any saiyan's... This is Haisaku's daughter, Reinari. I'm sure of it..."- Sharotto looked surprised

-"By this point I'm not surprised if you tell me she is a princess or something..."-

-"Well, almost, she's from one of the saiyan noble families and a high class warrior... Hey, Abakku..."-

-"I go by the name of Blake..."-

-"Nonsense! Abakku is the name your father and me agreed upon, you were named after your grandfather, a great saiyan general, and you should be proud of that name..."-

-"Well, I guess you'll still call me that then..."- Blake sighed

-"As I was saying... Umm, is Reinari your girlfriend?"-

Blake sighed -"I think so... why?"-

-"Damnit"- Sharotto huffed

-"Is something wrong? If you mention anything about an arranged marriage I can tell you I'm not going to do it..."-

-"No, no, it's not that, it's just that back on Planet Vegeta, Haisaku had made a bet that Reinari would be your girlfriend or wife later on... Since Reinari was a year older than you I was mostly sure I would win the bet... Now I owe her a full day of food..."- Sharotto laughed slightly -"I wonder what did she see to know about this... You weren't even raised as saiyans, you were in a primitive alien world and yet you..."-

-"Umm you're the aliens here..."-

-"That's a matter of perspective, but whatever..."-

Blake began to walk back to Joana's house, and could hear Satomo shouting

-"You're letting him go?!!"-

-"He's going to get medical attention for Reinari... Which wouldn't have happened if you hadn't fought them in the first place... However, you're right... We'rre going with him"-

'Just what I needed... More aliens in the house...' Blake thought, it hadn't gotten fully through his skull that those aliens were his mother and sister, and just proceeded to walk while Satomo and Sharotto caught up to him. Blake had a distrustful look regarding Satomo, and noticing this, Sharotto said

-"Don't worry about her. She's not going to hurt you, if she knows what's good for her..."-

-"Right... spoil him just because he's a boy..."-

-"He's your younger brother, he's nowhere near as experienced or as strong as you, so I WILL protect him regardless of what you say... Today was a small maturity test for you, and you failed it miserably..."-

-"What?! Mooom!!"- Satomo complained in a sort of childish tone

However, the recently reunited family had to stop when someone appeared in the sky before them. It was a tall guy, sort of long black hair (shoulder length), no shirt, and just some damaged pants. He wore a golden necklace with a blue gem

-"That's one of Paragus' familiar jewels..."- Sharotto gasped -"This is Makotsu..."-

Satomo quickly pushed her scouter's button, and the reading revealed a power of 15,000, she exclaimed -"His power was 12,000 according to the Jigokujin!!"-

-"It's obvious he had a zenkai..."-

-"A what?"- Blake was yet more confused

-"After we saiyans recover from near fatal wounds, we get an increase of power. We're going to take care of this one, Abakku..."-

Sharotto and Satomo stood in a fighting stance, Makotsu charged at them. Satomo barely dodged him, while Sharotto started an exchange of fists and kicks, fightng near evenly against the psychotic saiyan

-"Don't you dare use another fake moon!! He has a tail too"- Sharotto said upon noticing Makotsu's tail, unlike the other saiyans, he didn't wrap it around his waist. While Sharotto and Satomo fought Makotsu, Blake had a bad feeling about him, and put Joana under a tree's shadow, deciding to go help his mother and sister.

-"What do you think you're doing, Abakku?"- Satomo half angrily asked

-"If that guy is stronger than either of you, there's no point on running. My best bet is to help take him down..."- Blake, despite being tired, stood in a fighting stance

'He wasn't raised in the ways of our people... yet, he has the spirit of a true saiyan... Kailan would be proud...' Sharotto thought as she noticed Blake's determined look. Makotsu managed to send both Sharotto and Satomo flying away frome meters with a short but powerful burst of energy. Then, he looked at Blake... he could almost feel an immediate anger and an urge to kill

*Flashback*

Blake and Makotsu were born the same day, at different hours though, while their mothers rested, the babies were put on cradles and also had their strength measured. Most saiyan babies after birth were usually tired and slept peacefully, but it wasn't Blake's case, he was crying loudly and incesantly. The doctors commented on this, praising the newborn Abakku (later known as Blake) for having the spirit of a warrior, it was also understandable because he was Kailan's son, their highest ranking general and one of the strongest saiyans of their time (not counting Broly, as he was labeled a mutant/abnormal saiyan).

Most of the other babies were bothered by Abakku's crying but Makosu was the one suffering it the most, he was already born as a mutant, with a power level of 4,000 at birth. Broly had been banished to space along his father Paragus to space some time ago, and the mother died while giving birth. That, and that King Vegeta didn't want to deal with another one like Broly, originally had ordered to have the baby executed if he displayed any trait reminiscent of his father regarding to power. Due to this, Makotsu had been left in the cradle almost all day, nobody would feed him or attempt to comfort him.

*End of flashback*

Makotsu roared in rage and charged at Blake, who tried his best to fight back, however, he was no match for the berserk saiyan, Makotsu punched him in the stomach making him spit blood, followed by a punch to the face, sending him some meters away, but as he dashed towards him to keep attacking, Blake was able to land a double kick on his face, but this only stunned him for an instant and angered him further. Makotsu punched again Blake in the stomach with great force, and sent him several meters away from a kick, before he stood back up, Makotsu fired a barrage of energy balls at him, but didn't notice that Sharotto and Satomo fired their own beams at him. Satomo's beam was blue, Sharotto's was pink.

Despite taking the full force from the impact and their explosion, Makotsu ignored tha attacks and kicked Blake in the ribs, thankfully, his armor was still doing the job and decreased the damage somewhat. Makotsu grabbed Blake by the neck and lifted him up, and punched him again in the stomach. Only that... his fist never made it to Blake's stomach. Blake stopped it with his knee, and was able to transform yet again, his eyes going blank, his hair straightening up, glowing with a golden aura.

-"He did it. AGAIN!!"- Satomo was surprised to see it happen yet again.

-"His power is increasing madly..."- Sharotto commented

Blake punched Makotsu in the face, with even greater strength, sending him about 50 meters away... and ran towards him, kicking him like a football. Not stopping there, Blake jumped and punched Makotsu downward, making a hole in the ground. Blake stood near there for a moment

'His power is 60,000 no doubt... but what is this... could it be, the super saiyan from the legend?' Sharotto wondered 'Sadly, that power is far from being able to challenge Frieza alone... maybe the legend glorified the facts a bit...'

Makotsu stood back up with some difficult as his body ached, angrier than he ever was, and shouted -"ABAKKU!!"-

-"Another one who can't apparently spell my human name..."- Blake remarked, and when the angered saiyan charged at him, he punched him through his abdomen. Sharotto and Satomo were shocked, not at the brutality, but to the demonstration of sheer power. Makotsu spaat out blood and fell to his knees. Blake kicked him upward and jumped to catch him in the air, he grabbed him from the tail and began to spin him, until he was able to throw him away with tremendous force, pulling his tail off in the process. They all managed to see Makotsu crash into some large rocks. Blake landed on the ground and fell, completely exhausted.
1531111111111111111111111121111.title: The encounter (Part 4)

15311111111111111111111111211111.content:
Note: Yeah, in case it hasn't been noted, the saiyan armor Satomo, Sharotto, Blake and Joana wear is a lot more durable than the standard models used by Frieza's soldiers. About as durable as Bulma's version if not more. Only high class saiyans had access to this kind of armor.

Satomo and Sharotto sought shade under some trees and rested there, also allowing Blake and Joana to get some rest. An hour has passed...

Blake woke up, he felt very tired but still felt the ned to wake up. He was still near the place where Sharotto and Satomo landed, and noticed that he had been resting on Satomo's lap of all people. He stood back up while shouting -"WHAT THE FREAKING HELL?!"-

-"What?! I fight you, you complain, I try to be nice, you still complain?!"-

Blake looked at Sharotto expecting some counter argument, to which she replied -"Sorry, but she has a point..."-

-"I guess you got me... This time..."-

-"Satomo doesn't hate you, Abakku. If she really had meant to kill you she was more than capable of doing so with energy beams... So, just like I told her to stop her brutal behavior, I ask you to give her another chance..."- Sharotto spoke in a serious tone

-"I still have the feeling that if I'm ever left alone with her I'm going to suffer in some way..."-

-"You better stop that attitude..."- Sharotto said, and without bothering to see Satomo's face (she actually had a mischievous smile), added -"And YOU better don't get any 'funny' idea..."-

-"Hey! I was trying to be nice for real... And also, I bet you wouldn't have complained if it had been Reinari's lap rather than mine"- Satomo remarked, making Blake blush for a split second. She noticed this and laughed.

Meanwhile, Joana, who had been resting onder another tree's shadow, woke up, although she was feeling extremely tired and saw everything blurry, Blake immediately went to help her. She hugged him tightly despite her current sleepy state and asked softly what had happened, to which Blake replied that it wasn't the best moment to explain, all that mattered is that she was ok. Without warning, she kissed him on the lips and wrapper her tail around his waist and fell back asleep.

-"Going great ape for the first time is both an exhausting and a traumatic experience... What she's doing is completely natural..."- Sharotto commented

-"I can guess..."- Blake was still blushing madly as Joana was asleep but wouldn't let go of him. Satomo laughed but added in a more serious tone

-"She managed to recognize you even while in that state... That means she cares a lot about you... Usually for a first transformation we attack anything that isn't another great ape on instinct..."-

-"I'd appreciate not to be reminded anymore of that ape thing... I'm already going to need therapy to forget about this..."-

-"Why? It's a natural thing... for saiyans... which you are..."- Sharotto commented, when suddenly her scouter beeped and she looked at the direction it indicated

-"A power level of 15,500 is on its way here..."-

-"That guy Makotsu again?!!"-

-"It's not possible, you practically killed him, and even if he survived, he can't heal that fast... also, a zenkai would have given him greater power than just that..."-

-"Then who could it be? Is there any other of you in this planet?"- Blake asked, in a somewhat exasperated tone

-"Well... reports said a saiyan called Kakarot had been sent here 4 years before sending you here. It had been assumed he may have conquered this planet, but it's obvious he didn't... We don't know if he's loyal to Frieza or has gone independent... we better be cautious..."- Sharotto said

However, whom they saw resembled saiyans in no way... it was a teenager-looking guy, with extremely pale skin, a demonic tail, and long white hair, which even covered his eyes. He wore silver colored metallic armor with some golden adornments, one of which was an Omega symbol on his left shoulder. He was covered in armor except for his head, had a sheathed sword on his back, and also, wore a scouter, but it looked different from the ones Blake had already seen, this one's lens was red, and the scouter itself was black, with some small lights and an overall more advanced aspect to it. He also noticed Satomo and Sharotto standing up quickly, ready to fight

-"Jigokujin scum... How dare you show up on this planet?"- Sharotto asked angrily

-"My, what a lack of manners... heh, what can be expected of a race of talking monkeys..."-

Satomo growled in rage at that remark

-"It's my mission to exterminate any saiyan on sight, you actually have saved me the work of having to look for each one of you"- The Jigokujin laughed, he noticed the sunlight in the surroundings -"I appear to have arrived earlier than expected... ugh..."- Then he noticed Joana hugging Blake while sleeping, and he laughed -"Oh, did I interrupt something?"- Blake was the one to growl angrily this time. The Jigokujin's scouter beeped and checked all of their power readings -"1,900... 2,000... 9,000... AND 14,000... not bad... perhaps I can have a little fun for once..."-

-"Give me a good reason to not make a fake moon and stomp that puny bastard flat right now"- Satomo whispered to her mother

-"Only for an emergency, if we can take him down as our normal selves that's better... Also, the sun will set soon, and the Jigokujin are most dangerous at night"-

-"Remind me why"-

-"They can transform in the absence of stellar radiation, aka, night... They also get stronger while in darkness even if they don't transform..."-

-"I'm in a hurry, so, shall we begin already?"- The Jigokujin spoke

Satomo and Sharotto stood before their enemy, Blake behind them, in a protective manner

-"I would have thought the male would be the first one to take me on. but whatever..."-

The fight started, Satomo and Sharotto took on the Jigokujin, attacking him at once, they were giving him some trouble to dodge their punches and kicks, in the mean time, Blake was trying to get Joana let go of him without disturbing her much. By gently tickling her tail he managed to do so, and rushed to help in the battle. Taking advantage of the Jigokujin's distraction, Blake landed a punch to his face greatly angering him. His response was a purple energy blast that pushed Blake away several meters and exploded. He was largely undamaged as his armor protected him. However, the explosion woke Joana up.

She was confused and surprised to see everyone fighting, and had thought the saiyan women had gotten reinforcements, but by observing, she noticed that Blake was fighting a new mysterious enemy, and the saiyan women were fighting him as well, when the alien punched Blake away, sending him near her, she asked him what was going on

-"Short story, those 2 alien women are my mother and my older sister, the weirdo is someone who wants to exterminate our race..."-

-"Humans?"-

-"Saiyans. Us. People with tails..."- Blake had his own tail on one hand while pointing at it with the other one

Both observed as the Jigokujin and Sharotto exchanged barrages of energy blasts, while Satomo attempted to attack him while he was distracted. Blake and Joana went to attack him as well, but he was dodging them all effortlessly and fired a purple energy ball at Joana, which Blake intercepted himself with one of his arms. After the smoke cleared, he noticed that his arm was still intact...

-"I'd have sworn that cheap armor of yours wouldn't have resisted that... But it won't resist this for sure!!"- The Jigokujin commented, and fired a purple beam aimed at Blake's chest. Satomo appeared suddenly before him and deflected it with her hand.

-"That hurt a bit..."- She said

-"Why did you do that?!"-

-"Because I'm supposed to protect you, stupid baby brother..."-

Blake only had an annoyed face at her answer, Joana giggled, but they immediately resumed fighting. Sharotto demonstrated her great skill with energy, firing beams that tried to home on their target, as well as beams that would split into several smaller energy balls and again try to home on their target. The Jigokujin's armor proved to be as good as the saiyans' Then, they noticed the Jigokujin smiling

-"It has been interesting, but I sall put an end to this fight..."- He created a black sphere of energy in his hand. Everyone was shocked as nobody knew what was that. The Jigokujin laughed as he threw the sphere up into the sky, where the sun was still shining, and proceeded to ecplise it.

-"Apparently this guy stole your trick..."- Blake said

-"Stole? This technique is more ancient than your entire race!!"- The Jigokujin laughed maniacally, as now their environment was in darkness, his eyes glowed, revealing them to be red, and unsheathed his sword -"What a shame, to have to contaminate my own blade with the blood of mere monkeys... Feel honored as I, Blaze, the great prince of the Jigokujin, will be the one murdering you tonight..."-

Blaze dashed toward Blake, intending to impale him with his sword. However, that did not hapen... Satomo took the hit herself, getting impaled in the stomach, Blaze removed his blade, causing further damage.

-"Why... you?!"- Blake's voice faltered a bit

-"Told you already, stupid little brother... I am... suppossed to protect..."- She fell unconscious before finishing her sentence. Blake clenched his fists, and while Blaze was laughing, he suddenly glowed in a golden aura, his hair straightened up, and dashed at great speed, punching Blaze in the stomach, cracking his armor

-"What?!!"- His scouter started to beep like crazy -"His power is... growing... how?!! There's no moon yet!!"- Blake punched him in the face, leaving a golden flame that burned Blaze a bit afterwards. -"60,000!! This makes no sense!!"-
15311111111111111111111111211111.title: The encounter (Part 5)

153111111111111111111111112111111.content:
Blake furiously punched Blaze repeatedly, further cracking and breaking his armor. Blaze attempted to dodge or block the attacks but they were too fast for him. With a powerful kick, Blake shattered the armor on Blaze's left arm, which he had used to attempt to block it, and punched him very hard in the face, destroying one of his eyes in the process. Blaze dashed away but Blake appreared suddenly behind him, kicking him and breaking his torso armor.

Blaze attacked using his sword, managging to cut Blake in an arm, but it wasn't a very deep wound, and Blake only replied with more brutal attacks, punching him repeatedly, punching through him at the end of the combo, while grabbing him by the throat with his other hand.

-"Kill him now!!"- Blake shouted to either Satomo or Sharotto, and after a brief moment of shock, both charged their energy beams and fired them, Blake escaped at almost the last possible moment, letting Blaze be struck by the full force of the blasts. When the smoke dissipated, however, they could see Blaze was still standing there... His arms had been disintegrated by the energy beams but part of his damaged torso and his head were still alive, and his lower body was largely intact, he spat blood and growled in anger. He focused on Blake, who was standing some meters away, and shouted

-"You will see the form of the true terror. Do you think your race is the only one that can transform?!"-

-"Oh god, not another 100 foot tal ape again"-

-"I'm far above that brute form of your kind"- Blaze regenerated his arms and healed his wounds, including his destroyed eye, he opened and closed them a few times before going on to release a powerful dark purple aura, which made the ground tremble and start to break apart, the rocks floating away. 2 large black feathered wings sprouted from Blaze's back, his fingernails turned to claws, his canine teeth grew, and his eyes now glowed.

-"The power level is... 96,000!!"- Sharotto was more than surprised 'That's about the power of Frieza's elite forces... this guy is a monster...' And she was even more shocked when she saw Blake impaling him with his own sword

-"What..."- Blaze said as he felt the pain from the sword stabbing his chest

-"I've had enough of space freaks for a day"- Blake said coldly as he thrusted the sword further. He noticed that Blaze's scouter was damaged but seemed to be still working, and saw small lights flashing in it while it beeped. Blaze slashed at Blake's chest with his claws, causing some wounds that bled, he also pulled his sword out of himself, and instead of attacking Blake, he dashed toward Joana and slashed....

Blake managed to push Joana away from Blaze's incoming attack, receiving the slash himself in the face... It cut a straight line that went from about an inch above his eyebrow to an inch below his left eye. Sharotto managed to fire a beam that blasted through Blaze's chest. However, Blaze's spaceship (small and triangular, more similar looking to an advanced one-manned airplane) came to him, creating a powerful energy shield that surrounded itself and him.

-"Ugh... enjoy the time you have left, monkeys... the next time you see me, you'll die"- Blaze almost crawled to his spaceship and while keeping the force field on, took off to space.

-"I really will look forward to killing him when our great army begins war"- Sharotto growled, as she saw Blake laying on the ground with a wound in the face, which was bleeding rather profusely. Joana was a bit stunned by Blake pushing her away but then she saw why, and hurried to pick him up and carry him on her back. Sharotto did the same with her daughter

-"Where can they get medical attention?"-

-"My house, follow me"- Joana ran desperately, closely followed by Sharotto, until they arrived to her house.

Meanwhile, in Joana's house...

-"YOU WHAT?!!"- Sarah screamed

-"We kinda knew this day may come at some point... If Joana's real parents came for her, we have no right to stop her... Also... Blake IS an alien of the same species as Joana, though she beat me to finding that out... How? Honestly no idea. My point is that she didn't go alone anyway"-

-"It's been an hour since that happened"-

Before the argument went on, Joana arrived to the house, with Blake on her back, still conscious but very exhausted. Both her adoptive parents were already shocked to see both of them with wounds, and got an even greater surprise when seeing a woman they saw never before, with a similar armor to Blake's and Joana's, carrying an unconscious girl on her back. John noticed that she had a tail like them, wrapped around her waist

-"Sorry for appearing like this but we have quite an emergency"- Joana said

-"Not to be rude, but who are these people?"- Sarah asked

-"My name is Sharotto. I'm Abakku's mother"- Noticing both John and Sarah's confused looks, she added -"You call him Blake"-

After a brief moment of surprise, John led them to the medical section of his lab, where he could attend their wounds. The first he noticed upon checking on Satomo was that her armor looked intact, despite being soaked in blood

-"Our armor can self-repair via nanomachines, but only as long as it's not completely destroyed"- Sharotto commented, and indicating John to remove Satomo's armor. John removed their torso armor without as much problem but stopped after that, hesitant

-"Umm, does she have any clothes under the jumpsuit?"-

-"No... why?"-

John was looking down -"Maybe you should proceed with the rest... Here are bandages and disinfectant"- Sharotto was thoughtful for a moment and then she laughed

-"Are you telling me you can't see my daughter naked?"-

John almost felt like fainting from that utterly direct question -"Well, by human etiquette rules... it's not the most appropiate thing to do..."-

-"Screw that, just remove her jumpsuit so you can put her in a healing tank"-

-"What's a healing tank"- John asked confused

Sharotto facepalmed herself -"Nevermind, just do it and attend her wounds however you people treat wounds"- Sighing, John had to do as she said, he first applied disinfectant to the wounds, and proceeded to suture them. Sharotto was a bit annoyed from seeing it

'So primitive, to sew one's flesh as if it were cloth'

After suturing the wounds, John dressed Satomo with a hospital gown and went to check on Blake. He was conscious but exhausted, and his wound wasn't too deep, John confirmed that his eye was not damaged, so, after disinfecting, a piece of gauze and bandage over his eye was enough to take care of it. Joana stayed by his side the whole time, and John left to talk to Sharotto

-"So... you came for Blake..."-

-"Yes"- After that, John asked about their people and culture, commenting that he was curious of why would they send their childrren to Earth. Sharotto commented that it was because it was labeled as a weak planet, its inhabitants were no threat to their race, and thus, their children would be safe there. Then Sharotto told him the story of their race and how they ended up as they are nowadays. (John would write it all down later)

-"I'm sorry for your losses"- John said, noticing a hint of sadness when Sharotto told him of the death of most of their kind, her husband among them

-"It's alright, they died as proud warriors, fighting to death bravely, defending their world, their comrades, their blood, their pride... They died as true saiyans"-

-"And what's been of saiyans these days?"-

-"We are supposed to be extinct, so, we can't show ourselves in many planets... We live as space nomads, raiding planets for resources to supply us with... while we retrieved all the saiyan children across space. Abakku, my son, is the last one"-

John already had learned that they were a warrior race that killed people and fought wars for a living, and them being space nomads didn't surprise him as much, but wondered what would happen once Blake was retrieved

-"We will fight again. Frieza will pay for all the saiyans he killed that day. The Saiyan Army will rise again. We're also going to absolutely destroy the Jigokujin. Those were also implied in the attack against us, and won't be forgiven... Don't worry though. I'll make sure that your planet gets spared. But I can't guarantee it won't be annexed to the saiyan empire afterwards"-

John was honestly a bit scared but decided it wasn't in his power to do much to stop such a thing, and right now his best bet was to attend the daughter's wounds and hope Sharotto keeps her promise about Earth. John later asked Sharotto about Joana, and she answered that she was thought to have been lost, as the data about her location had been lost due to corruption of the saiyan children registry files.

-"Her saiyan name is Reinari, and she is the daughter of a good friend of mine. I can't imagine how happy will be after learning her daughter was finally found... She's been looking for her all these years and just recently gave up"-

Later, John would mention the ocular devices whose function he couldn't figure out, Sharotto laughed and told him that these were scouters, devices that can read the power of living beings, they're most useful for battle and to communicate, or track and find particular objects. Over the years the scouter technology has advanced and the current scouters saiyan use won't overload like those worn by other races, and their communication and tracking fucntions have been improved. When John showed her the note that came with Blake, she gasped

-"This is Kailan's writing... He was always bad at handwriting"- Sharotto laughed for a moment, reading the note -"I'll read this to Abakku after he's recovered"-

Sharotto's scouter beeped, indicating someone with a power level above human average was approaching them
153111111111111111111111112111111.title: The encounter (Final part)

1531111111111111111111111121111111.content:
Ryan was irritated because he let his best friend die from piccolo’s attack and he made a rookie mistake by letting radish (Raditz, but we all know that some are named after vegetables) get one over him. At least that punk died along with goku, but ryan asked piccolo to train gohan for the saiyans’s arrival.

Flashback:

Ryan watched them fight before getting an idea and he ran over to get to his god-brother. He got to the pod without much trouble and he looked at the control panel near the door of the pod before pressing a certain pattern of keys. The door opened and the fight stopped briefly with goku and piccolo smiling and smirking respectively. Raditz was looking at him with surprised and shock to see a human open a saiyan spacepod.

“Never let someone get behind you.” Was heard behind raditz who eyes widen from the mistake

“Hidden Technique: 1000 Years of Pain.” Ryan said before raditz felt something up his ass

It propelled him into the air before face-planting the ground and his ass was hurting. Goku and piccolo looked to see ryan used his foot to kick his ass and they were laughing and chuckling. He walked over to gohan and got down to his level before patting him on the head with a smile.

“Gohan, can you do something for me?” ryan asked his god brother

“What is it, ryan?” he asked curious

“Watch your dad fight and if he gets hurt, get really angry and use a full power head-butt into that man’s chest over there.” Ryan said pointing to the same man he kicked his ass

Gohan seemed to think about it before nodding and he went into hiding behind a rock to be safe.

“Good boy.” Ryan said before seeing raditz getting up and his face was red from anger and the fact that a human got the drop on him

“How the hell did you do that?” raditz asked before charging at ryan who was looking at him with a glare

“If you think I’m just a human, then you are wrong about that.” Ryan said before gathering his power

“What?” he said before checking his power level

“A power level of 5,000?” was asked before ryan smirked and he punched him in the face sending him into a tree

~Was ryan really holding back during our spars?~ goku thought slightly

~I know ryan was holding back, but what reason.~ piccolo thought

“I just have to use this much of my power.” Ryan said stretching his body making it crack loudly as he sighed in relief

~He clearly not a human, but maybe one of us if this is his limit.~ raditz thought

“I sensed you near another power level that felt like it was younger than me.” Ryan said getting serious

“Goku, why does his name sounds like radish?” he asked without taking his eyes off his opponent

Goku was chuckling as piccolo rolled his eyes.

“I don’t know ryan.” He said

Piccolo thought of something and he smirked before taking a stance with placing his index and middle fingers to his forehead. He started to charge his energy for an attack and ryan knows what he is planning.

~He is going to use that attack and he will need five minutes.~ ryan thought before charging at his opponent

Goku was about to help ryan like a friend he is, but he caught a look from ryan and goku ran passed him towards his brother.

~Ryan and piccolo have something planned so I have to help some way.~ he thought before getting behind radizt and grabbed him by the tail

“Why do I feel weak?” the brother asked before turning around to see goku holding onto his tail smiling at his bit in the plan

“Think you two can hold him for five minutes while I prepare a final attack?” piccolo asked

“I think goku can hold him for that long.” Ryan said smirking at the fallen brother

Ryan turned his head off to a direction sensing something of a few power levels in a fight and he would have to look into it later. While ryan was distracted, radizt gathered what left of his energy and blasting ryan with it in the form of a weaken Saturday Crush. When ryan got hit, he was sent flying to the ground a few feet away and that made goku lost his focus. Raditz felt the grip on his tail loosen so he smiled before kicking goku away from him. Ryan was getting up from the cheap shot as he saw the older brother stomping on goku’s ribs.

~Gohan has to act now.~ ryan thought

“Gohan, now.” Ryan called out

Gohan was seeing his father being attacked and that was making an inner rage burn within him. His power started to rise as his power was forming a sphere around him and he charged at the person attacking his father.

“Leave my daddy alone!” the young boy screamed

“Huh?” raditz asked as his scouter picked up on the rising power level

Raditz stopped and turned around before getting nailed in the chest by gohan’s head-butt. Only that attack was able to crack the saiyan’s armor and ryan grabbed gohan before raditz could attack the boy. Ryan was smiling before he started to hear the sound of static and he sees piccolo was still charging his final attack.

“Good job, gohan.” Ryan said before looking at raditz

“That kid must die.” He said limping over to the kid as both ryan and goku got a hold of the brother

“I’m about done charging, ryan, goku.” Piccolo said as ryan nodded

Goku was thinking of something in the next few minutes.

~I’m going to keep ryan alive even if I die with raditz.~ he thought before pushing ryan away from radish and putting him into a full nelson

“Say hello to uncle nelson.” Goku said with a ryan like smile as ryan was getting up from the force of the push

~What is he thinking?~ ryan thought before seeing what goku was doing

~So he saved me from dying along with him.~ ryan thought

The two brothers were talking before piccolo was done charging his final attack.

~Never thought I would get to use this on goku like this.~ piccolo thought with a smirk

“Gohan, be sure to protect your mother and listen to what ryan tells you.” Goku said to the confused boy

“What do you mean, daddy?” gohan asked

“You’ll see in about a minute or two.” Goku said as piccolo aimed his attack

“Special Beam Cannon!” piccolo called out his attack as he fired it at the brothers

Goku’s friends felt something relating to their friend and they went to him. Ryan was holding gohan before looking at piccolo withan irritated look on his face.

“Piccolo, can you train gohan?” ryan asked

“Why?” he asked

Ryan was about to answer when they heard something coming towards them and they knew it was his friends. Raditz is hanging on by a thread, but enough to hear them talk.

“So goku died protecting his son and his friend.” Master Roshi said sadly as ryan nodded

Bulma had an idea that will work and cheer them up.

“Guys, why don’t we use the dragon balls to wish goku back to life?” she asked as ryan nodded

“The what?” raditz asked as piccolo and ryan turned to him

Piccolo is explaining the dragon balls while ryan was watching him and he noticed something was off.

“Thank for that bit of information now my two comrades will be here in a year’s time so they can wish me back.” raditz said

~That was a trap.~ ryan thought before piccolo killed the older brother as the others were around the dying goku

After a few minutes, goku’s body disappeared meaning goku will be doing something for kami. Ryan noticed gohan was looking at him and he hugged him.

“Big brother, daddy will come back right?” he asked as the others chuckled

“Yes, I know you will get stronger for him.” Ryan said smiling at him rubbing his head


: End flashback

Everyone agreed to meet again in a year of training to fight the incoming threat.

15311111111111111111111111211111111.content:
Ryan nodded before taking off to see gohan’s mother, chichi first to talk with her because she needs to hear this.

“Chichi.” Ryan called out as he landed on the ground as a woman came out of the house that he that was theirs

“Ryan? Why are you here? Where is goku and my little gohan?” she asked worried

“I wasn’t there what happened at kame house, but I met up with goku and piccolo for a battle. They were fighting an opponent as I went to save gohan and I helped out a little in their fight, but in the end goku pushed me out of the way so he could protect me and his son. Bulma and the others are going to wish goku back to life and gohan is on a training trip with piccolo.” Ryan explained with a serious look

“Before you go after him, I think it would be a good idea since he would learn how to protect himself and he wants to make his dad proud of him.” He added before looking to see tears in her eyes

“What do you me to do while my son could die?” she asked getting hysterical

“I trust piccolo and you trust me, but you can have gohan work on his studies after he finished his training.” he said and she perked up at the word studies

“Alright, but I don’t want my gohan becoming a delinquent.” She said agreeing with him and he nodded

Ryan had a bite to eat with chichi so she would have company and he was about to take off to see about that energy from earlier.

“So where are you going?” she asked

“I have to look into something and maybe convince my family to move here for a change of pace.” He said before waving her off and flying into the sky

~Now to find that power level from before to where it caused me to loose my focus on the fight.~ ryan thought as he was flying higher so people wouldn’t see him

“Note to self: see if mom and dad can help me with restraining my power level.” He said to himself before looking down to see a forest area and he descended to the ground

~I think they have something for me to try out.~ he thought before remembering his saiyan training with his family

Flashback:

A young ryan about the age of 6 is trying to make energy blasts with his ki like his mother taught him. His brother and sister are watching him trying to complete the task at hand. He kept his focus until it blew up in his face. They were looking at a face full of soot and one hair on his head had a small flame on it. Rei walked over to him and put the flame out before helping him on his feet.

“Little brother, I think I know why you are having trouble with this easy exercise.” She said as he look at her with wide eyes

“Really? What is it?” he asked wanting to know

“You are trying too hard to make it work. Relax before let the flow of you ki into your hands forming a ball.” She explained

Ryan nodded before getting into a relaxed position and he started to gathering energy into his hands. Soon when he felt it was ready, he fired the ki blast near their brother who jumped back away from the blast. He glared at him while their sister was giggling at them before patting ryan on the head.

“Good job, ryan; but try not to use our brother as a target.” She said as he nodded

Their parents were watching them from afar smiling at them as the older kids helping out their younger brother. Their father is chucking at ryan before his wife playfully slap his shoulder with smirk.

“You were the same when you were with bardock, kailin, and Yousei.” She said

After a few months, ryan was able to control his ki and he started to learn from his father and brother how to fight. Ryan was a fast learner during his lessons, but he had speed and he was lacking in power. He spent majority of his time training with his brother while their sister is watching them. All three of them know that they had the ability to get stronger if they got hit from a fatal attack. Ryan has yet to experience it as his parents wanted to get strong enough before they start the real training.

~They are going to make training hell.~ ryan thought as he was resting from his last training session with his brother and father

“Ryan, tomorrow you will begin the real training.” his father said and he nodded

“We are going to make sure that you will be strong as one of our friends.” His mother said

“Who?” ryan asked

“Bardock.” His father said as he nodded

“He was one of our best friends with two others and their wives.” He added

“How strong was he?” ryan asked

“He had a power level of 10,000.” His mother said

“Couldn’t you make me stronger than that?” he asked

“Yes, we could, but that would mean that you would have to hold back somewhat.” His father said

“Your siblings are stronger than that, but they wear limiters so they don’t have to hold back.” his mother said

“When you get strong enough, you will have to use limiters and you can choose what kind you want.” She added as his siblings revealed their limiters

His brother are wearing a silver pendent around his neck and matching bracers on his wrists. Rei had gold earrings three on each ear and a bracelet on her left wrist. Ryan thought about of getting one set or the other, but he smiled at something.

“I want both sets of limiters.” He said as his parents smiled

“Then you will have to gain a truly massive power level that is close to broly.” His father said

“Who is he?” ryan asked

“The Legendary Super saiyan, but I think he isn’t the one of the legend.” His mother said

Ryan developed a thinking pose of his own and he nodded.

“I will be the strongest and I will fight him to be the true legendary super saiyan.” He said determined

“Then we have to get you up to 10,000 quickly and have you control it with ease.” Rei said finally getting into help her little brother

Ryan had a power level of 500 before he went through with his hell training. Now he has 8,050 through the amount of zenkais he had during a month and he had one last session of the training from hell.

“I had five zenkais a day just to get me to his point and this last one will get me to 10,000.” Ryan said as his brother was resting from the session before

“To be honest, this session might push you pass the mark we set for you.” His father said

“Does it matter if I go pass 10,000?” ryan asked slightly confused

“Not personally, but you might have a harder time controlling it.” His mother said

Ryan nodded before he got into his stance that he was taught by his father and brother. His family smirked before going their own stance and the final zenkai session has begun. A few minutes into the training, ryan is doing well with dodging attacks and firing a few ki blast with precision.

~His control is almost perfect, but it will go down when he gets his last zenkai.~ they thought about ryan

~Have to do better before they completely overwhelm me.~ ryan thought before charging at his brother for an attack

~He really must be trying his best before the usual happens.~ kizaki thought

He had enough time to block the first punch, but not the second one or the first kick which followed the punch. Ryan smirk as he got his first few hits on his brother, but sense someone behind and moved out of the way.

“Nice try, but it won’t work on me this time.” Ryan said as his father attack his brother

Ryan attacked his father and dodge attacks left and right from his family showing he was learning from them and their tactics. Ryan was winning against them and he was smiling that he was doing better this one last time.

“Son, you are exceptionally better; but you still have much to learn.” His father said

His family surrounded him like before and he dodging like hell as they were giving him one last usual beating.

: end flashback

Ryan remembered that his power level went to 10,000 as promised and then some to round it to 15,000 from his family final training session from hell. He landed on the ground as he was hunting for those power levels from earlier and his search brought him to a forest where strange fruit grow and a house.

~They must be inside.~ ryan thought walking to the house at a slow pace

He stopped when a woman wearing saiyan armor and a scouter walked out to greet him. He raised an eyebrow at her before getting a look of her face. His eyes widen remembering the stories his parent’s missions before they came here to live in peace.

“I’m not kakarot, but we call him goku here and you will see him at the fight with the saiyans one year from now.” Ryan said

“You don’t think that I could be one of the saiyan you were told about?” she asked

“My parents told me and my siblings about their missions before they started to live here. They gave us every detail about the three pairs of parents to Goku, a boy, and a girl. You are the boy’s mother that much I can tell.” Ryan explained

“Who are your parents?” she asked

“Their names are Chigumerei and Kazihiro Kasshi.” Ryan said as they woman’s eyes widen from the mention of the names meaning she knows them
