153311111.title: Monster?

1533111111.content:
[NOTE 1: I didn't mention, but Blake woke up the following morning, and his parents didn't attempt to wake him up to "let him be" for the summer break. NOTE 2: The high speed movement Blake has used so far isn't Shunpo/Flash steps. It's just a very high speed dash using raw strength, similar to what Kenpachi and Chad have used, at least in the anime...]

Joana gasped again, and said -"Incredible..."- She checked her wrists, and there were no holes, and she started checking herself... Blake instinctively looked away, and said

-"There's a bathroom here, if you need to check anything..."-

-"Huh?"- Joana didn't really get what Blake meant, and he replied

-"If you have to check your own body, it'd be more appropriate that you do in private, alone..."-

-"Why?"-

Blake facepalmed himself, and replied

-"Because nobody should see you naked... It's not right... specially a guy..."-

-"What's wrong?"- Joana had already taken her white jacket off, and had a black tank top on.

-"EVERYTHING... Don't worry, I'll go downstairs for a while..."- Blake left, and Joana wondered why he didn't want to be in the same room while she was looking for any hole in herself... while Blake couldn't believe she didn't understand the implications... He sat on the couch and watched some TV, something he rarely did, but hadn't much else to do. Then he heard Joana calling him, and he went upstairs

-"I found it!"- Blake noticed she was still with her tank top, but it was slightly rolled up, revealing her navel,. Blake turned away and closed the door, but Joana opened it again, and asked -"What's wrong?"-

-"Could you put your jacket on?"-

-"Umm... yeah, but before I do that I thought you wanted to see..."-

-"Not really..."- Blake replied, despite looking away, Joana noticed a slight blush in his face

-"I don't have a navel... It's a hole..."- Joana added, and showed him that where her navel should be, there was a rather small hole, nearly identical to that in Blake's left wrist, both of them were about 1 inch in diameter, which is very small compared to the hollows' holes, which were wider.

-"What's the meaning of this?"- Blake wondered, he hadn't realized but he was staring at Joana's "navel hole" while he was deep in his thoughts and she giggled, and Blake noticed, and turned away from her again

-"I don't know... but you're the same as me... whatever we are..."- Joana said with a n.n face, while Blake just mumbled 'Uh-huh'. He hid his surprise, but now, a hint was right there... Joana was seemingly someone from the same unknown race or kind of being Blake himself is... Now the question to answer was, what were they anyway? At least Blake could kinda reject the theory of a mere rarity, as he's not the only one... Although, it could be still a rather rare phenomenon, even a curse, or a disease... Which meant that finding her was just luck... None of the other dead souls had been able to tell him anything relevant about what he is, although some remarked the hole, and told Blake to be careful with it...

The only other trait that was different between him and Joana was her odd need to feed on hollows. As far as Blake knew, souls didn't required food, although none stayed for long enough to feel it though. Maybe they got spiritual food in heaven, was one of Blake's personal theories. Still, feeding on hollows was something that disturbed him a little.

He never felt that desire, however, that implied that either he had long suppressed it to the point of never acknowledging it, or that she has a key difference that couldn't be seen... Blake also recognized that she was vastly stronger than him, he could barely catch up with her speed, his 'spirit swords' couldn't cut her, had insane physical strength, and his swords couldn't even stab her, and broke...Blake now thought that had not been because of her amnesia, he might be dead, killed in a single strike...

'What have I gotten myself into?!' Blake thought, now feeling in a "Damned if, damned if not" situation. He remembered that despite he tried to kill her, she wasn't showing any sign of hard feelings or bearing a grudge... She even saved him, put him back in his room, and got him bandages... and stayed with him... Blake hadn't thoguth about that one... now that he realized, being wounded and unconscious, he was a perfect target for any hungry hollow... He looked at Joana, who had put her jacket back on, and noticed she still had the wounds inflicted by him, and that she had some more burns...

-"Hey, why do you still have those wounds?"- Blake asked

-"Well... I..."- Joana stuttered a little, then, she gathered some courage and said -"I wasn't sure if you would try to destroy me again... and I wanted to show you that I wasn't taking any advantage..."-

-"Huh?!"- This further surprised Blake... this girl, who hadn't even idea about basic things, had a sense of honor... and was expecting him to continue trying to kill her. Blake would've gotten into deeper thoughts again, but he noticed Joana's voice faltered, and he put his hand on her right shoulder, and said -"I judged you wrong. You're not a monster... I shouldn't have said that..."- 'At least, not willingly... I've seen her eyes... she wasn't lying...' Blake said to himself in his mind, however he still held a small warning, if Joana lost control of herself things could be different, but he also knew he wouldn't be able to do anything to stop her... so, he mentally prayed to anyone who would listen that it never happened...

-"Well, you don't have to worry about that for now..."- Blake gathered energy in his hand, and began to heal Joana. In a few minutes he was done, and grabbed his broken sword

-"Can it be repaired?"- Joana showed genuine concern about Blake's weapon, as she had seen he used it to kill hollows

-"I don't know, but I don't lose anything by just trying..."- Blake replied, and while having the sword in his hand, started to gather energy with that same hand, and he was surprised to see that it worked, and his sword started to reform, it looked like small blue shiny particles gathered together in the shape of the sword's blade, and then solidified. There was no difference between the original part and the newly regenerated part. No lines or signs that it was once broken. The metal also felt the same. Glad that he could repair it, Blake sheathed it as well as his other sword.

-"Just in case"- Blake said to Joana, implying that it was to defend themselves if another hollow assaulted them -"So... what now?"-

-"Going for another walk?"- Joana suggested, and Blake replied

-"Uh... really?"-

-"Yeah! I want to find where did those strange but cute sounds came from..."-

-" 'Cute' sounds?"-

-"I don't know what they are, but I heard them earlier..."-

Blake tried to think what could she be referring to... and then, he heard a bird's song, and Joana exclaimed

-"It's there again!!"-

-"Uh... Joana... that's a bird song..."-

-"Really?"-

-"Yeah..."- Blake was going back to his hammock, and said -"I don't want to make you feel bad... but, I want to know... did something happen while I was knocked out?"- Joana sighed in response, then she replied

-"Yeah... several hollows attacked, they were tying to eat you while you were unconscious..."- Joana then changed her tone to a happier one -"But I had dinner instead..."-

Blake had a sweatdrop on the left temple of his head, and with a '-_- face, he thought 'That just makes things creepier...'

-"However... I had to fight them... and I feel hungry again..."-

-"HUH?!"- Blake's sweatdrop grew bigger, as he now senses that she was practically saying that she needed to eat even more hollows... -"So...?"- Blake asked

-"Well... maybe you could help me... to hunt some..."-

-"WHAT?! THAT'S GOING TOO FAR!! I CANT MERELY SWITCH TO KILL HOLLOWS TO SERVE THEM TO YOU FOR BREAKFAST!! ARE YOU CRAZY?!!"-

-"Pleease?"- Joana gave Blake a puppy eyed look, and despite he had closed his eyes, he had already seen it, and sighed in annoyance

-"Alright..."-

Joana's answer was a happier face and a nearly crushing hug, after a brief self healing, Blake added

-"We'll go to search for some hollows... But I don't want to watch you while eating them..."- Blake's spiritual body still ached from Joana's hug, which confirmed his theory that she was far stronger than himself, but was probably not fully aware of that. And so, they left the house to go look for some hollows... 'Not so different of what I usually do... but knowing that she will eat them still creeps me out...' Blake thought as they walked toward the city.

Before long, several hollows already were trying to fight him, and he defeated most of them with little effort, but not finishing them off. He knocked them unconscious and piled them up. After he got over a dozen, they seemingly stopped and retreated

-"I hope this is enough..."- Blake said, the happy yet hungry look in Joana was the only answer he needed. He jumped to a nearby building's roof. As he didn't want to see her eating the hollows... then...
1533111111.title: Joana has a hollow hole too?! This is crazy...

choices: Blake vs the strange man, part 2...
15331111111.content:
Blake dodged something that came at him very fast... then he looked, and more hollows started to rush toward him and Joana, he growled in annoyance and sliced them again, and noticed that they kept attacking in waves, Blake kept killing them with his swords, and after 30 minutes, which seemed an eternity to him, hollows stopped coming. He sheathed his swords, and heard someone clapping, and Blake quickly turned and looked up, and noticed a man standing on a building's roof. The man was wearing geta (Japanese wooden sandals) and a bucket hat, a dark green shirt and pants, with a black coat on top.

-"Very well done..."- The man said, and Blake raised an eyebrow, but remained silent, and the man jumped from the roof, and landed before Blake, who was a bit surprised and confused. The man was looking at him, and Blake realized he was able to see him, and opened his eyes wide, thinking 'DAMMIT!!'

-"Oh, you're surprised I can see you?"-

Blake cautiously kept a hand near his sword's handle, and said

-"Who THE HELL are you?"-

-"Me? The poor but handsome owner of a small time candy store... But the real question is, who are you?"-

-"I don't have time for this..."- Blake turned around and walked toward Joana, who was still eating hollows -"Let's go..."- He said to her, and she noticed the man's presence... the fact that Blake wanted to leave had to do something with that man... However, the man suddenly disappeared, and reappeared on the opposite side, a few feet in front of her, Blake extended an arm in front of her, between the man and her...

-"Alright. I'll ask again... who are you, and what do you want?"- Blake asked

-"That's the same thing I ask you..."- The man replied

-"Does it matter?"- Blake said

-"Yeah"-

-"Why should I tell you?"-

-"Why not?"-

-"Many reasons I won't bother to explain..."- Blake answered, staring at the man, watching any possible move he could counter. He tried to hit him with his cane, Blake caught it in response, and said angrily

-"What the hell?!!"-

-"Let's play..."-

-"I'm not in the mood for stupid games. I have more important things to do..."- Blake started to walk away, and ducked, dodging another cane hit, and unsheathed one of his swords while shouting

-"Alright, you're getting on my nerves!!"- Blake sheathed the sword, and decided to fight the man bare handed. The man didn't seem to be doing much effort dodging Blake's punches and kicks, and even blocked some with the cane. The man dashed back some distance, and said

-"Is it that difficult to just answer a simple question?"-

-"Yeah. Common sense tells you not to tell personal info to strangers..."- Blake replied, and the man laughed, both noticed Joana had a worried expression, and Blake knew that things might get ugly -"Listen. I'm doing nothing you might be interested about..."-

-"How can you say that? I'm a very curious person..."-

Blake took some steps backwards, and whispered to Joana

-"Run, go to my house... if I'm not there in 30 minutes, you won't need to search for me..."-

-"But, Blake..."-

-"Now!!"- He said, still whispering, and the man, laughing a bit, said

-"Protecting your girlfriend?"- In that right moment, Blake had dashed toward him with incredible speed and tried to slash him with his sword, and it clashed against the man's cane

-"She is NOT my girlfriend!! And you've just asked for death!!"- Blake replied angrily, while the man smiled. They began to fight at an amazing speed, Blake's sword and the man's cane clashing constantly. Blake was a bit surprised the cane didn't get cut, but was too angered to really care. He also failed to notice Joana didn't run away... As he was focused on fighting the unknown man.

They dashed away from each other for a moment, and the man said

-"You got angry, yet, you aren't fighting with all you've got..."-

-"Who says?"-

-"Your sword... It tells me 'I can do a lot more than this' while you only show rage... you're only fighting to gain time, and your sword also showed some fear..."-

-"Spare me the poetic trash. None of that is right..."- Blake said

-"You have 2 swords, why don't you use the other one as well?"-

-"Why do I have to?"-

-"Because of... this..."- The man swiftly disappeared and reappeared behind Blake, and attempted to slash him, revealing that the cane was in fact a concealed sword. However, it clashed hard against something that sounded and seemed to be very hard. Joana had appeared in front of the man as well and had stopped his blade with her hand. The man opened his seemingly ever-calm eyes wide for a brief moment, and got nearly slashed by Blake, who reacted in no time. Only the man's black coat got very slight damage.

-"I told you to run..."- Blake said

-"I didn't want to..."- Joana replied

-"Fine. I hold no responsibility over your blood... you'll either die or live on your own..."- Blake said, although he knew he didn't really mean it. However he also knew that if the man went under the assumption there was something between them, he might attack her to get him to surrender... and it wasn't like he felt anything anyway... Joana gasped at Blake's statement, and the man asked with a mixture of sarcastic and teasing tone

-"Really? "- The man dashed toward Blake, but at the last moment, disappeared and tried to attack Joana, but Blake stopped it, having the blade pierce his own shoulder. The man smiled and asked -"Why are you defending her then?"-

-"Because this is a fight between you and me. No one else has to get involved... The only lives that are going to be taken are either yours or mine. Nobody else's..."-

The man withdrew his sword, and Blake tried to slash him with one of his swords. The man jumped, and below him, Blake was smiling, and pointing his another sword at him. With almost no warning, an amber colored beam was fired through and from the sword, and the man barely dodged it, it burnt his black coat though... Then he noticed he was bleeding, and Blake tried to stab him, but the man stopped him with his sword, and said

-"You're finally putting some effort. But it's not all you've got, is it?"- The man noticed Blake's temper had cooled down a bit and he was fighting while being decently calmed down, despite the wound in his right shoulder. Which wasn't bleeding as much by the way, and now that he paid some more attention, it didn't pierce through him, and it was far less deep than he thought at first. Blake then sheathed his swords, and aimed his hands at the man, and silently said

-"Ametralladora"- He began to fire several golden energy balls in quick succession, with both hands, which increased his firing rate by twice. Joana was surprised of this as well, she had no idea he could do it with two hands. The man appeared and disappeared repeatedly, dodging all of the blasts, and noticed that the firing rate was slowly increasing, and when he dodged one of the blasts, which would've hit his head otherwise, he felt a piercing pain, and realized Blake had pierced through his chest. He moved behind him, and pierced the man from behind with his remaining sword. On top of that, Blake fired a golden beam, creating a large hole in the man's chest, and he fell down to the ground, seemingly dead...

-"Blake? Are you ok?!"- Asked a more than very worried Joana, Blake just replied rather coldly

-"It's over. Let's go."-

-"Why did you kill him?"-

-"He was obviously a threat. He looked for us, and I'm sure he somehow set up the whole thing... The constant waves of hollows, the fact that many gathered in the same place, and he was watching the whole time... it can't be a coincidence..."- They heard someone clapping, and the man was standing on top of another building, he said

-"Excellent deduction"- He said with some sarcasm

-"The hell?!!"- Blake asked, and noticed the exact same identical body lying down in the ground, dead, while the man hadn't a single scratch, then, the dead body popped... like a balloon... -"Oh crap..."- Was the only thing Blake could add to the realization he failed to kill someone who will be a threat for him... The man jumped again from the building, and landed in front of Blake once again, and said

-"We can start again... who...?"- The man was interrupted as Blake tried to slice him from behind, but he dodged, and unsheathed his sword -"You see? You are just going for the violent option..."-

-"Violence, is sometimes necessary..."- Blake replied, and since the man must have seen his abnormal powers, he decided 'to hell with this' and started firing golden beams in succession, damaging the near environment and the buildings (which were old abandoned buildings by the way). Blake also attacked again with his Ametralladora barrage, keeping some distance between the man and himself. The wound in his shoulder also healed fully.

However, before he could realize, the man was behind him, and slashed his back. Blake fell to the ground, Joana let some tears drop, and rushed toward the man...
15331111111.title: A mysterious man appears... Blake is not happy...

153311111111.content:
The man dodged Joana as well, and barely dodged a kick from Blake, who had quickly gotten up, and tried another slash at him. The man vanished, and when Blake realized, he was sliced so many times he couldn't count... and fell to the ground again. Joana rushed toward the man again, and tried punching him. He blocked her fists with his sword but she didn't bleed no got cut, and only sparks came out of the clashing.

She also started moving to a speed that he could barely dodge, and while he was dodging her very fast punches and kicks, he also realized Blake, despite bleeding, tried to slash him yet again, and while dodging his sword, got kicked in the face by Joana, who added more punches to the stomach and a kick that sent him several feet away to the combo. Blake was breathing heavily, and his body was regenerating at a slower rate.

-"Owww... My nose hurts..."- The man said, covering the lower half of his face with one of his hands, it could be seen that he was bleeding as well.

-"Serves you right..."- Blake said, and he started to breathe normally and his healing rate increased. Then, he extended his left hand, and fired a golden beam that the man dodged by jumpig backwards and also gained some height, and then, he heard Blake's voice from behind

-"Bring death to the doomed souls, Shinokama..."- Blake, now, with a scythe, tried to slice the man, and almost did, but he only sliced in two his black coat...

Blake landed in front of him as well, Joana was a bit worried, but noticed the increase in Blake's power

-"So, you have a zanpakuto..."-

-"I have no idea what you're talking about, and I don't care"- Blake held his scythe with his two hands, and it could be seen that it was silver, with a black snath, some golden adornments along it, as well as a golden kanji that read "Death" ( http://www.xnvx.com/data/thumbnails/89/J... ) on the blade. On the opposite end, it had a golden spear-like tip. Blake dashed toward the man, and tried to slice, him, but anticipating he would dodge, he quickly tried to stab him with the other end, and he managed to slash him.

-"You can release a zanpakuto and you didn't even know what it is?!"-

-"I'm not buying your trash, man..."- Blake replied, and tried once again to slice him, which failed, and the man caught the other end in his hand.

-"Let me make things even for both of us..."- He said -"Awaken, Benihime..."- And his sword changed into a sleek, medium sized sword. The grip had a gentle decorative bend that ended at a crimson tassel dangling from the pommel, instead of a crossguard, there is a U-shaped adornment covering the first three or four inches of blade, with a flower petal design just as it meets a red string wrapping, which is wrapped thrice around the hilt, with a three-loop bow on one side and a folded paper decoration on the other. Its blade was straight and slim, with the tip ending in a slanted razor-like edge.

Blake dashed backward and fired another golden beam, perceiving the danger, and the man said

-"Nononono... Not this time..."- He pointed his sword toward the beam, and said -"Sing, Benihime"- The sword fired a powerful red beam that exploded in contact with Blake's, thus, cancelling it. Blake growled in anger, but retained some coolness, and he said

-"Before continuing, let's take this somewhere else..."-

-"As you wish..."-

Blake started to walk away and the man followed him, Joana caught up with Blake, and said

-"I'm not running away"-

-"You have to... There's no use in the two of us dying..."- Blake replied, while he kept walking, in a few minutes, they were in a nearby forest -"This place is good enough. Now, let's settle this once for all..."- Blake said to the man, and Joana stood next Blake

-"I will fight along you, either you like it or not..."- She said with a newly gained firmness in her tone

-"Fine. Then, help me. You go attack him first to distract him, I might pull off something to kill the damn man..."- He replied, and she nodded in agreement, and when she was dashing toward the man, Blake caught up to her, and elbowed the back of her neck very hard. She fell unconscious immediately.

-"My, there are better ways to treat a lady..."- The man said to Blake

-"Shut up!!"- Blake grabbed her, and disappeared, reappearing where the fight started, and put her carefully on a bed inside an abandoned building. He quickly went back to the forest, and the man laughed

-"With that attitude, the girl isn't going to go out with you anytime..."-

-"That has never been my intention... If I cared about what others said or thought about me, I would've already looked for a way to get rid of all the weird stuff..."- Blake then attacked, and his scythe clashed against the man's sword

-"Coldness... Thick barriers to protect you from being hurt... but, you know, you aren't really like that... You're just transmitting fear into your blade"- The man said while they were struggling

-"I said, shut up!!"- Blake tried to slice him again, and doing a 360 degree move with the scythe, he managed to slash a piece off the man's bucket hat

-"Aww... That was my favorite hat..."-

Blake continued trying to attack him, and after several failed attempts, he managed to catch him off-guard, and when his scythe was about to hit him, something stopped it... between him and the man was a hexagonal shaped crimson barrier.

Blake changed his tactic and started firing his Ametralladora barrage at the shield while holding the scythe with his right hand, and the moment it shattered, the man vanished and appeared in front of him, slashing his right arm, letting his scythe fall, but Blake aimed his left hand at the man's chest, and fired a golden beam, which struck him, and pushed him down against the ground, and exploded after making contact. He landed, and grabbed the scythe with his wounded arm. The man had some slight burns, but he wasn't as damaged as Blake thought

-"Good move. But, you almost sacrificed your good arm to do so..."- The man attacked Blake again, however, Blake swiftly grabbed the scythe with his other hand, and managed to slash the man's left shoulder

-"Wrong!! Both arms are good... I'm ambidextrous, you idiot..."- Blake replied, and his right arm healed again, despite this, Blake was feeling somewhat tired, even if he gathered external energy to continuously heal himself, the process still put some strain on him, and he wasn't going anywhere... At the current rate, it might take days, maybe months to kill the man... and Blake knew he wouldn't last for that long... although it was probable the man wouldn't either...

He decided to thoroughly heal himself one last time and make another risky bet... adding all the external energy he could gather to his own to further increase his power, strength and speed... at the cost of no healing... 'It's all or nothing...' Blake started to glow in a golden aura, and dashed toward the man, who blocked the attack, but was pushed back a fair distance. Blake jumped and fired his Ametralladora barrage from above, and the blasts' power also increased, making it more difficult for the man to dodge, and used more of his crimson beams to cancel some of them...

The man observed that a part of the golden aura took the shape of wings on Blake's back, and that he was breathing heavily, which meant he was putting all his effort on this. Blake dashed away while in mid air, and fired a golden beam, wider, and more powerful than before. The man cancelled it with another crimson shield, but this time, it cracked. Blake fired another beam with two hands, and it made a greater explosion, this time, the shield broke to pieces shortly after the smoke dissipated. Blake was breathing even more heavily, and noticed the man still had minimal damage

Then Blake tried to dash toward him, but fell to his knees. The man was walking toward him, and Blake gathered strength to keep going, and stood up again, and tried to attack him with all his strength. The man blocked with his sword, and Blake's scythe's blade shattered in contact. He muttered

-"Damn... it..."- He knew life wasn't going to give him a second chance, and that it was probably his end... In the end, he regretted nothing, as his own death would change nothing, and the whole world would go on, not even noticing it... With those thoughts, he slowly fell into unconsciousness. Before fully blacking out, he saw a blurry Joana, rushing toward himself

-"I failed... again..."- Blake muttered, too low to be heard by anyone, and closed his eyes, expecting nothing, other than ceasing to exist, and have a final rest from everything...

Joana was crying, and held Blake's unconscious spiritual body in her arms, then, she glared at the man, who laughed casually, and scratched the back of his head

-"I might have overdone it after all..."-

Joana's only answer was an angry growl, and when she rushed toward him, he disappeared, and before she realized, he knocked her unconscious again...
153311111111.title: Blake vs the strange man, part 2...

choices: -"Well.. yeah..."- Urahara replied, still in pain...
1533111111111.content:
Blake found himself in an unknown yet somehow familiar place... it was a field, with grass, a dark sky, and wind... He noticed he only had one sword beside him, the one with the golden handle. And when he stood up and looked for the other sword, he heard the same voice he heard last time he got unconscious

-"Looking for this?"- He turned around and found a strange guy... dressed with identical clothes to his own. But the guy had white skin, and waist length white hair, which covered his eyes temporarily, but he revealed them to be crimson, with black sclera.

-"Who are you?"- Blake asked, not feeling so much in the mood for another fight

-"You should know. We've been buddies for a long time"-

-"I have no buddies"- Blake replied plainly

-"Aww, c'mon, don't be like that..."-

-"Seriously, I'm not in the mood for jokes... I just want to know where am I..."-

-"Well, the answer to that question depends on what you mean..."-

-"What?!!"-

-"You mean this place, or where you are currently?"- The strange white guy asked back

-"I don't get it"- Blake said

The strange guy sighed, and said

-"This is your inner world... what you would call your soul... our small world..."-

-"Our?! How did you get here?"-

-"I didn't. I have been always here..."- The white guy replied, and seeing Blake's WTF face, he added -"I am that voice that has given you hints about your powers... I am whose powers you've been using the whole time... I am a part of you..."-

-"You mean...?!"-

-"Yeah..."-

Blake fell to his knees in shock, and the white guy said

-"I know. I'm THAT awesome..."-

-"Shut up..."- Blake said, and added -"Why the stupid hints? Couldn't you tell me what am I? What are YOU in the first place?"-

-"I don't know. I've told you what I've found out myself... This place makes quite a nice training ground..."- The white guy said

-"What's your name?"-

-"Uh... I don't have a name... Let me think..."- The white guy scratched his chin thoughtfully, and Blake fell face first to the ground

-"...Hmm... I need to think more about it... I'll tell you later when I come up with a name..."-

-"...Alright..."- Blake said with a -_-' face

-"Anyway... since you're here, it means you screwed up again, didn't you?!"-

-"I fought with all I got!!"-

-"You should have let the girl help you, I told you not to treat her badly again..."-

-"I actually saved her from getting murdered..."-

-"You didn't die, nor I think you would have succeeded... you and me saw clearly she came back before you closed your eyes..."-

-"You can see through my eyes?!"-

-"Only when I feel like it"- The white guy replied, and Blake clenched his fists in anger and some annoyance

-"So... I'm unconscious or something?"- Blake asked

-"Yep"-

-"Why are you so sure I'm not dead?"-

-"Because I can feel it"- The white guy said

-"What?"- Blake asked in surprise

-"I can feel others' spiritual power... even yours, and I can tell you're still alive..."- The white guy replied

-"How the hell do you do that?"-

-"I don't really know"-

-"Alright"- Blake said -"Hey... What are you here for?"-

-"I guessed you'd be confused finding yourself here"-

-"And you came here to help me? I'm seriously doubting that..."-

-"Why?"-

-"I had the feeling that you wanted to destroy me and take over my mind or something..."-

-"I have no reason for that. I'm quite comfortable with things as they are. Just don't piss me off and you'll be fine"-

-"Uh...alright..."- Blake didn't want to push further on the matter... if the guy was really the source of his powers as he stated, it meant he was probably powerless here...

-"How about a sparring match? Not everyday I get to play with someone other than that jerk..."-

-"What jerk? Is there someone else here?!"- Blake said, and the white guy sighed, grabbed Blake's sword, and shouted at it-"YEAH, I MEAN YOU!! STOP PRETENDING YOU DON'T HEAR ME!!"-

-"Are you yelling at a sword?"- Blake said with a o_o face, and further to his surprise, the sword reformed with a humanoid silhouette. It was another guy, with fair skin, brown eyes, and black wavy hair, slightly longer than Blake's. He was dressed in a black open jacket, with a white shirt under it, a white sash, black hakama, white tabi and black zori... essentially, Blake's clothing inverted color-wise.

-"WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON HERE?! WHEN THE HELL DID MY SOUL BECOME A PUBLIC PLACE?!!"- Blake shouted (This is more or less what his face was like http://static.tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pub/im... or http://media-cards.theotaku.com/575205-2... PS: Never watched FMA)

-"Unfortunately, I'm part of you as well..."- The other guy replied with an annoyed tone

-"Yeah, the jerkish part"- The white guy added

-"Ok, who are you?"- Blake asked

-"Hmph, you called me and injured me some minutes ago, and you still ask who am I?"-

-"Yeah!!"- Blake said angrily

-"Aww... poor little baby got hurt, boo hoo... Freakin' grow up you idiot!! When you fight, it's kinda obvious you'll get some damaged!! But that makes a fight more exciting!!"- The white guy said to the other one

-"Stop it you too"- Blake said with a subtle firmness in his tone, as he somewhat regained awareness that it was his world after all

-"Does this ring any bell?"- The guy showed a scythe, identical to what Blake's transformed sword looked like...

-"Shinokama? I thought you were a damn weapon!!"- Blake said, and facepalming himself, he added -"I really regret entering my soul just to find it's a mess where seemingly anybody can get in..."-

-"Hey!!"- Shinokama and the white guy exclaimed, and glared at Blake

-"Anyway... for how long will I stay here?! The more I'm at this place the weirder it gets, what's next? Ametralladora is another guy or what?!"-

-"Nope, Ametralladora is one of my techniques..."- The white guy explained

-"What the...?"- Blake said in surprise

-"Who do you think taught it to you?"- The white guy said

-"Whatever"- Blake said -"I could swear I'm the only person in the entire world that deals with this crap..."- And suddenly, everything got blurrier, until he finally woke up... And further to his dismay, Joana was on him... yeah, ON him... unconscious as well... and it looked as if she were hugging him while sleeping, althoguh Blake didn't think about it, and just saw it as annoyance and an awkward moment...

Blake would've shouted 'WHAT THE HELL?!', as he also found himself in an unknown place, but he didn't to not wake Joana up...

-"Good you finally woke up"- The man Blake thought killed him said

-"Why is she on top of me?"- Blake asked

-"Well, you needed to keep warm, and it was either her or Tessai-san"- The man said, and Blake noticed a tall, lightly tan-skinned man with cornrowed hair and a large handlebar mustache. He was wearing rectangular-shaped glasses, a white muscle shirt with normal pants and a blue apron

-"Uh...ok...nevermind..."- Blake said with a sweatdrop on the left temple of his head.

-"You are really something. Tessai-san didn't have to do much healing on you, you healed most damage on your own..."-

-"Don't change the topic!! We're still back where we began... Who ARE you?!"- Blake asked angrily

-"Kisuke Urahara"-

-"That tells me nothing... what do you want from me?!"-

-"I was just investigating... I've been getting readings of an unidentified reiatsu that has been killing a lot of hollows and performing soul burials..."-

-"I have no idea what you're talking about. But yeah, I kill hollows, what's the problem?"-

-"I wanted to find who or what was behind that"-

-"I'm hating you more than I already do, you know?"-

Urahara just laughed at Blake's statement, and said

-"I can actually help you"-

-"How?"- Blake said, and then, he noticed Joana woke up, and when she saw him, beneath her, she blushed, and quickly sat up

-"Sorry!!"- She said apologetically

-"It wasn't your fault..."- Blake said -"It was HIS!!"- He pointed accusingly at Urahara, who laughed again

-"Well, you chose her over Tessai-san"- He replied, and was struck in the face by a cup of hot tea thrown by Blake

-"Bastard!! You did it while I was unconscious!!"- Blake shouted, and Urahara was holding his face in pain for the hit and the hot tea

-"It...hurts..."- Urahara said

-"Serves you right. Now, let's get the hell out of here before something weirder happens..."- Blake said to Joana and stood up

-"Hey! You haven't seen my products, I'm offering you special discounts and the best deals in miles arou-..."- Urahara's speech was interrupted by a punch in the face from an angrier Blake, who shouted

-"All this was so you could sell us your crap?!!"-
1533111111111.title: Blake meets his inner world, not what he expected

choices: Blake goes back to his house... now he has to deal with even MORE trouble...
Something or somoeone interrupts them in the way?
15331111111111.content:
Blake tried to punch Urahara again but Joana stopped his arm, and gave him a 'Calm down' look. She had perceived Blake had indeed a very aggressive personality despite he acted calm before, still, he stopped, and asked

-"What are you trying to sell?"- Blake immediately regretted asking, as Urahara regained his cheerful tone rather quickly, and brought what looked like anatomy models, as well as some pills and before he continued, he asked again -"What the hell is this?"-

-"THIS is a Gigai, a body, to interact with the human world, I can sell you two for the low price of-mmphh..."- Blake punched him in the face again, and said

-"I already have a body, stupid!!"-

-"Oh really? Can you get out of your body at will?"-

-"Yeah, why?"- Blake replied

-"Impressive"- He muttered, then he added -"Alright, I still can sell you one for the lady... even make a fully customized one..."- He started "measuring" her only to be kicked hard in the stomach by Blake

-"Careful with the hands, old man..."- Blake said -"I am NOT buying that anyway..."- He added

-"It would lessen the hollows' ability to track her, and they wouldn't pursue her as much..."- Urahara said, rubbing his stomach

-"HUH?!!"- Blake and Joana were both caught in surprise, and Blake asked, still angrily -"How do YOU know?!!"-

-"You are going to need these, soul candies... they will help you to get out of your bodies and replace you while you're out..."-

-"Wait, wait wait... Why would I need that?!"- Blake asked

-"Doesn't your body get unconscious when you are out of it?"- Urahara asked back

-"Yeah, so what?"-

-"Say, hollows wander around during school time, wouldn't it a little suspicious that you suddenly got unconscious for no reason?"-

-"I guess... but I don't trust those things..."-

-"They're harmless, in fact, I'll bundle everything you'll need..."- He quickly called two kids that started getting together the gigai, a pink pill, a black pill, and two cell phones

-"What are the phones for?"- Joana asked

-"They'll help you to detect hollows, as well as allowing you to communicate like any other cell phone..."- Urahara quickly typed in his cash register, and said -"Everything will be, with the discount, 30,000 ¥...*"-

Blake started to laugh, and Urahara stared at him in apparent confusion

-"I have no money you idiot. I never said I wasn't going to take any of this..."- Blake said, and Tessai began to walk toward him, in a somewhat menacing manner, but Urahara waved his hand, gesturing him to stop, and fanning while speaking, he said

-"That won't be a problem. You can still pay this, with work..."-

-"Forget about it. there's no way IN HELL I'm going to be your employee..."-

-"Oh, you won't work at the store. You'll actually do the same yo usually do. Slay hollows, with your zanpakuto..."-

-"My what?!"-

-"Your swords..."- Urahara said -"You'll have to register them so you can get bounties from the hollows you slay, with those earnings you'll pay for all these things..."-

-"I still don't agree..."- Blake replied, still annoyed at the mans persistence

-"Aww, come on!! I'm trying to be nice here!"- Urahara said, giving Blake and Joana a puppy eye look. The latter couldn't really resist, and kinda felt bad for him because of the many times Blake had punched, kicked and thrown things at him in such a short time...

-"This could help us, Blake, why don't we just agree?"-

-"Because I don't need any of this stuff... anyway, if you got a physical body, you'd have to get somewhere else to stay..."-

-"I can't stay at your house anymore?!"- Joana asked in surprise

Blake facepalmed himself, and said -"It's highly likely my parents wouldn't even agree... and it would seem SO wrong..."-

-"Why?"-

-"I'll explain you later..."- Blake said, and turned away to walk out of the store, and Urahara said, with an overly dramatic tone

-"When you go to the school... you'll be away from your house for 7 or 8 hours... think about it, 7 or 8 hours she will be alone and vulnerable... easy prey for the hollows..."- He then changed to a more serious tone -"Do you really want to run such a risk?"-

-"I hate you so much..."- Blake said, sighing, and taking all the stuff... -"I swear I'm going to make you pay after this is over, mad hatter*... do something stupid, and you'll have this cell phone shoved down your throat..."-

Joana laughed nervously, as she wasn't sure about Blake's attitude, he might get them in trouble. Urahara just hid the lower half of his face with his fan while laughing, and said

-"No worries. The phone will tell you when you need to go to action..."-

-"Stop trying to make it sound like as if I were a superhero or something..."- Blake sighed -"Fine, let's go..."-

-"By the way, Blake-san, I've already registered the lady at your school and she'll be in the same class you are... She'll only need to give her full name"-

-"YOU WHAT?!!"- Blake was about to rush and probably cause physical damage to Urahara, but Joana stopped him (she was now a bit more aware about him being more than they thought)

-"It was the obvious thing to do. You'll be like scorting her at all times. Not like you wouldn't anyway..."-

-"You bastmffff..."- Blake was interrupted by one of Joana's hands covering his mouth, although he managed to speak a bit -"I mfmfmfm swear that I'm mfffmfmfmfmf going to mfmfmfmfmfffmf you and will mfmfmfmfmfffffmfmf and mfmfmfmfmfmffffffm in your mfmfmfmfmmmfffff!!!!"- Joana put more effort covering Blake's mouth, but her strength was pressing him against her body and that didn't let Blake breathe. In a few seconds he was starting to turn blue

-"Ermm... you should let go of your boyfriend if you want him alive..."- Urahara said, laughing, and Blake fell to his knees, gasping for air

-"I...AM...NOT...HER BOYFRIEND!!!!"- Blake shouted

-"Don't worry, Blake.san, I won't tell anyone..."-

-"You're asking for it, aren't you?!"- A vein popped comically in Blake's forehead while he waved his fist menacingly, while Joana stopped him again

-"Also, Blake.san, you should try out the soul candies to learn how they work... I'd recommend testing it first on the lady's gigai..."-

-"Couldn't YOU get us an instruction manual?!!"-

-"Hahahaha.... Sorry about that... I don't have enough money to do that... and... nobody reads the manuals these days..."-

-"I hate you much more than before, you know?"- Blake said, still having his arms restrained by Joana, who seemingly learned from the previous accidental suffocating

-"Good luck"- Urahara waved goodbye while Joana dragged Blake away with a hand and with the other one took the bag with all the stuff...





*As far as I know, it hasn't been mentioned what currency do Bleach characters use, but since it's located in Japan, I guess it's reasonable to assume they use yen..

PS: A little fact: Instead of Hat'n Clogs, in the latin american dub, Ichigo refers to Urahara as "the Mad Hatter" which is what gave me the idea of Blake calling him that in this story...
15331111111111.title: Blake has a job!! ¬_¬

153311111111111.content:
Blake had an anger twitch in one of his eyes while Joana dragged him out of the store

-"Blake-san, I was forgetting about the lady's gigai, it'll be done in some minutes... Please wait"- Urahara said, with still a somewhat annoying mockery in his tone

-"I'm so tempted to become a serial killer right now..."- Blake muttered in anger -"Go inside and wait if you want, I have no idea about that fake body thing he calls gigai, so just do what they say, if he tried anything weird scream and I'll be kicking that mad hatter's ass..."-

-"I think I'll be ok..."- Joana said a bid nervous and went inside back the store, Blake sighed and waited patiently, he was so angry he wasn't even thinking about what excuse to make, all he wanted was to punch Urahara's lights out and leave. He then heard the sound of a cane hitting the ground... Urahara had walked outside, he noticed Blake clenching his fists

-"Hey, calm down a bit, I'm here... that means Tessai-san, Jinta and Ururu are doing the gigai work... So my hands aren't near anywhere near inappropiate"- He spoke, first in a joking tone but by the end of his phrase he really meant to comfort Blake a bit -"I'm not sure if I should tell you this, but maybe by doing these things you may find answers to your questions..."-

-"By how you speak, it appears to me that you may know them already..."- Blake commented

-"Nah. I'm just the poor owner of a small time candy store..."-

-"That also sells ghost-hunting equipment and weird crap like fake bodies for souls..."- Blake remarked

-"You just had to ruin the moment..."- Urahara said laughing a bit more nervously

-"It's alright. If you ever want to tell me I'll hear it. If not, maybe I'll find the answers through battles..."- Blake looked at his sheathed swords

After that, there was just silence, until Tessai said -"Done"- And Joana came out, this time with a more casual dressing, a white blouse, with a brown jacket on top, as well as black jeans, basically, a female version of Blake's human clothes. Blake's jaw dropped for a moment, but he regained composure quickly, although he still blushed.

-"W-why those clothes?"-

-"She chose them herself"- Tessai said while pushing his glasses up, Joana gave Blake a n_n face

-"Well... whatever... Now, I have to think of an excuse to convince my parents to let you live in my house..."- Blake began to walk back home and Joana followed him. The way felt longer than it actually was, as Blake was very tense and even walked a bit slowly to give himself time to think. When they finally arrived to his house, he sighed and opened the door. It was no surprise that his parents were already there, apparently when they had no more work tey could get out early... In the living room, Blake's mother was laying on the couch while reading a book

-"Hi..."- Blake said in a non enthusiastic tone

-"Hi"- Blake's mother replied in a happier tone, and noticed Blake's mood, but before she asked him, she noticed the girl behind Blake, who was blushing a bit and seemed nervous -"Umm... Blake... who's the young lady?"-

-"An exchange student... They sent her earlier so she could get used to the different things here and whatever... school guys called me and I had to go pick her up..."- Blake said, ironically, his non enthusiastic tone made the excuse seem real as Blake would be annoyed by having to deal with people

-"Good afternoon, Mrs..."- Joana was saying politely but stopped at Mrs. because she had no idea what was her surname, and Blake's mother laughed, replying

-"Don't worry, you can call me Lith"-

-"My name is Joana"- She gently shook her hand, still a bit unsure of it all.

-"Well, try to feel at home,whatever you need I'm sure Blake will help you, or you can ask me..."- Lith then winked at Blake before resuming her reading. Both he and Joana blushed a lot and pretended it didn't happen. After they go to Blake's room (there was no guest room) James came from the kitchen, drinking a glass of water

-"I heard we had visits..."-

-"Yeah, Blake brought a girl..."-

-"As a father, I would feel proud... but as HIS father... I consider it's a bit... weird?"-

-"Hormones can kick-in late..."-

-"Shouldn't we...?"-

-"No, let him be..."-

-"Well, you had him inside you 9 months, if anyone knows, i guess it's you..."-

Meanwhile, in Blake's room...

Blake wiped a bit of swweat from his forehead -"Phew... that excuse actually worked... and I suck at acting but nevermind... well, as long as nobody asks too many questions, we're fine..."-

-"So I have to go to school?"-

-"Yeah, that's what Mr. Mad Hatter said... creepy weirdo..."-

Meanwhile, Urahara was checking his inventory, when he suddenly sneezed

-"Do you have a cold Urahara-san?"-

-"Of course not! Someone must have spoken ill of me... maybe..."-

Back to Blake's room again...

-"Anyway school isn't such a big deal, basically you go there to be bored to death for 8 hours and then you're free to go home, not without some annoying to do homework which everyone rips off the internet anyway. However... by your looks you may have to deal with creepy weird perverts..."-

-"What looks?"-

Blake gulped, he couldn't dare mention Joana's bust or hip size, and so, after sighing, all he replied was -"It's something only guys understand, but yeah you may be a target for sick weirdos, but don't worry, I'll kick their ass for free"- Both teenagers laughed at that

-"School is still 2 months away so, IF you can control that strength of yours, I MAY teach you to fight back so you can give them a lesson yourself... It'll be your homework for this time to learn to control it..."- Blake was saying when his cellphone suddenly rang

-"Actually, Blake-san, you don't have to worry about that, the custom made gigai I got for your beautiful female companion *ahem* for the lady, suppresses her powers to average human levels..."- Urahara said over the phone

-"WHAT THE HELL MAD HATTER?!! ARE YOU SPYING ON US?!!"- Blake shouted on the phone, and Urahara replied

-"Oh, spying is such an ugly word, let's say I just keep a close eye on certain people..."-

Meanwhile, in Soul Society...

-"WHOEVER PUT THAT CAMERA IN MY SHOWER HAS 2 CHOICES, DEATH, OR MORE DEATH!! FIND ME WHOEVER WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS IMMEDIATELY!!"-

A certain petite female shinigami captain angrily shouted to her soldiers, who shouted "YES CAPTAIN" before leaving hurriedly

Back to Blake's room, yet again...

-"Keep going on and I'll shove both this and your phone down your throat!!"-

-"Calm down! calm down! I promise I won't be misusing these capabilities of mine, I'll only contact you for serious reasons..."- Urahara said before ending the call

-"I SWEAR I'll never get used to that..."- Blake sighed -"Well with the exception of that maddening hatter, i think life wouldn't suck so much, school is boring, we'll probably deal with a lot less hollows with that fake body, and the biggest threats we may face are probably just the sick perverts at school lusting after you, for reasons I'm not going to comment..."-

-"Umm... I'll still need to feed... Mr. Tessai said that human food wouldn't provide enough for me because I'm not an ordinary soul..."-

-"So I still have to hunt hollows for every breakfast?! God seriously hates me..."-

-"Sorry..."- Joana said, a bit ashamed

-"It's ok, it's not your fault. Nobody chooses what they are, look at me, I'm a human that can turn into a ghost and deals with dead souls and evil dead souls... you know it almost seems material for a book or a tv series... Anyway, the point is none of us chooses what we are so it's not your fault, and well, at least it's to put those bastards to good use"-

Blake laid on his hammock, leaving the bed for Joanaa to sleep. He was still almost surprised his parents didn't say anything further, but he's thankful for not having to explain more. Blake just became this girl's full-time bodyguard, until he can figure out what she is, and how to send her to heaven. Incidentally she may help him answer his own questions about himself, but at least a difference is obvious in that he is a live human somehow mixed with Joana's species, while she seems to be a dead soul.

-"Hey, I have a question..."- Joana asked -"I saw your parents sleep both on the bed... so... why do you sleep on that hammock instead?"-

That question made Blake fall from his hammock and flat on his face, he sat up and sighed -"Remember I told you about couples? Well, a couple consists of 2 people involved in a relationship, usually adult people in a serious relationship who live in the same house will sleep on the same bed..."-

-"But why?"-

Blake took one of his sciences books and searched for the pages with information on those adult themes, and handed it to her -"Read under your own risk. I'll just make clear that such things involve 2 HUMAN adults over the age of 18 according to laws..."- Blake took out a PSP and began to play while Joana read the book.

'To think I almost had to explain her about human things not even I am familiar with... well, at least she's innocent and doesn't have more than pure curiosity, maybe I should try to help her later if she asks something'Blake thought, reconsidering his harsher reactions from shortly ago
